Name: April Fool
Ingredients: ['3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brooklyn (perfect)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Californian Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Calvados Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.13)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Avallen Calvados', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Clover Club (House-Made)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 spoon Raspberry jam', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: STIR jam with gin in base of shaker until dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (expressed and discarded) & skewered raspberry

Name: Curtain Call
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making:
Cut zest from your lime for garnish prior to squeezing for juice. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

For an even better Daiquiri use 2 x 5ml measuring spoons of powdered sugar (finely ground caster sugar) in place of 10ml sugar syrup. Stir sugar with other ingredients in base of shaker prior to adding ice and shaking to ensure fully dissolved.
Garnish: Lime zest twist (discarded) & lime wedge on rim

Name: Daiquiri No.1 (6:2:1 recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

For an even better Daiquiri use 2 x 5ml measuring spoons of powdered sugar (finely ground caster sugar) in place of 10ml sugar syrup. To ensure fully dissolved, stir sugar with lime juice in base of shaker prior to adding rum and ice, and shaking.

Name: Damn It Jimmy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Difford's Fruit Cup No.1 (gin based & Pimm's Cup-like)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage in drink

Name: Dry Martini 'Preferred Stirred' (5:1 ratio)
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄12 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Chilled skewered olive or lemon zest twist (or served Dicken's-style without a garnish)

Name: Dry Martini (15:1 ratio) Montgomery's
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ferrobaldi Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ferro China Baliva', '4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Squeeze orange juice using pillar or elbow press and fine strain to remove any flesh. Then blend freshly squeezed juice at high speed (without ice) to make “fluffy”. Pour Ferro China and half the fluffy orange juice into glass over 2 cubes of ice and STIR. Fill glass with more ice (3 cubes) and rest of fluffy orange juice.

Name: High Ryeser
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Iron Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Ferro China Baliva', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Left Bank Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Madurised Old Fashioned Godfather
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Rainwater/Verdelho (med-dry) Madeira wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Margarita on-the-rocks (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Marsala Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Marsala Superiore DOC secco wine', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Martinez
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mezcal Dante
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Basil leaves', '1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mezcal Fruit Cup (Diffords No.8 Cup)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "2 dash Bob's Lavender Bitters", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Mezcal Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', "8 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Negroni Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.
Garnish: Orange wedge or slice and/or orange zest twist

Name: New York Minute
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon and orange zest (discarded) & three coffee beans floating on drink

Name: One Sip Martini
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄6 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄24 shot Fino sherry']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Gorgonzola (or Roquefort) cheese stuffed large olive (well chilled)

Name: Penicillin cocktail
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Pisco Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.9)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Amargo Chuncho bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Poet's Dream
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Prescription Julep
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into julep cup filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & mint sprigs dusted with icing sugar

Name: Red Snapper
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '4 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 dash Worcestershire sauce', '7 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '2 grind Black pepper', '2 pinch Celery salt']
Making: ROLL rather than shake all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Use double frozen ice freshly from freezer to fill glass.)

Name: Rum Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.4)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Rye Whiskey Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.5)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Sabot
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '3⁄4 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Santa Marta Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water', '1⁄6 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT spoon of kirsch eau de vie on surface of drink.

Name: Scotch Whisky Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.2)
Ingredients: ["5⁄6 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: South Side Rickey
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Tequila Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Coin-sized lime zest twist cut thick with some flesh on the back so that when the zest is expressed over the cocktail a few drips of juice also drop into the cocktail.

Name: The Dante
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Last Word cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lime twist (discarded) and Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Triple Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club Especial', '1⁄6 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: 20th Century Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: 21st Century
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Addington
Ingredients: ['1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water (chilled)']
Making: STIR first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with a splash of chilled soda from a bottle/can or just the merest squirt from a chilled soda siphon.

Name: Affinity
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Vermouth amaro', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Aged Grappa Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini I Legni Rovere grappa', '3⁄4 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Aged Honey Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Aged Rum Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.14)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Air Mail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass (preferably a column of ice). TOP with champagne.
Garnish: Tip of a mint sprig or serve naked

Name: Alpine Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄2 shot Bigallet Genepi Grand Tetras', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '3 dash Lemon bitters', '1 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Anejo Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Salami wrapped Luxardo Maraschino cherry on a pick

Name: Añejo Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup', "8 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
Making: STIR one shot of tequila with three ice cubes (dry to the touch frozen ice, not wet ice) in a glass. Add agave syrup and bitters and two more ice cubes. STIR some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the tequila. STIR some more, and if you have room, add more ice.

Name: Apple Jack (by Sasha Petraske)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Applejack brandy bottled-in-bond (50% alc./vol)', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Arte de Volar
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄4 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Atholl Brose
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', "1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Oat milk / oatmeal water', '1⁄6 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄3 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: STIR honey with Scotch in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Avion de Papel
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Meletti amaro', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bacardi Special
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bamboo Cocktail (Difford's 'Perfect' recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bamboo Cocktail (Joaquín Simó's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Calling
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: None (but perhaps serve with banana chips)

Name: Bananarama
Ingredients: ['3 slice Banana (preferably overripe)', '1 shot Cachaça', '2⁄3 shot Havana Club Especial', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Nixta liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: MUDDLE banana with cachaça and rum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Barbary Coast
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Barney Barnato Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Kina aromatised wine', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄12 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bastille
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Armagnac brandy', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Black walnut bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Walnut on rim or resting on ice

Name: Beer on-the-rocks
Ingredients: ['2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '2 shot British bitter ale']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: Benton's Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacon fat-washed bourbon', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR fat-washed bourbon and maple syrup in base of mixing glass until syrup dissolves. Add bitters and ice and STIR again. Strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bermondsey Minute
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lavender sugar syrup', "2 drops Bob's Lavender Bitters (optional)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon & orange zest twists (discarded) and float 3 coffee beans

Name: Bitter Jean
Ingredients: ['2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄3 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '3⁄4 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '8 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Two Luxardo Maraschino cherries on stick

Name: Blood and Sand (Classic formula)
Ingredients: ["3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blood and Sand (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky (optional)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Blooded Knees Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '3⁄4 shot Blood orange juice', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (If using honey rather than honey syrup then use 3 spoons of honey.)

Name: Bloody Mary (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 ring Yellow bell pepper (optional)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 1⁄4 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄3 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 pinch Celery salt', '3 grind Black pepper', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce']
Making: MUDDLE pepper in base of shaker. Add other ingredients and ice then ROLL (rotate rather than shake) and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Use ice fresh from freezer (rather than ice-machine/ice-well) to fill glass to avoid unwanted dilution.
Garnish: Celery salt & black pepper rim + garnish with celery stick, cherry tomato & strip yellow bell pepper

Name: Bobby Burns (Difford's own)
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & slice of shortbread

Name: Bonaparte's Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Averna Amaro']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Boothby Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '5⁄6 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine (chilled)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bradford Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist

Name: Brandy Sangaree
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Tawny port', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Breakfast Club
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '1 spoon Honey', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Lapsang Souchong tea (cold)']
Making: STIR honey and marmalade with rum until dissolved. Add tea, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Breakfast Martini
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker until it dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist & slice of toast on rim

Name: Brooklyn (Grohusko's original)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brooklyn's Finest
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Vermouth amaro', "1⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brown Derby
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cachaça Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.10)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Cachaça', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut a ripe lime in half (from pole to pole) and remove the core from each half by cutting a cut a v-shaped grove. You'll need one-half of the lime per drink and this should be chopped into wedges and each wedge chopped in half before dropping the resulting 6 or 8 lime chunks into the base tin of a shaker.

2. Add 3 bar spoons powdered sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. If using cubed ice straight from the freezer, add chilled water (or optionally add fruit of choice) and MUDDLE some more. If using watery ice then omit some or all of the water/juice.

4. When sure the lime's juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, POUR the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz highball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the shaker tin used to muddle and swirl to rinse tin before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to mix with other ingredients.

6. If using cubed ice, crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Canchànchara
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Carlton Banks
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "2 drop Boker's bitters", '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Top with chilled champagne.

Name: Carta Switchel
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Apple Cider vinegar']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Mint sprig bouquet & grapefruit zest twist

Name: Celery Century
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '1 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄3 shot Celery saccharum (celery syrup)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & tip of flowering celery stalk

Name: Cherry Martinez
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Luxardo Sour Cherry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Christmas Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Christmas Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', "1⁄12 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk or block ice).

Name: Coco Geisha
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Japanese single malt whisky', '3⁄4 shot Sake', '3⁄4 shot Coconut water', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cognac Julep
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into julep cup half filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top up the cup with more crushed ice and CHURN again. Repeat this process until the drink fills the cup and serve.

Name: Conan Doyle
Ingredients: ['2 shot Island single malt Scotch whisky', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '3 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Corpse Reviver No.4
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: RINSE chilled glass with absinthe and discard. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into chilled, absinthe-rinsed glass.

Name: Crosstree
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot White overproof rum', '5⁄6 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla sugar', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri (frozen)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and then STRAIN blended drink through a fine strainer to remove ice slush.

Name: Daiquiri (on-the-rocks)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Daiquiri Elixir
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Clement Sirop de Canne', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri No.1 Natural (Embury's 8:2:1 formula)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri No.3
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Dantes in Fernet
Ingredients: ['1 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '1 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1 dash Xocolatl mole bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: De Beauvoir
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 3⁄4 shot Smoked porter beer', '1 spoon Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '1 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: De La Louisiane
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Devil's Soul
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄3 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄6 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Dot (by Jason Clapham)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dry Ice Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Canadian icewine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dry Martini (10:1 ratio) Preferred Shaken
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dry Martini (15:5 dumped) Franklin
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR vermouth with ice and strain to DISCARD excess, leaving the glass and ice-coated with vermouth. POUR gin over vermouth coated ice, STIR and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dry Martini (7:1 ratio) Embury's
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist.

Name: Dublin Minstrel
Ingredients: ['1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dutch Tea Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 shot Brewed cold black breakfast tea']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: East India No.2
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Pineapple sugar syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Presidente
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Viajero
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Coconut water', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Coconut dust on the side of the glass. Lime peel.

Name: Elixir Tropical
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 fresh Mint leaves']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Enrico Palazzo
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', "2 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into carbonator. CARBONATE and pour into chilled glass.

Name: Enzoni
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Skewered orange slice wheel & green grape (sail)

Name: Episcopal
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) plus float 3 coffee beans on surface

Name: Farmer's Tan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Vermouth amaro', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3 drop Xocolatl mole bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Place cocktail stick in glass and drop chilli oil on surface of drink where stick breaks meniscus so that the chilli oil is speared by the stick.

Name: Fire & Brimstone
Ingredients: ['2 slice Red jalapeño/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded & chopped (fine sliced)', '1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%) (infused with Earl Grey tea)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup']
Making: MUDDLE chillies in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Fitzgerald (no added sugar & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Fix One's Flint
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Horse with No Name habanero bourbon', '2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1 shot Oloroso sherry', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ford Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Old Tom gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: French 125 (French '75' with cognac)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add cognac, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir. (Consider pouring half the champagne into the glass first to help reduce foaming.)

Name: French 75 (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1⁄2 shot Old Tom gin', '1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add next 5 ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir. (Consider pouring half the champagne into the glass first to help reduce foaming and eliminate need to stir.)

Name: French 75 Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add gin, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir. (Consider pouring half the champagne into the glass first to help reduce foaming.)

Name: Fresh Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Monkey Shoulder Fresh Monkey', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Froupe Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "2 dash Boker's bitters (optional)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Garden Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Rhubarbe Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Celery bitters']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water. and briefly stir.
Garnish: Rhubarb ribbon around inside of glass

Name: Garibaldi
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Squeeze orange juice using pillar or elbow press and fine strain to remove any flesh. Then blend the freshly squeezed juice at high speed (without ice) to make "fluffy". Pour Campari, sugar syrup and half of the orange juice into glass over 2 cubes of ice and STIR. Fill glass with more ice (3 cubes) and fill with rest of fluffy orange juice.

Name: Gen'tonique
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '5⁄12 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '3 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: Pour all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

Name: General Harrison's Nogg
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '2 shot Dry cider', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Pimento bitters', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
Making: BEWARE, shaking with fizzy ingredients such as cider tends to be explosive. Hence use a dry (less fizzy cider), hold both ends of your shaker firmly and ideally use a specially designed 'fizz' shaker (such as Perlini which is designed to be carbonated). SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass (without ice). Be sure to shake well to completely emulsify the egg.

Name: Genever Collins
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice & strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Giblet (Tequila Gimlet)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄3 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gimlet Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lime zest twist (discarded) & lime wedge on rim

Name: Gin & Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '4 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and serve.

Name: Gin Blossom Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Apricot (abricot) eau-de-vie', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gin Salad Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grappa Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grassoide Ferro Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Ferro China Baliva', '1 1⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Great Gatsby
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Greenbriar
Ingredients: ['2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Peach bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grog
Ingredients: ['2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 shot Chilled water', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Haberdasher
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making:
1. STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
2. SHAKE Chartreuse and cream with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and LAYER by carefully pouring over surface of drink.
Garnish: Dust with cocoa & garnish with a mint leaf

Name: Hemingway Breakfast
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 spoon Orange marmalade', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Aromatize the glass by spritzing with absinthe. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine stain into absinthe rinsed glass.

Name: Hi Falutin
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Highball (Generic Name)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', 'Top up with Ginger ale, soda, tonic water or other carbonated mixer']
Making: POUR spirit into ice-filled glass and TOP with a carbonated soft drink (ginger ale, soda or tonic water).
Garnish: Orange, lime or lemon slice (as appropriate to the spirit or the carbonate)

Name: Honeysuckle Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

If using honey rather than pre-diluted honey syrup, then STIR 3 spoons of runny honey with citrus juices in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add the rum, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float mint leaf (or honeysuckle flower pegged to the rim when in season)

Name: Hunter's Verdict
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Improved Improved Pendennis Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Apricot (abricot) eau-de-vie', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Garnish: Lime slice or wedge (or apricot) on rim

Name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "1 dash Boker's bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Irish Boulevardier
Ingredients: ['1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients in ice-filled serving glass.

Name: Irish Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 shot Filter coffee (hot)', '1 shot Double cream / heavy cream']
Making:
1. Select a heat-proof glass and pre-warm by filling with very hot water and leave to stand.
2. Separately prepare cream by lightly warming and whipping or shaking (ideally use a milk frother to heat and whip your cream).
3. Empty the now warmed glass.
4. POUR whiskey, sugar syrup and hot coffee into pre-warmed glass and briefly stir.
5. FLOAT heated and aerated cream over the back of a warmed spoon.
Garnish: Dust with freshly grated nutmeg and/or float 3 coffee beans

Name: Jabberwock
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Kina aromatised wine', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jerezana Cocktail
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Manzanilla sherry', '5⁄6 shot Amontillado sherry', '5⁄12 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '6 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jersey Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Applejack brandy bottled-in-bond (50% alc./vol)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Journey of Brothers
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 dash Celery bitters', '3 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water and briefly stir.

Name: Julep (Generic Name)
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint leaves with spirit in base of shaker (just enough to bruise). (At this stage, if time allows, you should refrigerate the shaker, mint and spirit, and the glass in which the drink is to be served, for at least two hours.) Add other ingredients to shaker, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top with more crushed ice to fill glass and churn again. Serve with straws.

Name: La Perla
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '3⁄4 shot Poire William liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lachlan's Antiscorbutic
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄12 shot Pickled cucumber/gherkin brine/vinegar']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Let's Go Bananas
Ingredients: ['3 slice Banana (preferably overripe)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄12 shot Ricard Pastis', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: MUDDLE banana with rum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Livorno Punch (Ponce alla Livornese)
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '1⁄6 shot Boiling water', '1 fresh Lemon peel', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
Making:
1. Place thick-cut coin-sized lemon zest in base of glass and cover with sugar.
2. Ideally, use the steam wand of a coffee machine to steam and moisten sugar while also warming glass (alternatively, add a splash of boiling water).
3. MUDDLE lemon and sugar in base of glass (with small muddler).
4. POUR rum into glass.
5. TOP with a shot of espresso dispensed straight into your cocktail from the machine.

Name: Loaded Pistol
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Liquore Strega', "4 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Love On Sale
Ingredients: ['1 shot Unaged rye spirit', '2⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: M & M
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Montenegro amaro', '1 1⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Macunaíma
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Cachaça', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice).

Name: Mai Tai (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Pineapple rum', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄12 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Half lime shell, mint sprig and fruit stick (skewered pineapple cubes and Luxardo Maraschino cherry)

Name: Malty Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "4 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Chilled olive or lemon zest twist

Name: Man O' War
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Manhattan (Petite Serve)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Manhattan (Sweet)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry

Name: Manhattan Transfer
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Maple Rum Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '5⁄12 shot Maple syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Margarita (straight-up)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Marigny
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Martinez (London spec. with genever)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Martinez (with Old Tom gin)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Old Tom gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: McKinley's Delight
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mex Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Americano Bianco']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mexican in Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', "3 dash Bob's Lavender Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Midnight Stinger
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Fernet liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Millionaire's Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with Champagne.

Name: Mint Julep Cocktail
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into julep cup half-filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top up the cup with more crushed ice and CHURN again. Repeat this process so the drink fills the cup and frost forms on the outside.
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet dusted with icing sugar

Name: Mizuwari
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", 'Top up with Chilled water']
Making: Fill glass with ice and STIR until water forms in base of glass. Add more ice and continue stirring to cool glass. STRAIN water from glass, pour whisky into glass and top with ice to brim of glass. STIR whisky and ice, adding more ice to keep ice level with brim. Lastly, add water and briefly stir some more.

Name: Mojito Cocktail
Ingredients: ['14 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: ADD first 4 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice. TOP with splash of soda, briefly stir and serve.

Name: Monkey Wrench (with ratchet)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Monkey 47 gin', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Pamplemousse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', "4 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Naked & Famous
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Navy Grog
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice (or 6 cubes ice).

Name: Negroni Spumante
Ingredients: ['1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', 'Top up with Spumante dry sparkling wine']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into ice-filled glass. TOP with spumante and lightly STIR.

Name: Nelson's Blood No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: New Orleans Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄4 shot Old Tom gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (2 sugar to 1 water)", '1⁄6 shot Orange flower/blossom water', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making:
1. Vigorously SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and pour back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass). TOP with soda from siphon.

ALTERNATIVELY, 2. Flash BLEND first seven ingredients without ice (to emulsify mix). Then pour contents of blender into shaker and SHAKE with ice. Strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass) and TOP with soda from siphon.

Name: Nuclear Banana Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 shot White overproof rum', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', "2⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 9oz scoop crushed ice.
Garnish: Banana slice & star anise on rim with mint sprig bouquet & straws

Name: Obligatory Brooklyn
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄3 shot Amaro Nonino Quintessentia', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Clementi China Antico Elixir', '1⁄6 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Old Cuban Highball
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Old Fashioned Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', "9 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Old Friend
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Old Gal
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Old Gran's Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄3 shot Apple sugar syrup', '2 1⁄2 shot Kombucha']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Orange Brulée
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Double cream / heavy cream']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT thin layer of cream evenly over drink.
Garnish: Dust with chocolate powder or better with freshly grated nutmeg

Name: Original Tequila Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '3 1⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water (optional)']
Making: POUR first 5 ingredients into glass and fill with ice. TOP with soda water.

Name: Out to Sea
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 1⁄3 shot Cold brew coffee', "2⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '3 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Oye Mi Canto (Hear My Song)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila (infused with tamarind)', '2 shot Rosato/rosé vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making:
To make the tequila and tamarind infusion: Infuse 250 gram (9oz) of chopped tamarind flesh in 70cl/75cl blanco tequila for 2 days in a vacuum-sealed bag (or 2 weeks in a Kilner jar). Strain through a 100-micron Superbag and rebottle ready for use.

To make the cocktail: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: White edible flowers pegged to rim

Name: Palo Negro
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Palo cortado sherry', '1⁄3 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Paper Plane
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Amaro Nonino Quintessentia', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Perfect Summit Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Muscat (Rutherglen) wine', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Pina Colada (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '3 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "3⁄4 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with half scoop crushed ice and serve with paper straws.
Garnish: Parasol, pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Pineapple & Mint Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '4 cube Pineapple (fresh)', '2 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add pineapple and mint and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Pineapple Daiquiri (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Pineapple rum', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pineapple Martini (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 drop Tiki bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pink Frozen Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Agave syrup']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with half scoop crushed ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pisco Punch (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 dried Clove', '1 2⁄3 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE cloves in base of shaker. ADD next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Polish Martini
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Bison grass vodka', '3⁄4 shot Krupnik spiced honey liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Port of Spain (by Dominic Alling)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Portobello Star Manhattan (Perfect)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', "1 dash Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Preakness Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Psychopathia Sexualis
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Palo cortado sherry', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
