Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Punch (Generic Name)
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Freshly squeezed lemon or lime juice', "1 1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄4 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', '3 shot Fruit juice or water', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Pyramid Punch
Ingredients: ['2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄24 shot Pimento dram liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (If pimento dram is not available then (in place of) MUDDLE two cloves in the base of the shaker before adding other ingredients and shaking with ice).

Name: Queen Elizabeth
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Queen's Jubilee Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Raisin' Cane
Ingredients: ['2 shot Pineau des Charentes rouge', '1⁄2 shot Martinique V.S.O.P rum', '1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1 dash Xocolatl mole bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ramos Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Old Tom gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄24 shot Orange flower/blossom water', '3 drop Vanilla extract (optional)', '3⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 8 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and slowly pour 2/3rds of the contents of the shaker from a higher than normal height into a chilled empty glass (no ice in glass) while simultaneously pouring soda with your other hand. The cocktail and soda should form a single stream of liquid falling into the glass.

As when pouring a Guinness, to achieve a perfect head on a Ramos Gin Fizz, the cocktail should be left to settle for at least a minute before topping off with what remains in the shaker. Ideally, during the settling period, the glass should be placed in a glass froster/fridge/freezer. As the final contents of the shaker are poured into the glass so the head should rise like a souffle.

Some Ramos Gin Fizz recipes, and indeed Henry Charles Ramos' original recipe, call for old tom gin (also our preference), in which case you may need to reduce the amount of sugar syrup depending on your old tom, personal tastes and citrus fruit.
Garnish: Quarter orange wheel on rim (& optional mint sprig)

Name: Red Grape Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '8 fresh Red grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add grapes and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Reverse Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist

Name: Rosalia Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Rose sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled salt-rimmed glass.
Garnish: Lemon juice & Himalayan pink salt rim

Name: Royal Bermuda Yacht Club Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Royal Mojito
Ingredients: ['14 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: Add first 4 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice. TOP with champagne and serve.

Name: Ruby
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Grapefruit juice (ruby red)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rude Gypsy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rum Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄3 shot White overproof rum', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Rum Swizzle
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', "2⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick (or churn with a barspoon). Add more crushed ice to fill and SWIZZLE some more. Serve with straws.

Name: San Francisco (Café Royal)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '5⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sandy The Showgirl
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', "8 drop Bob's Lavender Bitters", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Satan's Whiskers (Straight)
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sazerac Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 1⁄3 shot Chilled water', '2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making:
1. POUR absinthe into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, TOP with water, and leave to stand.
2. THROW other ingredients with ice and set aside.
3. STRAIN contents of the old-fashioned glass into a chilled shot glass to be served as an optional extra alongside the main event.
4. STRAIN contents of shaker into the absinthe rinsed old-fashioned glass.
5. Enjoy a delicious Sazerac with an absinthe shot served alongside.

Name: Scotch Sour
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice. Strain back into shaker and DRY SHAKE (without ice). Strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sheroni
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Amontillado sherry', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']

Name: Silk Stocking Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Simon Says
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', "1⁄6 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄6 shot Bigallet Genepi Grand Tetras', '1⁄6 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Smoky Cokey
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "4 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters", '3 1⁄2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Special Brew Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄4 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 1⁄4 shot Sake', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sunray
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot Kina aromatised wine', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sunset Vibes
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water', '1⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass and then add ice to fill. TOP with tonic water and finish with a FLOAT of mezcal.

Name: Suzie Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sweet Grape Caipirinha (Caipirinha D'uva)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '6 fresh Red grapes (seedless)', '3⁄4 shot Sauternes dessert wine', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add red grapes and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) and Sauternes into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Sweet Liberty's Sherry Cobbler
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Takumi's Aviation

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Te Anaka
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Honey water (1:1)', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.

Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.

Name: Tequila Alexander
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tequila Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.7)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "2 dash Bob's Lavender Bitters", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.

Making: SHAKE all ingredient with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The JP Sazerac

Name: The Prelude

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Tuxedo Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Old Tom gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄24 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tuxedo No. 2 (Flora Bar's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 1⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '4 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: RINSE glass with absinthe and discard excess. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into absinthe rinsed chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Twentieth Century
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ultima Palabra
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Velasco and Sand
Ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Vesper Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄6 shot Kina aromatised wine', '1⁄6 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Vieux Carré Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Walter's Waltz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Ginseng aperitif', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Dry cider']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cider and briefly stir.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & apricot wedge/dried apricot half

Name: Warday's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Well Oiled Mai Tai
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Half lime shell, Luxardo Maraschino cherry, pineapple cube & mint sprigs bouquet

Name: When The Smoke Cleared
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄4 shot Ginger syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (Also works well strainer over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Whiskey Sour (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: White Rob Roy
Ingredients: ["1 2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Winter
Ingredients: ['2 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yamabuki
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Japanese blended whisky', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zombie
Ingredients: ['1 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Overproof aged rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄24 shot Pernod anise', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.

Name: 'Two Guns' Miller
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Pamplemousse liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1 dash Xocolatl mole bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: 100 Year Old Cigar
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: RINSE chilled glass with absinthe and set to one side. STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-prepared glass.

Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: 19th Century
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Rouge', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: 49th Parallel
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: 75 Cocktail (MacElhone's 1926 recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: A Lucky Roman Americano
Ingredients: ['1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Cinzano 1757 Rosso vermouth', '1 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', "2 dash Bob's Peppermint Bitters", 'Top up with *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
THROW first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with rosemary soda.

Special ingredient #1: Rosemary soda

Name: A Rose By Any Other Name
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Rose petal liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Crème de violette liqueur', "3 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Turkish Delight & grate dark chocolate over drink

Name: Absinthe Makes The Heart Grow Fonder
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Absinthe Spider Highball
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '4 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Absolute Gangster
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄12 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Acapulco No.2
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Liquore Strega', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Accoutrement
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Liquore Strega', '1⁄2 shot Créole Shrubb liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Torrone Stregga Ricoperto di Cioccolato across rim (or brandied cherries)

Name: Ace Of Clubs Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Across the Pacific
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Lime wheel slice & freshly grated nutmeg

Name: Ad Astra
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. (Ideally, use strained lemon juice. Otherwise, fine strain cocktail when pouring.)
Garnish: Float one drop of castor oil

Name: Adonis
Ingredients: ['2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Adriatique Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Affogato Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with three cubes ice.

Name: After Supper
Ingredients: ['1 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Aigua de València
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Cava sparkling wine (chilled)']
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass that has first been charged with Cava.

Name: Aku Aku
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '10 fresh Mint leaves']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with a small scoop of crushed ice and fine strain into glass (push through sieve using back of a bar spoon).
Garnish: Pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino cherry and mint sprig

Name: Alaska (Straub's 1914 recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Old Tom gin', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all the ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Alcatraz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '3⁄4 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', "8 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Alexander The Great
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Algeria
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Algonquin
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: All Jacked Up
Ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Allegheny
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Almond Atholl Brose
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', "1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Oat milk / oatmeal water', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄3 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: STIR honey with Scotch in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Almond Old Fashioned (bourbon based)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Almond Old Fashioned (tequila based)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Amaretto Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Spray aromatic bitters over foaming cocktail from atomiser and then garnish with lemon & cherry sail (lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick)

Name: Amaretto Sour (by Jeffrey Morgenthaler)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and pour into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherries on stick.

Name: Amaroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Angostura di Amaro', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: POUR all ingredients into chilled ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Amber Nectar
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '2 spoon Honey', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR honey with Scotch in base of shaker until honey dissolves. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Amber Negroni (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Luxardo Bitter Bianco liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly STIR.

Name: Amber Room
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Amber Room #2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth (originally Ambre)', '1⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ambrosio Cup
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '3⁄4 shot Cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Bison grass vodka', '3⁄4 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda water.

Name: American Beauty (by David Embury)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄6 shot Claret red wine']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with CRUSHED ICE and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT red wine on surface of cocktail.
Garnish: Float mint leaf or red rose petal

Name: American Trilogy
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Applejack brandy bottled-in-bond (50% alc./vol)', '5⁄6 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Americano
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Ampersand Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Old Tom gin', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ancient Mariner
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Scored lime wedge & mint sprig bouquet

Name: Andean Dusk cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Red grapes (seedless)', '1 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Rosé champagne']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Garnish: Drop cold red grape into drink

Name: Añejo Almond Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Anejo Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass charged with half ginger beer. TOP with rest of ginger beer.

Name: Angel Face
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist, or apple wedge on rim, or float (dehydrated) apple slice

Name: Angel's Draft
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '3 fresh Mint leaves', '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) to emulsify and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Angel's Share No.1
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR heaped spoon of orange marmalade with cognac in base of shaker until marmalade dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Angel's Share No.2
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Nocello walnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port']
Making: POUR the Chartreuse into glass and coat the inside of the glass with the liqueur by tilting and rotating it. DISCARD excess liqueur. Carefully set the liqueur on the inside of the glass alight and allow it to BURN for a few seconds. Extinguish flame by placing a saucer over the glass, add other ingredients and SWIRL to mix. Beware of hot glass rim.

Name: Angels’ Advocate
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Bob's Cardamom bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (cut to be cross-shaped)

Name: Anita
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Cachaça (aged 3+ years)', '2⁄3 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Macadamia nut syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Añogo
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1 2⁄3 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Anonymous (But Assertive) Sour
Ingredients: ['1 shot Horse with No Name habanero bourbon', '2⁄3 shot Abasolo Mexican Corn Whisky', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Ante
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Anurka
Ingredients: ['1 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '1 shot Dry cider']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with cider.

Name: Anything Else
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably block ice). TOP up with beer.

Name: Apairoteef
Ingredients: ['1 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (without ice). (Note the sparkling wine should be flat.)

*Special ingredient #1 = Cardamom & Pear Shrub made as follows:
400ml Merlet pare
300ml Gewürztraminer, Germain.
7g Cardamom pods
5ml Vanilla curd
75ml White balsamic
10g Citric acid
10g Tartaric acid
150g Caster sugar
100g Water
Blend for 5 minutes and super strain.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Confectionery dentures dropped into glass

Name: Aperol Spritz / Aperitivo Spritz
Ingredients: ['3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Apóstol
Ingredients: ['3 pinch Cinnamon powder', '1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao']
Making: FLAME cinnamon powder on a suitable surface and upend snifter glass over smoking cinnamon and leave to capture smoke while mixing ingredients. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into cinnamon smoked glass.

Name: Appease the Cheese
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Abasolo Mexican Corn Whisky']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Blue cheese stuffed pitted green olive

Name: Apple Black Royal
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Sour apple liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', 'Top up with Rosé champagne']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Apple Blossom Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Apple wedge on rim or float dehydrated apple slice

Name: Apple Brandy Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Apple Business
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Apple Cart
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur (optional)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Optional sugar rim with apple wedge on rim or float dehydrated apple slice

Name: Apple Fool
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Grapefruit juice (ruby red)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Apple Jack Rabbit (Savoy)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Apple Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄6 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '5⁄12 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Apple wedge, apple fan or dehydrated apple slice

Name: Apple Strudel
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Apples to Oranges Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3 dash Combier Elixir']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Appletini (Sour Apple Martini)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Sour apple liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float thin apple slice/dehydrated apple slice or Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Apricot Cosmo
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 spoon Apricot jam (preserve)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR apricot preserve with vodka until preserve dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Apricot Julep
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Fresh or tinned apricot', '12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Abricot du Roussillon liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE apricot in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into cup half filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top up with more crushed ice and CHURN again. Repeat this process so the drink fills the cup and frost forms on the outside.
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet & wedge fresh apricot when in season

Name: Apricot Mango Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Mango purée', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass.

Name: Archibald's Last Memory Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice).

Name: Aristotle cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Birch water', "4 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters"]
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Army & Navy
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Around The World
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1⁄3 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "5⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Around The World With A Negroni
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Pink pepper around glass rim and garnish with a slice of orange and complete with a little wooden spoon with spheres of coffee-flavoured tequila inside.

Name: Art de Vivre (Art of Living)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Artillery
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Artist's Special Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Groseille (redcurrant) syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Astral Plane
Ingredients: ['1 shot Dry white port', '2⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass while pouring soda.

Name: Atracción Ahumado Margarita
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', "1⁄3 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lime juice, smoked salt & Tajin seasoning rim

Name: Autumn Leaves
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Liquore Strega', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Autumn Punch
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄4 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh into shaker. Add vodka, passion fruit syrup, pear and lemon juice, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Aventura
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Aviation Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (& optional sugar rim)

Name: Aviazione
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine into chilled glass.

Name: Azalea Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bacardi Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Back to Basics Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Aquafaba (chickpea water)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Orange and red wine syrup - cube 1 orange, adding half the peel from a 2nd orange and soak in 300g sugar for up to 1.5 hours. Simmer with 330 ml red wine (Merlot) until the alcohol evaporates (around 10 mins).

Name: Bad Name
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Chamomile liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄4 shot Vermouth di Torino']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bahama Mama
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '1⁄4 shot Overproof aged rum', '1⁄4 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Coconut liqueur (under 35% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino cherry & mint sprigs bouquet

Name: Bahamas Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '3⁄4 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bajan Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (optional)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bajito
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Mint leaves', '6 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint and basil in glass just enough to bruise. Add rum, sugar and lime juice. Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Add more crushed ice and CHURN some more. Continue adding crushed ice and churning until glass is full.

Name: Bali Rum Trader
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '5⁄6 shot Pisang Ambon green banana liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float banana chip or peg to rim

Name: Baltimore Bang
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange slice wheel and Luxardo maraschino cherry sail

Name: Bamboo Cocktail (Boothby's 1908 recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & olive - preferably pimiento-stuffed ('pimola' olive)

Name: Bamboo Cocktail (Stuart's 1904 recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Fino sherry', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bamboo Cocktail (with Palo Cortado Sherry)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Palo cortado sherry', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ban-hattan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Banana (yellow) sugar syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dehydrated banana slice pegged to rim

Name: Banana Bliss
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Oloroso sherry', "4 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Boulevardier
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) and dried banana chip

Name: Banana Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.
Garnish: Banana chunk on rim (cut garnish from centre of banana and place the rest in the blender to make the drink)

Name: Banana Daiquiri (shaken)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Rumhattan
Ingredients: ['1 shot Banana rum', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float dehydrated banana chip or peg to rim

Name: Banana so Smoothie (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['7 spoon Greek yogurt', '3 spoon Honey', '1 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)', '3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve immediately with straws.

Name: Banana Split
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', "2 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters", "2 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", '3⁄4 shot Banana tea', '1⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Shake a sealed container of cream and carefully POUR over the back of a spoon to form a small white spot floating in the centre of the drink.
Garnish: Lightly dust surface of drink with chocolate powder & banana chunk on rim

Name: Banana Stand
Ingredients: ['1 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄12 shot Pimento dram liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Originally presented in a banana leaf-wrapped glass bound with brown string but we'd settle for just the cinnamon stick stirrer.

Name: Bananarac
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR absinthe into chilled glass and swirl to coat (rinse) inside and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into absinthe-rinsed glass (without ice).

Name: Banker's Lunch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Banoffee Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Toffee liqueur', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Barracuda
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Barribault
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Island single malt Scotch whisky', '3⁄4 shot Averna Amaro', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Basil Bramble Sling
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add rest of ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Serve with straws.

Name: Basil Gimlet
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Batanga
Ingredients: ['1 pinch Salt', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3 1⁄2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: STIR salt with lime juice in base of glass to dissolve salt. Add ice and other ingredients and briefly stir.

Name: Batida Rosa
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: POUR soda water into ice-filled glass. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled and soda-charged glass.

Name: Bay Ridge
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄4 shot La Vieille Prune plum brandy', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Beat Dis
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', "1⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", "1⁄12 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime (fresh)', '1⁄3 shot Beetroot juice', "4 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bebbo Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Blood orange juice']
Making: STIR honey with lemon juice in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bee's Knees
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Alternatively, if making with raw honey (rather than syrup), STIR 4 spoons honey with 22.5ml (¾oz) lemon juice and 10ml (⅓oz) orange juice in base of shaker until honey is dissolved. Add 60ml (2oz gin), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bee's Tease
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Lapsang Souchong tea (cold)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Beelzebub
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Lucano amaro', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Beginning of the End
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄3 shot Oloroso sherry']
Making: FLAME an orange zest twist into empty glass to line the inside with smoky oils. Then STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into the pre-prepared glass.

Name: Belafonte
Ingredients: ['1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Dry white port', '3 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bellini (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Peach purée', '1⁄3 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass charged with the prosecco.

Name: Bending Blades cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Pamplemousse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bennett Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Old Tom gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Benny Blanco
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', "1⁄3 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Blood orange Horse's Neck zest twist or slice wheel

Name: Bensonhurst
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bergamot Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bergamot Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Oak aged gin', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Italicus liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Bergamot zest twist (expressed & discarded & lemon leaf (or orange slice)

Name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', "3⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR ingredients into glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick or CHURN (stir) with a bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and repeat. Serve with straws.

Name: Bernice
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Mint leaf pegged to rim or float very tip of mint sprig

Name: Berry Blast (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Passion fruit syrup', '2 shot Black tea (cold)', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Berry Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 fresh Blackberries', '3 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '1 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add mixed berries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz highball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Bertram's Cap
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '5⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', "4 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Betsy Ross
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Between The Sheets
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Between The Sheets (Wondrich's formula)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bicicletta Spritz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 1⁄3 shot Pinot Grigio white wine', '1 1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: POUR all ingredients into an ice-filled glass. If poured in the following order there should be no need to stir.

Name: Big Boss
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', "4 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Big Fish
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄12 shot Sherry vinegar']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Earl Grey syrup made with 20g Dilmah Earl Grey tea, 1l boiling water and 600g caster sugar.
Garnish: Maraschino cherry on cocktail stick & 2 bay leaves

Name: Big Mac
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1 shot Green ginger wine', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Biggles Aviation
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄24 shot Crème de violette liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Biggles Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bijou (by Jamie Gordon)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bijou Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & skewered Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Bijou Cocktail (inspired by Lawlor's 1895 recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bird of Paradise
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bird of Paradise Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Old Tom gin', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '3 drop Orange flower/blossom water', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and slowly pour 2/3rds of the contents of the shaker from a higher than normal height into a chilled empty glass (no ice in glass) while simultaneously pouring soda with your other hand. The cocktail and soda should form a single stream of liquid falling into the glass.

As when pouring a Guinness, to achieve a perfect head on a fizz, the cocktail should be left to settle for at least a minute before topping off with what remains in the shaker. Ideally, during the settling period, the glass should be placed in a glass froster/fridge/freezer. As the final contents of the shaker are poured into the glass so the head should rise like a souffle.

Name: Bitches' Brew cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist and Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Bitter Giuseppe
Ingredients: ['1 twist Lemon peel', '2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '6 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SPRAY oils from lemon zest twist into stirring glass and drop zest into glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (in addition to twist used in the recipe)

Name: Bitter in Brazil
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 spoon Fernet liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably large chunk of block ice).

Name: Black Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Diamond
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Espresso
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄6 shot Kuromitsu Japanese brown sugar syrup', "6 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Gold
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Ginseng aperitif', '1 spoon Black truffle honey']
Making: STIR all ingredients in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add ice, SHAKE and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: grapefruit zest twist (digarded), slice truffle & ginseng

Name: Black Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Averna Amaro', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Mesa
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Black Rose
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into (empty - no ice) chilled glass.

Name: Blackberry Fruitini
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Blackberries', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker, add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blackberry Martini
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Blackberries', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker, add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blackthorn (English)
