Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blackthorn (Irish)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "2 dash Boker's bitters", '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Dash absinthe into surface of drink and then stroke barspoon once through drink (rather than stir in).

Name: Blackthorn No.2 (Homeboy's)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Tawny port', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blimey
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Blackberries', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with a cut-down paper straw.
Garnish: Fresh blackberry sat heroically atop crushed ice summit (it survived the muddler to reach its peak)

Name: Bling! Bling!
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add vodka, lime and sugar, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Blinker (Hawksmoor's Riff)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blood Orange Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Blood orange juice']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blood Orange Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Half salt rim and blood orange slice

Name: Blood Sage
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Sage leaves (torn)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Blood orange juice', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bloody Blood & Sand
Ingredients: ["3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Blood orange juice']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bloody Bronx Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Blood orange juice']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dehydrated blood orange slice or orange zest twist

Name: Bloody Mary (Modern Recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '4 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce', '2 grind Black pepper', '1 pinch Celery salt']
Making: ROLL rather than shake all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Use double frozen ice freshly from freezer to fill glass.)

Name: Bloody Mary (no added sugar & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3 1⁄2 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '2 pinch Celery salt', '3 grind Black pepper', '10 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce (optional)']
Making: ROLL (rotate) all ingredients with ice in shaker (rather than shake) and strain into ice-filled glass. Use ice freshly from freezer to fill glass (not ice directly from ice-machine) to avoid unwanted dilution from melting ice.
Garnish: Spiked cocktail onion, cherry tomato and lemon wedge with celery stick stirrer (optional salt & pepper rim)

Name: Bloody Negroni
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Blood orange juice']
Making: Briefly STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Blue Blazer
Ingredients: ["4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '4 shot Boiling water', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)']
Making:
You will need a pair of large silver-plated tankards (blazer mugs) with handles. Preheat these with boiling water and warm the whisky. POUR the whisky into one tankard and fresh boiling water into the other. Ignite the whisky using a long match and while still blazing pour the whisky into the other tankard. Then mix ingredients by pouring them from one tankard to the other. The foolhardy increase the distance between the tankards as they pour, thus creating a spectacular long blue flame between the two. Extinguish flame by covering flaming tankard with base of the other tankard, pour into glass and sweeten to taste by stirring in powdered sugar.

WARNING - please practice with water first to perfect your method. Stand on a non-flammable floor and have suitable fire-fighting equipment nearby. The following recipe makes two drinks.

Name: Blue Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Express coin-sized orange zest twist and float in the centre of cocktail

Name: Blueberry Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '10 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add blueberries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz highball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Bobby Burns cocktail (Craddock's recipe)
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & a slice of shortbread

Name: Bobby Burns cocktail (Crockett's recipe)
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass. TOP with water and leave to stand. Separately STIR Scotch, vermouth and bitters with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and fill with fresh ice. STRAIN contents of mixing glass into ice-filled absinthe-coated glass.

Name: Bobby Burns cocktail (Embury's recipe)
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Drambuie liqueur', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass

Name: Bohemian Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Krupnik spiced honey liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2 1⁄2 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bohemian Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Boilermaker
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 pint Pilsner lager']
Making: POUR whiskey to brim of shot glass and then manoeuvre shot glass so it is held tight up against the inside base of an upturned Boston glass. Then quickly flip the Boston glass over so that the bourbon is trapped in the now upside-down shot glass. Now pour beer into Boston glass over the whiskey-filled shot glass.

Name: Bon Vivant's Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Jade Perique La Veritable Liqueur de Tabac', '1⁄6 shot Americano Bianco', '1 dash Teapot bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Mist with spray of Islay single malt (& optional Cigarillo across the rim)

Name: Bonaparte cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1 1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur']
Making: POUR chilled soda water into ice-filled glass. Add freshly brewed hot espresso coffee so it layers on the sparkling water. Lastly pour the Mandarin Napoléon liqueur (the tasty part of the Bonaparte) which will sink through the coffee layer, pulling the drink together while leaving the coffee's crema on the surface.

Name: Bonsai
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '5⁄6 shot Akashi-Tai Shiraume Ginjo Umeshu', "1⁄2 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Palo cortado sherry', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Boozy Suzie
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Pink grapefruit zest twist (discarded) & 3 spots of Peychaud's bitters drawn through foamy head

Name: Boston Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Boulevardier Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bourbon Crusta
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-prepared glass.
Garnish: Find a lemon which fits into a small wineglass tightly enough to act as a watertight extension to the glass. Cut off both ends of the fruit and carefully remove the pulp to leave a barrel-shaped shell of skin. Place in the top of the glass. Wet the edge of the glass and exposed fruit shell with sugar syrup and dip in caster sugar to frost the edge of both peel and glass. Leave for a couple of hours to form a hard crust.

Name: Bourbon Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.15)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bourbon whiskey', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Bourbon Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2 1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', "4 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bourbon Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into Ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Bourbon Peach Tea
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Brewed cold black breakfast tea']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bouteiller
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄12 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bramble
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5⁄12 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Top with more crushed ice and compact ice to form a volcano-shaped mound. DRIZZLE liqueur over this mound to create a 'bleeding' effect in the glass. Serve with short sustainable straws.
Garnish: Blackberry & lemon slice dusted with icing sugar

Name: Brandy Alexander
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '5⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brandy Crusta
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-prepared glass.
Garnish: Some merely shove a wide long piece of lemon peel around the inside of the glass rim, leaving the drinker to push the peel down into the glass in order to sip from the drink. Instead I prefer the peel to become a watertight extension to the glass. Find a lemon which fits snugly in the top of a small wine, flute or sour glass. Cut off both ends of the fruit and carefully remove the pulp to leave a barrel-shaped shell of skin. Place in the top of the glass. Wet the edge of the glass and exposed fruit shell with sugar syrup and dip in caster sugar to frost the edge of both peel and glass. Leave for a couple of hours to form a hard crust that helps secure the peel.

Name: Brandy Daisy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Soda from siphon']
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with a splash of soda and briefly stir.

Name: Brandy Fix
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Brandy Flip
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brandy Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.3)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass. Half fill glass with ice. Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice. Finish with rest of garnish.
Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Brandy Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brandy Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 5⁄6 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Don't dry shake a Milk Punch as this produces something redolent of an Egg Nog.)

Name: Brandy Old Fashioned (Wisconsin-style)
Ingredients: ['1 wedge Orange (fresh fruit)', '1 whole Maraschino cherry (from jar in syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
Making: MUDDLE first 4 ingredients in base of glass. Add brandy and 6oz scoop crushed ice.
Garnish: Orange wheel slice & Luxardo maraschino cherry sail

Name: Brandy Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Brasil
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cachaça', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Brass Rail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Flamed orange zest twist (discarded) & light dusting of ground cinnamon on surface of drink

Name: Brazil 66 cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Brazuca Remedy
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '2⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & float basil leaf

Name: Breakfast in Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR marmalade with bourbon to dissolve marmalade. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Breakfast Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Orange marmalade', '1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Agave syrup']
Making: STIR marmalade with tequila in base of shaker until it dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Quarter orange slice wheel on rim

Name: Bridal
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bridal Suite
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bronx
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brooklyn Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brooklyn Godfather
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brooklyn Heights
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Meletti amaro', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: POUR Italian red bitter liqueur into chilled/frozen glass and turn to coat inside of glass. Discard excess and set glass aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into red bitter liqueur-rinsed glass.

Name: Bruised Pomegranate
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Brunswick
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3⁄4 shot Claret red wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT claret wine on drink.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Bubo Bubo
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bucket List
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Bigallet Genepi Grand Tetras', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Buckeye
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Burning Bright
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR lime and grapefruit juices with sugar in base of shaker until sugar is dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Burnt Fuselage
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (or orange zest twist)

Name: Burnt Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bushwick
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Amer Picon']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Butler's Tipple
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Buttercup
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Caramel Toffee liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: The original recipe calls for a lemon zest twist but the lemon oils overpower the butterscotch. So if you use a slither of lemon skin on which to nestle a Werther's Original, don't express the lemon's oils over the drink. WARNING: Don't be tempted to use buttercup flowers as they are poisonous. They are also poisonous when eaten by livestock but their acrid taste and the blistering of the mouth they cause mean that animals don't tend to eat them. Interestingly, the toxins degrade when dried, so hay containing dried buttercups is safe for animals to eat.

Name: Byculla
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '2⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Slice fresh ginger or candied ginger on rim

Name: Byrrh Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Canadian blended whisky', '1 1⁄3 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 1⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1 dash Peach bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Byrrh Special
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 1⁄2 shot Old Tom gin']
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: C'est la Vie (That's Life)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cactus Banger
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cadáver Reviver
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cajun Nail
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1 shot Drambuie liqueur', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and leave to stand. Separately STIR whiskey, Drambuie and bitters with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and STRAIN stirred drink into empty absinthe-coated glass.

Name: Call me Ish
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Spanish brandy', '1 shot Meletti amaro', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Call Me Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Calvados & Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)', '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Cameo Kirby
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Skewered raspberry or lime wedge on rim

Name: Canadian Tuxedo
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro', '1 1⁄2 shot Canadian rye whisky', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably chunk of block ice).

Name: Canary Flip
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '1 2⁄3 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Caneflower cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cannonball
Ingredients: ['2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass/pot filled with crushed ice.
Glass: Cantaritos clay pot or Collins glass
Garnish: Quarter pineapple slice wheel & lime slice wheel. Serve with a straw.

Name: Cantinero Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '5⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Cardamom Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['3 dried Green cardamom pods', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Bob's Cardamom bitters", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: Cut zest from your lime for garnish prior to squeezing for juice. MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lime zest twist (discarded) & lime wedge on rim

Name: Caribbean Sazerac
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot White overproof rum', '1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄6 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄12 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: POUR overproof rum into frozen glass, swirl to coat inside and discard excess. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and strain into rinsed glass.

Name: Carnaghino
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Dark chocolate liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pistachio liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably block ice).

Name: Carousel
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 pinch Salt']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Dulce de leche (30ml is approx. 5 bar spoons)
Garnish: Chocolate powder or melted dark chocolate rim

Name: Casa Savoia Boulevardier
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '5⁄6 shot Bourbon whiskey']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or junk of block ice).

Name: Casa Savoia Garibaldi
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Squeeze orange juice using pillar or elbow press and fine strain to remove any flesh. BLEND the freshly squeezed juice at high speed (without ice) to make "fluffy". POUR Americano and half of the orange juice into glass over 2 cubes of ice and STIR. Fill glass with more ice (3 cubes) and TOP up with rest of fluffy orange juice.

Name: Casa Savoia Spritz
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '1 2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Casino
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Old Tom gin', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Castle Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "9 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with pebble ice. Float Peychaud's on drink.

Name: Catalizador
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1 1⁄6 shot Camomile tea syrup (2:1)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ce Soir (This Evening)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '5⁄12 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Celebration
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Celebration (by Grzegorz Nowicki)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making:
STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass TOP with prosecco.

*Special ingredient #1: Pineapple cordial made by blending 900g of pineapple flesh with 450g of simple syrup (1:1.5) and straining through a cheesecloth; add 4g tartaric acid.

Name: Celery Gimlet No.2
Ingredients: ['6 inch Celery stick (fresh) (chopped)', '1 pinch Celery salt', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot White wine vinegar (Chardonnay)', '2 dash Celery bitters']
Making: MUDDLE celery with salt in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Celery Gin Sour
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Bigallet Genepi Grand Tetras', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Celery saccharum (celery syrup)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 dash Celery bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lime zest twist (discarded) & rest celery stick across rim with a light dusting of celery salt

Name: Celery Gringo
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄4 shot Manzanilla sherry', '5⁄12 shot Celery saccharum (celery syrup)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Rest celery stick across rim with a light dusting of celery salt

Name: Celery Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄12 shot Celery bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Celery Wine
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Grüner Veltliner dry white wine', '1⁄3 shot Celery saccharum (celery syrup)', '1⁄12 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Rest celery stick across rim with a light dusting of celery salt

Name: Champagne Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 cube Sugar cube', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3 1⁄3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: COAT sugar cube with bitters and drop into glass. POUR chilled cognac over soaked cube, then TOP with champagne.

Name: Champagne Julep
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice. Add champagne and more to shaker, then throw twice before straining into julep tin filled with crushed ice. Serve with a metal straw.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & mint sprigs dusted with icing sugar

Name: Champagne Piña Colada
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 scoop Coconut sorbet', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: BLEND first 6 ingredients with 4oz scoop of crushed ice (including 15ml/ ½oz champagne) and pour into chilled glass which has been pre-charged with 45ml/ 1½oz of chilled champagne.

Name: Champagne Snowball

Name: Cherry Springer
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Luxardo Sour Cherry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Chicago Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1 shot Tawny port', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and slowly pour 2/3rds of the contents of the shaker from a higher than normal height into a chilled empty glass (no ice in glass) while simultaneously pouring soda with your other hand. The cocktail and soda should form a single stream of liquid falling into the glass.

As when pouring a Guinness, to achieve a perfect head on a fizz, the cocktail should be left to settle for at least a minute before topping off with what remains in the shaker. Ideally, during the settling period, the glass should be placed in a glass froster/fridge/freezer. As the final contents of the shaker are poured into the glass so the head should rise like a souffle.

Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Making: STIR jam with rum until jam dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Clarified Vodka Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['6 2⁄3 shot Brewed cold black breakfast tea', '6 2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'fresh Lemon peel', '6 2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'fresh Orange peel', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '6 2⁄3 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making:
Milk Punch Base pre-batch (scale-up recipe according to requirement)
1. POUR first 7 ingredients (with peels from the zests lemons & orange) into a sealable container and leave to infuse for 12 hours in a refrigerator.
2. Hot milk method HEAT milk until just starting to simmer and pour (while still simmering) into the container containing vodka tea and juice mix. The milk should curdle. Reseal and chill for at least 2-3 hours and up to 24 hours.
OR 2. Cold milk method POUR cold milk into the container containing vodka tea and juice mix. The milk should curdle. Reseal and chill for at least 2-3 hours and up to 24 hours.
3. Fine STRAIN mixture through cheesecloth or Superbag into a large jar or another container. Ideally, this should be in a refrigerator (I removed a shelf in ours) with the cheesecloth/bag hung over the jar.
4. Repeat step three, without removing curds from the filter or move to a finer strainer (e.g. from a 400-micron bag to a 100-micron bag) or coffee filter.
5. Stored in the refrigerator this will keep for a week (and potentially months) but be sure to sterilise containers etc.

Cocktail itself
STIR 50ml pre-prepared Milk Punch Base with 50ml vodka and 7.5ml sugar syrup and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
