Name: Corpse Reviver No.0824
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Liquore Strega', '5⁄6 shot Americano Bianco', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (not expressed) & spray of absinthe

Name: Corpse Reviver No.2 (Contemporary Recipe)
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Corpse Reviver No.2 (Duffy's recipe)
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Corpse Reviver No.2 (Savoy Recipe)
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)", '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cosmonaut
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 spoon Raspberry jam']
Making: STIR all ingredients in base of shaker to dissolve jam, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail (Dale DeGroff's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cosmopolitan cocktail (Toby Cecchini's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cotillion
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Count Mast
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Jägermeister', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Courtside
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE berries in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients (all but soda), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Cowboy Derby
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Horse with No Name habanero bourbon', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cowboy Hoof Martini
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients (including mint) with ice and syuper fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cox's Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum (infused with vanilla)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', "3 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Cox's apple ring (in memory of Jennings Cox)

Name: Crazy Crossing
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Creme Egg Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Coat rim of glass with chocolate – use a microwave to melt a few squares of dark chocolate in a saucer and then and dip the rim of the glass into the melted chocolate. Grate chocolate over surface of the drink and add half a Cadbury Creme Egg skewered on a stick. It's easier to cut the chocolate egg when straight from the refrigerator (a good test for how sharp your knife is). Spear the egg with a metal cocktail stick that has been heated in hot water.

Name: Creole Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Créole Shrubb liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Crowbar Hotel
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Horse with No Name habanero bourbon', '5⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Crystal Clear
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur', '2 shot Birch water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cuba Libre
Ingredients: ['2 wedge Lime (fresh)', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '4 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: MUDDLE lime wedges in base of glass. Add other ingredients, fill glass with ice and briefly stir.

Name: Cuban Liberal
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Amer Picon', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cucumber Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Bison grass vodka', '2 inch Cucumber (fresh) (chopped)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass.

Name: Cunningham
Ingredients: ["1 3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish: Flamed blood orange zest twist and Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Curiosity
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cyrano
Ingredients: ['1 shot Martinique agricole rhum vieux (extra aged)', '3⁄4 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄4 shot Pineapple rum', '1⁄6 shot Pineapple sugar syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Cut a large coin-sized lime zest twist disc thick cut so also has flesh of the fruit (Ti' Punch-style) and MUDDLE on base of glass. Add other ingredients, fill glass with ice and briefly stir.

Name: Czechmate
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 shot Pilsner lager']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with pilsner.

Name: D&B Shakerato
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri (no added sugar & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri Authentico
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri De Luxe
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri No.1 Natural (Countdown 3:2:1 formula)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri No.2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daiquiri Noir
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daisy Cutter Martini
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Daisy de Santiago
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. DRIZZLE a spoon of Chartreuse over top of drink.
Garnish: Seasonal berries & mint sprig dusted with icing sugar or lime wheel (preferably dehydrated)

Name: Dama Blanca
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Damn The Bloody Weather
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Blood orange juice', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Damn-the Weather
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dante's Old Fashioned Whiskey Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '5⁄6 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '2 dash Pimento bitters', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Dark Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Darkside
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Barolo Chinato', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Day Bell
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '1 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Day La Vie
Ingredients: ['1 shot Montenegro amaro', '2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice).

Name: De Rigueur
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dead Man's Handle
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Dust surface of drink with Tajín seasoning

Name: Death & Taxes
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Death Flip
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (2 sugar to 1 water)", '1 whole Egg (white & yolk)', '1 pinch Freshly grated nutmeg']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Death in the Afternoon
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR first 2 ingredients into chilled glass and STIR. TOP with champagne.
Garnish: Rose petal or lemon zest twist

Name: Death Star
Ingredients: ['1 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Liquore Strega', '1 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Defender Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Old Tom gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Crème Yvette liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Del Famoso (The Famous)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Delmarva Cocktail No.2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Delmonico
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Delmonico Special
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Demosthenes Club
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄6 shot Rose petal liqueur', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Denny & Eleni
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 shot Birch water', "8 drop Bob's Liquorice bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Derniere Minute (Last Minute)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Devil Smoked Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Claret red wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully FLOAT wine.

Name: Devil Woman
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot Lemon oleo saccharum', '1⁄6 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Hibiscus pickled onion (In a jar of pickled onions, add 50g of dried hibiscus flower to each litre of vinegar and infuse for 3 hours. Double strain vinegar to remove flowers and return to jar.)

Name: Devil's Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Claret red wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully FLOAT wine.

Name: Diamondback
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain unto chilled glass.

Name: Dickens' Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄12 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dino Sour
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Dirty Banana
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice.

Name: Dirty Martini Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄12 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5 dash Olive bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Division Bell
Ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Doctor No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Doctor No.2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dominicana
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: STIR first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Carefully float lightly whipped cream (shake cream in the container to aerate prior to pouring).

Name: Don Pone
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur']
Making: RINSE glass with maraschino liqueur. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into maraschino rinsed glass.
Garnish: Skewered crystalised ginger & dust with grated dark chocolate

Name: Don's Delight
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Double Black
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1 1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄3 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', "3 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Double Grape
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 3⁄4 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Double Grape Martini
Ingredients: ['10 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Doubloon
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cream sherry (medium/sweet)', '3⁄4 shot Overproof pot still rum', '3⁄4 shot Montenegro amaro']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Downhill Daring
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Downhill Racer
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dr Zeus
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Fernet liqueur', '20 dried Raisins', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: POUR Fernet Branca into ice-filled glass. Separately MUDDLE raisins in base of shaker, add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice. Finally DISCARD contents of glass and strain contents of shaker into the Fernet Branca coated glass.

Name: Dr. Rieux
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled and rimmed glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & demerara sugar rim

Name: Dragon Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dramble
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass filled with crushed ice and STIR/SWIZZLE. Lastly, DRIZZLE crème de mûre around surface of drink.

Name: Dried Meadow Flower
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
Garnish: Lemon slice (& ideally a bouquet of edible flowers)

Name: Drunk Uncle
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '5⁄6 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Drunken Helmsman
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Overproof aged rum', '1⁄2 shot Meletti amaro', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Orange zest twist & mint sprig bouquet

Name: Dry Martini (1:1 ratio) Fifty-Fifty
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dry Martini (2:1 ratio) Wet
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist

Name: Dry Martini (3:1 ratio)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist.

Name: Dry Martini (4:1 ratio)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dry Martini - The 'Naked' or 'Direct' Martini
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Chilled water', '1⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin']
Making:
1. Place glass and bottle of gin in freezer for at least two hours before making drink.
2. An hour before making drink POUR water into frozen glass, swirl around to coat and place back in freezer. Preferably do this with a little of the water at a time. Continue to swill around during freeing process to coat the sides of the glass.
3. When ready to serve drink, POUR chilled vermouth into icy glass and swirl to coat with vermouth.
4. POUR frozen gin into glass, garnish and serve immediately.
Garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist

Name: Dry Orange Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dublin Spider Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Duchess
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dulchin
Ingredients: ['2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dunderstruck
Ingredients: ['1 shot Overproof pot still rum', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Strawberry sugar syrup', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Dunkel & Stürmig
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Dunkel / dark / black lager', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with beer and ginger beer and briefly stir.

Name: Dunlop Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dunmore Cobbler
Ingredients: ['2 shot Amontillado sherry', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Pineapple sugar syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Two dashes of bitters to colour ice crown & pineapple wedge

Name: Dutch Artist's Special
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Groseille (redcurrant) syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dutch Count Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.

Name: Dutch Coupe
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte & ZN 12 Oude Graan Jenever', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '4 drop Orange flower/blossom water']
Making: STIR all ingredient with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dutch Mule
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: Dutch Orange Cup
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass half filled with ice. Add an orange slice and a couple of mint leaves from the garnish before filling to the brim with more ice and rest of garnish.
Garnish: Orange slice, strawberry slices, mint sprig, orange zest twist & borage when in season

Name: Dynasty Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄4 shot Patron Citronge', '1⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lychee syrup', '1⁄6 shot Ginger syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass pre-rimmed with grapefruit salt.
Garnish: Grapefruit salt rim (mix 100g sea salt with 10g grated grapefruit peel, spread over a paper towel and leave to infuse and dry overnight)

Name: Earl Grey MarTEAni
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin (tea infused)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making:
1. Infuse gin with black tea (preferably Earl Grey) for 5 minutes and then strain to remove tea and prevent over infusion.
2. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Early Spring
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rhubarb flavoured vodka', '5⁄12 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: East India No.1
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Red curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: East Indian
Ingredients: ['2 shot Fino sherry', '2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Easter cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 whole Green cardamom pods', '1 2⁄3 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE cardamom pods in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dust with chocolate powder &/or crumbled Cadbury's Flake bar, & mini chocolate eggs in orange zest nest on rim.

Name: Eastern Standard (Soho House Tonic)
Ingredients: ['3 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '3 fresh Mint leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eastside Gimlet
Ingredients: ['2 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add gin, lime juice, sugar syrup and mint, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with a splash of soda.

Name: Easy Speak
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (2 sugar to 1 water)", "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Easy Street
Ingredients: ['3 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda.
Garnish: Cucumber slice wheel speared with mint sprig bouquet

Name: Eccentrica Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Birch water', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eclipse
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Eclipse Cocktail (by Leo Robitschek)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice). FLOAT mezcal on surface of drink.

Name: Edison's Medicine cocktail
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eeyore's Requiem
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Efficacious
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Ferro China Baliva', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5⁄6 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Egg Sour
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 whole Egg (white & yolk)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float 3 small dashes Angostura bitters on surface of drink

Name: Eight Foot Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1 shot Kiwi fruit puree', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water poured from a height to create a frothy head. Serve with straws.

Special ingredient #1 = Lemon sherbet
Blend the following for a couple minutes and fine strain
600g Caster sugar
600g Super strained lemon juice
20g Lemon zest (removed from fruit with Microplane grater)
5g Maldon sea salt

Special ingredient #2 = Rose water & kiwi syrup
Blend the following and bottle
5g malic acid
100ml Catron kiwi liqueur
100ml Merlet pear liqueur
100ml Money musk coconut
25ml Absinthe
5g Maldon sea salt
100ml Orgeat syrup
50ml Campari
200ml Sugar syrup (1:1)
Garnish: Mint sprigs, dried citrus fruit wheels, cinnamon stick and red amaranth leaves, dusted with icing sugar. Place at least 5 pretzels over straw.

Name: Eighteen '97
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Kumquats (chopped)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1 1⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Merlot red wine']
Making: MUDDLE kumquats in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, shake and fine strain into a chilled glass. FLOAT wine.

Name: El Especialista
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 pinch Salt']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Mediterraneo
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (There’s no need to muddle basil if good ice and shake are used.)
Garnish: Drip 5 drops of olive oil on top

Name: El Patron
Ingredients: ['1 5⁄6 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '5⁄12 shot Vermouth di Torino', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1 pinch Salt', '5 drop Citric acid (10%) solution']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Presidente (Sloppy Joe's)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lime zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: El Presidente (with rhum agricole)
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Elderflower Champagne Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Elderflower Martini No.2
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bison grass vodka', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Elderflower Mojito
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of glass. Add other ingredients, half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass to brim with more crushed ice and churn some more. Serve with straws.

Name: Elderflower Spritz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR wine and then elderflower liqueur into an ice-filled glass. TOP with soda (or champagne).

Name: Electric Avenue
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 1⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Ruby port']
Making: POUR first 4 ingredients into ice-filled glass and CHURN to mix. TOP with port.

Name: Elegante Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Elixir Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Rioja Crianza red wine', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with prosecco and gently stir.

*Special ingredient #1: Homemade vanilla / thyme syrup

Name: Elle for Leather
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with champagne.

Name: Elle Loves cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum (infused with vanilla)', '1 shot White Zinfandel rosé wine', '1 1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Élysée Treaty
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Jägermeister', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 twist Orange peel']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Embrasse de la Terre
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3 dash Celery bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Emerald Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', "4 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Emerson
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Old Tom gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: English Breakfast Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Black tea (cold)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: English Channel
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: English Marmalade
Ingredients: ['4 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker so as to dissolve marmalade. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: English Martini
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Rosemary sprig', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur']
Making: Strip rosemary leaves from stem and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Envy Smith
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Green Apple Syrup', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Ernest + Rita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 1⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ernst Happel
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Liquore Strega', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Escalator Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Esmeralda cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Cachaça', '1⁄3 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Especial Day
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Blackberries', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Espress Ya'self
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄24 shot Vanilla extract', '1 dash Xocolatl mole bitters', '1 dash Chili tincture (firewater bitters)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dust with black, green & red stripes of edible glitter

Name: Espresso Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Espresso Martiki
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Pineapple rum', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄6 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Espresso Martini (no sugar & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1⁄2 pinch Salt']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Espresso Martini (simple 3 equal parts recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Espresso Rumtini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '2 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & float 3 coffee beans on surface of drink

Name: Estilo Viejo
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Été Anisé
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 spoon La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 spoon Peach aperitif liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with tonic water.

Special ingredient #1: Sour orange mix
Garnish: Dehydrated orange slice, star anise & edible flowers

Name: Ether
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Evening Sun
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Rose petal liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine by pouring in the centre of the cocktail and then cover the hole in the foam left by pouring with garnish.
Garnish: Express & float coin-sized orange zest twist

Name: Excuse My French
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest encircling the inside rim of glass with crusted sugar coated rim.

Name: Expense Account
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Explorer 'Martini'
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Amontillado sherry']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Fade To Black Cocktail
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Blackberries', '2 shot Spiced rum', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 spoon Charcoal powder']
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fair & Warmer Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']

Name: Fair Harvard

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fairbanks No.1

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fairbanks No.2

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao']

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Making: Fat-wash a bottle of peaty Scotch whisky with smoky bacon fat. POUR the now clarified smoky bacon-flavoured Scotch and other ingredients into mixing glass, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Fat Tire

SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Feather Duster Crusta
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc) (infused with coffee beans)', '2⁄3 shot Cachaça', '1⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over block ice).

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a spear of ice). TOP with soda.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add next 5 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Fourth Regiment
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 drop Celery bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Francophile Martini
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fray Wray

Name: French 125 (French '75' with cognac) Jones' 1977 recipe
Ingredients: ['1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add cognac, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

Name: French 1605

Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine/champagne.

Name: French 75 (Judge Jr's 1927 recipe)

Making: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add gin, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

Name: French 95 (a French '75' with bourbon)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR powdered sugar with lemon juice in base of shaker until sugar dissolves. Add bourbon, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

Name: French Cocktail

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: French Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "3 dash Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add next 5 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: French Martini

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot The Busker Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Gospel Sharp

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grand Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grand Sidecar
Ingredients: ['2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Half sugar rim (if you must) & orange zest twist

Name: Grand Slam No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice or large cube.)

Name: Grand White Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grande Champagne Cosmo

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grape Escape
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '5 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE grapes and mint in base of shaker. Add cognac and sugar, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with champagne, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Grapefruit & Rose Seltz
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Grapefruit & Rose', '5 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Grapefruit Drop
Ingredients: ['1 shot Grapefruit flavoured vodka', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grapefruit Drop Crusta
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Grapefruit flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Pamplemousse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass with pre-crusted rim.
Garnish: Sugar crusted rim & grapefruit zest around inside of rim

Name: Grapefruit Julep
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Honey', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '4 fresh Mint leaves', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: STIR honey with vodka in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Grapefruit Whisky Fizz
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '2 1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit soda']
Making:
SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and slowly pour 2/3rds of the contents of the shaker from a higher than normal height into a chilled empty glass (no ice in glass) while simultaneously pouring soda with your other hand. The cocktail and soda should form a single stream of liquid falling into the glass.

As when pouring a Guinness, to achieve a perfect head on your fizz, the cocktail should be left to settle for at least a minute before topping off with what remains in the shaker. Ideally, during the settling period, the glass should be placed in a glass froster/fridge/freezer. As the final contents of the shaker are poured into the glass so the head should rise like a souffle.

Name: Grappa Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) and lemon slice

Name: Grasshopper No. 2
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄4 shot Branca Menta liqueur', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄4 shot Double cream / heavy cream', '1 pea Green food colour gel']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Dust with grated chocolate and add a mint sprigs bouquet. Serve with a straw.

Name: Greek Celery Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Celery Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Celery juice (freshly extracted)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Greek Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Greek Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine stain into chilled glass.

Name: Greek Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Ouzo 12']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Greek Vacation
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & basil leaves bouquet

Name: Green Deacon
Ingredients: ['1⁄24 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MIST chilled glass with spray or rinse of absinthe to coat the inside and set aside. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into absinthe-rinsed chilled glass.

Name: Green Isaac's Special
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3 shot Coconut water', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Green Park
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Old Tom gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Celery bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE basil in base of shaker (just to bruise). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Puritan
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "5⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄6 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: POUR ingredients into chilled glass two-thirds filled with crushed ice. SWIZZLE (or churn with a barspoon). Add more crushed ice to fill. Serve with straws.
Garnish: Crown with 3 dashes Angostura bitters over the drink's ice cap, a lime wedge and mint sprig

Name: Greenpoint
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Greenwich Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '3⁄4 shot Shiraz red wine']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass. DRIZZLE red wine around surface of the drink.

Name: Greta Garbo
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Pernod anise']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Greyhound's Tooth
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "8 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grosvenor cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ginseng aperitif', '1 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Guayaba Arabica
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Guava juice', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5 sprig Coriander / cilantro leaves', '1 pinch Salt']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Coffee scented simple syrup

Name: Gun Club Punch No.1
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄6 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into mug/glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Fruit stick (pineapple cubes & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick) & mint sprigs bouquet. Serve with straws

Name: Gun Metal Blue cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gustings' Grasshopper
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '5⁄6 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '5⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gypsy #1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gypsy Queen
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Habsburg Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄3 shot Cranberry liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Halekulani
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hamilton the Hipster
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Vermouth amaro', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Hanky Panky Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄24 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed) (optional)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hardy Grunter
Ingredients: ['2 shot Amontillado sherry', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Rose sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Lavender sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Harvest Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 1⁄2 shot Vermouth amaro', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Harvest Moon (1930s recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Applejack brandy bottled-in-bond (50% alc./vol)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Harvey Wallbanger
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "5⁄12 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT Galliano on the surface.

Name: Havana Special
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Havanatheone
Ingredients: ['10 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hawaiian Stone Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Haystack Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '5⁄6 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredient with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hazelnut Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hearn Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '4 dash Orinoco bitters', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Heather Julep
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', "2 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink using a bar spoon. Top the glass with more crushed ice so as to fill it and churn again. Serve with straws.

Name: Heisenberg Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (Most appropriately served in a science beaker.)
Garnish: Lime juice and blue-coloured salt rim

Name: Hemingway Special Daiquiri (Papa Doble)
Ingredients: ['3 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Herbaceous Border
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄3 shot Bigallet Genepi Grand Tetras', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Celery saccharum (celery syrup)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Hey Sugar
Ingredients: ['1 cube Sugar cube', "6 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters", '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '4 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: Drip one drop of bitters on each side of the sugar cube plus 2 more drops on the last face [one each for luck]. Drop the bitters-soaked sugar cube into a chilled glass, then pour other ingredients over cube.
Garnish: Sprinkle dried rose blossom on the surface of the cocktail

Name: Hi Ladies!
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Name: Hi Life Spritz
