Garnish: Lime wedge squeezed and dropped in drink

Name: High Kick
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: High King
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄3 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add next 6 ingredients (all but soda), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: High Noon
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Horse with No Name habanero bourbon', '1⁄3 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: High Noon (Mezcal-based)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '4 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Highland Highball
Ingredients: ["2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']

Name: Highland Sazerac
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR Chartreuse into glass and twirl to coat inside with liqueur, fill glass with ice and stand to one side. Separately, STIR other ingredients with ice in mixing glass. DISCARD contents of glass (Chartreuse and ice), fill with fresh ice and strain contents of mixing glass.

Name: Hocus Pocus
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Holiday Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot Americano Bianco']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hollywood
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Holy Joe Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Holy Smokes No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Vermouth amaro', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Home On The Range
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (or straight-up in a coupe).

Name: Homely Smoke
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 spoon Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Honey Badger
Ingredients: ['1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Ginger syrup', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Lemon bitters']
Making: De-stalk a sprig of rosemary and MUDDLE the leaves with bourbon in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Honey Bee
Ingredients: ['2 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Honey Cobbler
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', "1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Claret red wine', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: STIR honey with Scotch in base of shaker until honey dissolves. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Honey Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Grapefruit flavoured vodka', '1 1⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', "4 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Honey Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Honey Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Honey Rum Grog
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '3 spoon Honey', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Chilled water', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR honey with other ingredients in base of shaker until the honey is dissolved. Add ice, SHAKE and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Honeymentum
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Monkey 47 Experimentum Series 2y06 Gin', '2⁄3 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float mint leaf or peg to rim

Name: Honeymoon
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hornitos Lau
Ingredients: ['10 fresh Mint leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄4 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) drink and add more crushed ice so drink fills glass.

Name: Hoskins Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hot Toddy (Hot Scotch & Lemon)
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dried Clove', '2 shot Boiling water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into pre-warmed glass and STIR.

Name: Hot Toddy (Hot Scotch & Tea)

Making: Place bar spoon loaded with honey in warmed glass. Add other ingredients and STIR until honey dissolves.

Name: Hotel Nacional Special
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hoyt's Daiquirí
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Lime juice (burnt)', '1⁄4 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: Sear two halves of lime with a chef's blow torch and squeeze into a shaker. SHAKE all remaining ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Hunk Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Luxardo Maraschino cherry dropped into glass

Name: Hunter's Tea
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Brewed cold black breakfast tea', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1 2⁄3 shot Jägermeister']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients until maple syrup dissolves. Add Jägermeister, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Hurricane
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '5⁄6 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Passion fruit syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Hwachae
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '3 wedge Watermelon (fresh)', '3 wedge Pineapple (fresh)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pilsner lager']
Making: Place white rum, watermelon, and pineapple in a shaker and hand blend for 5-10 seconds. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with beer.

Name: Ice 'T' Knee
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Jasmine tea (cold)', '3⁄4 shot Canadian icewine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ice in the Hat

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Iced Sake Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Sake', '1⁄4 shot Canadian icewine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ideal
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ill Viaggio

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Improved Holland Gin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄24 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "1⁄24 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄24 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. [To measure 1.25ml and how many dashes in 1.25ml, please see Measuring cocktail ingredients.]

Name: Improved Pendennis Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Apricot (abricot) eau-de-vie', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: In-Seine
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Indimenticabili Momenti (Unforgettable Moments)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Moscatel', '1⁄6 shot Liquore Strega', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Inside Job Cocktail

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Irish Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Irish Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄24 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄24 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1 dash Boker's bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Irish Maid
Ingredients: ['2 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Name: Irish Old Fashioned

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Iron & Sand Cocktail

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Iron Clad Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Ferro China Baliva']
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Ironbound

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Isla de Piño

Name: Islander
Ingredients: ['2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄6 shot Pernod anise']

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Islay Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR whisky with three ice cubes (dry to the touch frozen ice, not wet ice) in a glass. Add sugar syrup, bitters and two more ice cubes. STIR some more and add another two ice cubes. STIR a bit more, and if you have room, add more ice.

Name: It's All Greek To Me
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Italian Chocolate Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1 1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Italian Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jack Collins
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.

Name: Jack Pot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄4 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Single malt Welsh whisky', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot British bitter ale', '1⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Strawberry with mint sprig crown on rim

Name: Jack Rose Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄12 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (Consider dry shaking if using egg white.)

Name: Jack Tar
Ingredients: ['1 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients and strain into ice-filled glass.

Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly STIR. (Ideally, pre-mix ingredients and age in medium toasted oak barrel for one week.)

Name: Jäger Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Jägermeister', '2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄6 shot Maple syrup', "3 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Jägerdame
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Herbal coffee liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '5⁄12 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice),

Name: Jalisco Espresso
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jalisco Flower
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Grapefruit juice (ruby red)', '3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne/sparkling wine and briefly stir.
Garnish: Grapefruit zest twist &/or edible white flowers

Name: Jamie's Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 wedge Lime (fresh)', '12 fresh Mint leaves', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: POUR first 4 ingredients into glass with lime wedges and mint. Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir). Fill glass with more crushed ice and TOP with Prosecco.

Name: Japanese Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', "2 dash Boker's bitters", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Japanese Maple
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Japanese blended whisky', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Japanese Pear
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '1 1⁄2 shot Sake', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Je suis l'Amour

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jean Harlow
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jeez Louise

Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Jenever Punch

Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP up with soda.

Name: Jersey's Best Dancers

Name: Jet Pilot
Ingredients: ['1 shot Overproof pot still rum', '3⁄4 shot Overproof aged rum', '3⁄4 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 8oz scoop of crushed ice.

Name: José Marti Especial
Ingredients: ['2 dried Clove', '1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄12 shot Ricard Pastis', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE cloves with rum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Joy Division
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Julep Martini
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Juliet & Romeo
Ingredients: ['3 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 pinch Salt', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float 3 drops rose water, 3 drops Angostura bitters & mint leaf

Name: Jungle Bird
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Jungle Hunt
Ingredients: ['1 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1 1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Juschu
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kamaniwanalaya
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot White overproof rum', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled (cubed ice) tiki mug (or large Collins glass). Top with crushed ice and then top with prosecco.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino cherry & mint sprig

Name: Kangaroo Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kentucky Buck
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: MUDDLE strawberry in base of shaker. Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: Kentucky Pear
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Pear & cognac liqueur', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Keyser Suze
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Killer Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (cut like a shark fin) and 3 drops of Cranberry Bitters as a bloody shark attack (or use grenadine)

Name: King's Jubilee
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & skewered maraschino cherry

Name: Kingston
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kingston Club
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass, adding soda as you pour.

Name: Kir Apéritif
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bourgogne Aligoté wine white', '5⁄6 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '2 1⁄2 shot Bourgogne Aligoté wine white']
Making: POUR half the chilled wine into chilled glass. POUR cassis into glass and TOP with rest of the chilled wine.

Name: Kir Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Bourgogne Aligoté wine white', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄6 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kiss
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kiwi Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1⁄2 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz/15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add slices of kiwi and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz highball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Kiwi Fresh Fruit Martini
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Kiwi sugar syrup']
Making: Cut kiwi fruit in half and cut a slice to put aside for garnish. Scoop out flesh out of both halves into base of shaker and MUDDLE. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Knickerbocker
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE first all ingredients with ice and strain into glass 2/3rd filled with cubed ice. Cap with crushed ice, serve with a straw.
Garnish: Squeezed-out half lime shell & seasonal berries: raspberries, blackberries, blueberries

Name: Kopstoot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever (chilled)', '1⁄2 pint Belgium dubbel abbey ale']
Making: POUR genever into shot glass and beer into beer glass. To enjoy, simply sip a shot of ice-cold genever from a small, tulip-shaped glass, then follow with a sip of beer.

Name: Kroton Cup
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1 1⁄2 shot Shiraz red wine', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Kula Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur (infused with strawberry)', '1 shot Cinzano 1757 Vermouth Bianco', '1 shot Bulldog Gin']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass, preferably over a large chunk of block ice.

Name: Le Commerçant (The Merchant)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']

Name: Le Coq d'Or (The Golden Rooster)
Ingredients: ['1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '2 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "2⁄3 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 dash Pimento bitters', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
Making: Saturate sugar cube with Peychaud's in base of shaker and MUDDLE thoroughly. Add cognac and stir to ensure sugar is dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Grapefruit zest twist (discarded) & float star anise

Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Le Sang Jaune (The Yellow Blood)

Name: Lemon Beat

Name: Lemon Drop Crusta
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Lemon bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass with pre-crusted rim.
Garnish: Select a small wine or flute glass with a rim diameter that will snugly accommodate a small lemon tightly enough to act as a watertight extension to the glass. Cut off both ends of the fruit and carefully remove the pulp to leave a barrel-shaped shell of skin. Place in the top of the glass. Wet the edge of the glass and exposed fruit shell with sugar syrup and dip in caster sugar to frost the edge of both peel and glass. Leave for a couple of hours to form a hard crust.

Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Maid in Cuba

Making: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and leave to stand. Separately SHAKE other ingredients with ice (Don't muddle cucumber). DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and STRAIN contents of shaker into absinthe-coated glass. TOP with splash of soda.

Name: Maida Vale
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Maiden's Blush No.2
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Old Tom gin', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Absinthe Blanche', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Major Bailey #1

Making: Lightly MUDDLE (only to bruise) mint with gin in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass half filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) drink with ice using a barspoon. Top the glass to the brim with more crushed ice and churn again. Serve with straws.

Garnish: Chamoy/Tajin rim (if available, use the Mexican condiment Chamoy to moisten the rim of glass, roll in Tajín to lightly coat. Alternately, use citrus juice and any chili-salt combo to create a similar effect.) Finish with a lime zest twist.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Medium Martini

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float mint leaf or peg to rim

Name: Mellow Yellow
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Melon & Apple Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1 slice Melon (Cantaloupe) (chopped)', '1⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '2 shot Cachaça']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add melon and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. Add apple juice and STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Melon Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1 slice Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add melon and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Millionaire
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dust with freshly grated nutmeg & optional small orange wedge on rim

Name: Minnie the Moocher
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Deliver to drinker with verbal garnish, "Hi De Hi De Hi De Ho"

Name: Mint & Honey Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3 fresh Mint leaves', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR honey and rum in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mint Cocktail
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (There's no need to muddle mint if a good shake and ice is used.)

Name: Mint Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mint Julep (no sugar & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into julep cup half filled with crushed ice. STIR the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top up the cup with more crushed ice and STIR again. Repeat this process so the drink fills the cup and frost forms on the outside.

Name: Mint Limeade (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Minty Mellow Yellow
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Monkey 47 Experimentum Series 2y06 Gin', '1⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float small mint leaf or peg to rim

Name: Minty Pentones cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', "4 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Minty White Lady cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Miracle Worker
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Miss Elena
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Amaro Nonino Quintessentia', '1⁄4 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Miss Moonshine
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bán Poitín', '2⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Rosemary sugar syrup (2:1)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mission Bell
Ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '2⁄3 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Pamplemousse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Missionary's Downfall
Ingredients: ['15 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint with rum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Mixed Berry Julep
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 fresh Blackberries', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Lightly MUDDLE berries in base of glass. Add mint, bourbon, cognac, and sugar syrup into glass, add crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Top up the glass with more crushed ice and CHURN again. Repeat this process until the drink fills the glass and serve.

Name: Mocha Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT cream in centre of drink.

Name: Mojito (no added sugar & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of glass. Add rum, lime juice and sugar free sweetener. Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more. TOP with soda, stir and serve with environmentally friendly straws.

Name: Mollymock
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot Montenegro amaro', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mon Dernier Mot (My Last Word)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mona Lisa
Ingredients: ['1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Name: Monet's Moment
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably with one large hand-cracked cube)

Name: Monkey Business
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Monkey 47 gin', '5⁄6 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Float 2 dashes aromatic bitters and serve with straw

Name: Monte & Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Montenegro amaro', '4 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Monte Carlo
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Monte Cassino
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Monte Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro', '3⁄4 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Monte Paloma
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Montenegro amaro', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass, while also combining with soda water.

Name: Monte Whiskey Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: MonteNegroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄6 shot Montenegro amaro', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Monterita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Agave syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Montreal Cocktail (official city cocktail)
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Canadian rye whisky', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Moo'lata
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Moon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Moonlight Cocktail (Gaz Regan's)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: More Supreme Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martinique V.S.O.P rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Grind black pepper over drink's surface

Name: Morning Cocktail
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1 dash Boker's bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Morning Glory Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky (from freezer)', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and slowly pour 2/3rds of the contents of the shaker from a higher than normal height into a chilled empty glass (no ice in glass) while simultaneously pouring soda with your other hand. The cocktail and soda should form a single stream of liquid falling into the glass.

As when pouring a Guinness, to achieve a perfect head on a fizz, the cocktail should be left to settle for at least a minute before topping off with what remains in the shaker. Ideally, during the settling period, the glass should be placed in a glass froster/fridge/freezer. As the final contents of the shaker are poured into the glass so the head should rise like a souffle.

Name: Mount Rushmore
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Montenegro amaro', '1 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Mountain Man cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄6 shot Ginger syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mr Anthony
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '2⁄3 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', "3 drop Bob's Ginger Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mr Burns
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄6 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mr Kappes
Ingredients: ['1 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '5⁄12 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mr Simon
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 spoon Agave syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mr. Bali Hai
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass/mug filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge, mint sprigs bouquet & 3 coffee beans

Name: Mrs Daisy Robinson
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Top with prosecco.

Name: Mrs Hendrickx Lemonade Highball

Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass charged with half of the soda water. TOP with rest of soda.

Name: Mulata Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mulata Daisy
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Fennel seeds', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "1⁄3 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao']
Making: MUDDLE fennel seeds in the base of shaker. Add lime juice and powdered sugar and stir until sugar is dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mulled Negroni
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Claret red wine', "1⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄6 shot Rutte Sloe Gin']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Munich Negroni Western Style
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Murano Negroni

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Myrtle Bank Special Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Napoléon Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', "8 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Naramata

Name: Naughty Charles
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Nautilus

Name: Negrino

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Neptune's Wrath
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']

Name: New York Sour (no added sugar & low-calorie)

Name: Pass the Dutchie
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', "8 drop Bob's Coriander Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Passion Fruit Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Chop passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into the rocks glass and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Passion Fruit Margarita
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup']
Making: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out the flesh from one half into your shaker (retain the other half for garnish). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice, and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lime juice and salt rim if desired. Float half passion fruit

Name: Passion Fruit Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup']

Name: Pineapple & Sage Margarita
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Sage leaves', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pineapple Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1⁄2 slice Pineapple (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add pineapple and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

*Special ingredient #2: Tartaric acid – made with 1 part cream of tartar and 5 parts water by weight.

Name: Playmate Martini
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist and 2 drops of bitter on foamy head (spread with a cocktail stick)

Name: Plaza Antigua
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: STIR honey with vodka in base of shaker to dissolve honey. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Porn Star Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Passoã liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine (optional)']
Making:
Wash and cut 2 fresh passion fruits in half, SCOOP out the seeds and flesh of 3 halves into your shaker. (Keep last passion fruit half for garnish.) Add next four ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Optionally, separately, POUR champagne into chilled shot glass to serve on the side. Instruct drinker to sip alternately from each glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Psycho Killer Cocktail

STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient: Cocoa nib-infused Campari
Add 2 tablespoons of cocoa nibs to one 70cl or 75cl bottle Campari. Let infuse for one hour and then strain to remove cocoa nibs. Pour back into bottle and mark bottle accordingly.

Name: Queen's Park Hotel Super Cocktail

Name: Queen's Park Swizzle
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making:
1. Lightly MUDDLE mint with rum in base of glass. Use your bar spoon to raise the bruised mint up and around the inside of the glass to coat with fragrant mint oils.
2. Add other ingredients and two-thirds fill glass with crushed ice.
3. SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick or CHURN (stir) with a bar spoon.
4. Fill glass with more crushed ice.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Bitter Bianco liqueur']

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled (empty) glass, while at the same time pouring soda water with your other hand so both liquids form a single stream to slowly fill the glass.

Making: POUR pastis into chilled glass, TOP with chilled water and leave to stand. Separately STIR other ingredients with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (pastis, water and ice) and STRAIN contents of stirring glass into pastis-coated glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) and olive on a stick

Name: Raspberry Frangipane Spritz
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '1⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄6 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄12 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: STIR 5 ingredients (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass, already charged with prosecco. TOP with soda.

Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of large shaker tin. Add ice and other ingredients then THROW (strain from a height into a second strainer). Repeat four times and then strain into ice-filled glass.
Glass: Rum barrel mug or pint glass
