Name: Reverse Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Reverse Vesper Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Kina aromatised wine', '1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Reversed Vesper & Tonic 'Martini'
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Kina aromatised wine', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄6 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with a splash tonic water.

Name: Revolutionary Flip
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 1⁄3 shot British bitter ale', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rhine Wine Cobbler
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 wedge Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '3 shot Riesling wine', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE grapes and pineapple in base of shaker and fine strain (without shaking) into glass filled with crushed ice. POUR other ingredients into glass and cobble (churn/stir) with barspoon to thoroughly mix.
Garnish: A grape, orange and pineapple slice

Name: Rhubarb & Tonic Highball
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rhubarb flavoured vodka', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rhubarb Lucca Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Rabarbaro liqueur']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) and rhubarb stirrer

Name: Rhubarb Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rabarbaro liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ripe Red Slice
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄6 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Watermelon liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Fresh watermen wedge on rim or watermelon slices sweets/candy

Name: Ritorno Alle Radici (Back To The Roots)
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', "1 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1 inch Vanilla pod (sliced)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist & long cinnamon stick

Name: Rob Roy Cocktail
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "8 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Robert Frost
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Amontillado sherry', '3⁄4 shot Dry white port', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rock 'n' Rye
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Rocky Left Bank
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 1⁄3 shot Chardonnay (Chablis) white wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rocky Mountain Rootbeer
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '4 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)', "1 dash Bob's Liquorice bitters (optional)"]
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass and them fill glass with ice.

Name: Roman Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro', '3⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Ronan Collins
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Roosevelt Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Roosevelt Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Black walnut bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Roosevelt Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rosarita Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: salt rim (optional) & lime wedge on rim

Name: Rose (by Johnny Milta)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄6 shot Groseille (redcurrant) syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rose (French style) No. 2
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rosé 75
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 1⁄2 shot Rosé champagne']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Rose No.3
Ingredients: ['2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄3 shot Groseille (redcurrant) syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rose-Hyp Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Rose petal liqueur']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Rose petal, edible flower or orange zest twist

Name: Roselyn Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rosina Ferrario No. 203
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rosita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Roxanne
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Amaro Santoni', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Strawberry sugar syrup', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Royal Smile
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ruby Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Tawny port', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rude Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rum & Rye Sour
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot Tawny port', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rum 'n' It
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '5⁄6 shot Vermouth di Torino', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Roasted buckwheat cordial']
Making: STIR all ingredients and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Rum Amandine
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2 dash Orange flower/blossom water', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rum Daisy
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄12 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet, lemon spiral, & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Rum Dum Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT pot still rum.

Name: Rum Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄6 shot Cachaça', '1 shot Tempus Fugit Gran Classico Bitter', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Rum Punch-Up
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2⁄3 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rum Sour
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '5⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rumshack Punch
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄2 shot Peach purée', '1⁄3 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Russian Spring Punch
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass charged with champagne.

Name: Rusty Peach Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Ferro China Baliva', '1 1⁄3 shot Peach aperitif liqueur', '3 dash Peach bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist or peach slice

Name: Rusty Sour
Ingredients: ['1 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1 shot Drambuie liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rusty To The Core
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rye Boulevardier
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Rye's Up
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "3 drop Bob's Liquorice bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass).

Name: S 'n' Emm
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '5⁄6 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sage Sazerac
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Ricard Pastis', '3 fresh Sage leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Birch spirit/birch eau-de-vie', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Rinse chilled glass Pastis and set aside. MUDDLE sage in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into the pre-rinsed glass over fresh ice (preferably a chunk of block ice).

Name: Sailor's Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Ruby port', '1⁄6 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick (or churn with a barspoon). Add more crushed ice to fill and SWIZZLE some more. Serve with straws.
Garnish: A few dashes Angostura bitters over ice cap crowned with lime zest strings

Name: Saint-Marc Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lime slice or wedge on rim

Name: Saison l'Hiver
Ingredients: ['1 dried Clove', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Rosé champagne']
Making: MUDDLE clove in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Sake Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Sake', '3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sake Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 2⁄3 shot Sake', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine stain into chilled glass.

Name: Sake Sour
Ingredients: ['2 2⁄3 shot Sake', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Saketini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Sake']
Making: STIR vodka and sake with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sakini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sakura Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄24 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Fresh cherry blossom (or make do with an olive if out of season)

Name: Salome
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Plum bitters (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Salty Dog
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Salvamento
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄2 shot Acqua Bianca liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Salvatore Meets
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Sangaree (Sangria)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Spanish brandy', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3 shot Rioja Crianza red wine', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄12 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '3⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: STIR first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with a splash of soda.
Garnish: Slices of strawberry, orange and lemon with mint sprig bouquet

Name: Sangre Dulce Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Blood orange juice', '1⁄4 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sangrita
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '2 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1 pinch Salt', '1 grind Black pepper']
Making: SHAKE ingredients with ice and strain into shot glass. Serve with a shot of tequila. The drinker can either down the tequila and chase it with sangrita or sip the two drinks alternately.

Name: Santa Maria (by Dani Umoette)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '2⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur']
Making: Makes 2 drinks STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into two chilled shot glasses, ideally Vaso Veladora glasses.

Name: Santana
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Amaro Santoni', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Saratoga Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: THROW (or stir) all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (or Luxardo Maraschino cherry)

Name: Satan's Whiskers (Curled)
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Satan's Whiskers (Enroulée)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Satan's Whiskers (Marcelled)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Saturn
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄4 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 8oz scoop crushed ice.
Garnish: Cut a slice of lemon and remove inside to leave a round ring of zest. Skewer ring and Luxardo maraschino cherry with a stick to form a cherry planet encircled by a lemon zest ring. Rest on top of drink.

Name: Saturn 'Martini'
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '2 spoon Honey', '1 1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. STIR honey with vodka and grapes to dissolve honey. Add wine, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Saúco Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Savoia Plane
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '5⁄6 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '1⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sazerac (no sugar & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Sugar-free sweetener', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters (optional)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
Making: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and leave to stand. Separately THROW other ingredients with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and STRAIN drink into absinthe-coated glass.

Name: Sbagliato With Tonic
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3 1⁄3 shot Tonic water (salty lemon)']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

Name: Scandinavian Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Akvavit / Aquavit', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Schnitzelburg
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Vermouth amaro', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Scofflaw
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters (optional)", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Scotch Adonis
Ingredients: ['1 shot Blended/vatted Scotch malt whisky', '1 shot Oloroso sherry', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)

Name: Scotch Negroni
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Scotch Whisky Highball
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Señor Santoni
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Amaro Santoni', '3⁄4 shot Amontillado sherry']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: September Morn
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Seventh Heaven No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet pegged to rim

Name: Sgroppino / Sorbetto
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '2 scoop Lemon sorbet']
Making: BLEND all ingredients without additional ice and serve in chilled glass.

Name: Shadow Boxer
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Pamplemousse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Apricot (abricot) eau-de-vie']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Shamrock Sour Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 drop Green food colour gel']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Shark's Tooth (by Don Beach)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries', '1 shot Jamaican aged blended rum']
Making: BLEND first 5 ingredients with 4oz scoop of crushed ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass. POUR Jamaican rum into shot glass and serve alongside drink, instructing drinker to pour rum into cocktail prior to sipping (without straw).

Name: Sharman-Cox Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sharon
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: She's Like
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3 dash Celery bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sherry Cobbler
Ingredients: ['2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge, orange slice, mint sprig bouquet & seasonal berry

Name: Sherry Herbst
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', "1⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Oloroso sherry']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sherry Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Palo cortado sherry', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sherry Valance
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄2 shot Armagnac brandy', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Shifting Sands
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit soda']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Short Rib
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Pomegranate Molasses', '6 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Showgirl Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Rose petal liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sicilian Negroni Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Blood orange juice']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sid and Nancy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Freshly grated nutmeg, cocoa powder & dehydrated banana chip

Name: Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sidecar Cocktail (Difford's spec.)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pineau des Charentes blanc', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (a lemon zest twist is more classic). Some also like a sugared rim but hopefully added Pineau des Charentes richness renders this sweet rim embellishment superfluous.

Name: Silenus
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1 1⁄3 shot Riesling wine', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 dash Soy sauce']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Silver Bullet
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Silver Pineapple
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 1⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄6 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet pegged to rim

Name: Simple Truth
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3 fresh Sage leaves']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dehydrated grapefruit slice and sage leaf

Name: Sin Cyn cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly STIR.

Name: Sin Limites
Ingredients: ['2 dried Green cardamom pods', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Single Village Fix
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup (optional)', "3 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sips Sgroppino
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur', '1 scoop Raspberry sorbet', '3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: BLEND all ingredients (without ice) and pour into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float edible flower or freeze-dried raspberry

Name: Sir Walter Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sketcher's Pet
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Skyline Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled cayenne-chile salt-rimmed glass.

Special ingredient #1: Blackberry shrub - combine equal parts blackberries, cane sugar and red wine vinegar in a blender, blend until liquefied, then strain out solids.

Special ingredient #2: Cayenne-chile syrup - combine 1 cup sugar, one cup water, 1 teaspoon chile powder, 1 teaspoon cayenne in a saucepan and bring to a simmer. Once desired flavour is achieved, strain out solids. Alternately, use .25 oz simple syrup, a slice of cayenne or other hot pepper, and a pinch of chile powder.
Garnish: Cayenne-chile rim (4 parts kosher salt, 1 part chile powder & 1 part cayenne), & orange zest twist

Name: Sleepy Smoker
Ingredients: ['1 shot Oak Smoked Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Sloane Square cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sloe Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '4 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with champagne (or soda if you're cheap). Some like to add egg white to enhance foam. (The drink photographed here is without egg white and we prefer without.)

Name: Slow & Unsteady
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5 fresh Basil leaves', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and finer strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish: Basil leaf and 3 drops of aromatic bitters

Name: Slow Comfortable Mexican Screw Against the Wall
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
Making: STIR first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT sloe gin on surface so it bleeds into drink. Finish with Galliano FLOAT.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against a Cold Hard Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄4 shot White overproof rum']
Making: STIR first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Then FLOAT Galliano and overproof rum.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
Making: STIR first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. DRIZZLE sloe gin around surface so it bleeds into drink. FLOAT Galliano.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall With A Bang
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
Making: STIR first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Finish with a FLOAT of Galliano.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Between the Sheets
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Slow Negroni
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly STIR.

Name: Slow Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Slutty Mary
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Homemade paste', '2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Tomato juice']
Making:
ROLL (turn shaker over repeatedly rather than shake) all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
To make paste, blend:
1 can of La Costena Chipotle Chilli in Adobo Sauce
2 large bunches of fresh coriander
1 tablespoon of salt
1 tablespoon of black pepper
100ml Agavero tequila liqueur
500ml Worcestershire sauce
Garnish: Salt/pepper rim and garnish with lime, coriander and celery.

Name: Smok'n Rob Roy
Ingredients: ['2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "4 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Smoke & Mirrors (by The Bon Vivants)
Ingredients: ['4 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Smoke & Mirrors (mezcal-based)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dust with an equal mix of powdered sugar, salt and cayenne pepper

Name: Smoke and Mirrors #1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR ingredients into mixing glass, SMOKE (with applewood smoke), then STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Smoke and Mirrors No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Averna Amaro', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Smoked Maple
Ingredients: ['2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 spoon Maple syrup', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Smoked Old Fashioned Godfather
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Smokestack Lightning
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain with ice.

Name: Smokey Boat
Ingredients: ['1 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Smoking Gun Vesper
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Oak Smoked Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Jerry Thomas bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & small strip cured smoked pork on a skewer.

Name: Smoky Chili Margarita
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄4 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Smoked salt rim and lime wedge

Name: Smoky Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Smoky Mizu
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '2⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Smoky Old Bastard
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 bag Lapsang Souchong tea (cold)', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup', "2 dash Boker's bitters"]
Making: STIR half the bourbon, tea bag and four ice cubes in glass for 60 seconds. Remove tea bag, add maple syrup and bitters, and STIR some more. Add more ice and the rest of the bourbon. STIR lots more and add more ice.

Name: Smoky Orchard Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Poire William liqueur', '2 dash Celery bitters', '2 shot Tonic water (smoked)']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass glass charged with some of the smoky tonic water, then TOP with more smoky tonic.

Name: Smoky Tears cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Smoky Tommy's Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange juice and smoked salt rim with a rosemary sprig in glass

Name: Smoky Whisky Sour
Ingredients: ['1 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Maple syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & Angostura bitters drawn across foam

Name: Snake Eyes
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '2 shot Coconut water', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Clement Sirop de Canne', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Snowfall Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 whole Vanilla pod', '1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Take 1/4 a vanilla pod and cut along its length. MUDDLE this in the base of a shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Snyder Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sodden Grape
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Bison grass vodka', '3⁄4 shot Canadian icewine']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sol Ardiente
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Pink peppercorns', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE peppercorns in base of shaker. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with splash soda.

Name: Sonic Surfer
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
Making: POUR first 2 ingredients into ice-filled glass. Carefully pour cognac so it floats to form a gold layer over the clear soda and tonic. Add a wooden lollipop stick as the drinker should stir before enjoying.

Name: Sorrentino Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly STIR.

Name: Sour Grapes
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineau des Charentes blanc', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 fresh Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sourise

Name: Stonage

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass charged with soda. TOP with cider.

Name: Stone Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Storm King
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Nocello walnut liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Strawberry & Basil Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '3 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '3 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons powdered caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add strawberries and basil, and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Using an Ice Tapper, crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Strawberry Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '3 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons powdered caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add strawberries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Strawberry Daiquiri (frozen)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)']
Making:
BLEND all ingredients with a 6oz scoop of crushed ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Seasonal variation: 30 ml strawberry puree as substitute for fresh strawberries.
Garnish: Half strawberry (or lime wedge) on rim

Name: Strawberry Fields
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE strawberry in base of shaker. Add vodka, honey syrup, lemon juice and egg white and SHAKE with ice. Strain back into shaker, DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Five drops of balsamic vinegar and a dusting of freshly ground black pepper

Name: Strawberry Inn Grappa Sour

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Strawberry Margarita (frozen)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)']

BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice.

Name: Swedish Paloma
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Grapefruit flavoured vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Grapefruit juice (ruby red)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.

Name: Sweet Manhattan (batched recipe)
Ingredients: ['10 shot Bourbon whiskey', '10 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '10 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "1⁄6 shot Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making:
Combine all ingredients and stir (without ice). POUR into a litre bottle and leave to chill in a refrigerator. To serve, STIR 2 shots / 2oz / 60ml of the bottled mixture with ice and strain into chilled glass. Makes 16 drinks.

This recipe is also perfect for making a barrel aged Manhattan and will fill a one litre mini cask. Obviously, multiply recipe if using a larger cask.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Sweet Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sweet Tears of Mine

Name: Swiss Account

Name: Swiss Cup 5

Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with tonic water and ginger ale.

Name: Swiss Watch
Ingredients: ['1 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled sugar rimmed glass.
Garnish: Powdered sugar rim. (Note: Lemon zest can be floated on the drink, halved with the shape of 'V', to show the time 2pm)

Name: Swizzles Cocktail

Name: Tapered Nail

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tatanka
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bison grass vodka', '2 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Tears in Heaven

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Infuse the spiced rum with summer truffle for 24 hours.)

Name: Temperance Ginger Mojito (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 wedge Lime (fresh)', '12 fresh Mint leaves', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']

Spicy sugar syrup
To make your own festive spice syrup: Stir half a cup of hot water and half a cup of sugar in a pan until sugar is dissolved. Add 1 cracked cinnamon stick, ½ a split vanilla pod and 1 teaspoon of cracked Szechuan peppers. Cover for 15 minutes then strain and cool liquid. If using this syrup in the recipe below then use 12.5ml.
Garnish: Holly sprig & Luxardo Maraschino cherry (the holly represents the antlers and the cherry the red nose)

Name: Thuir Sour

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Thunder In Paradise
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Oloroso sherry', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice and serve with a straw.
Garnish: Dashes of Peychaud bitters to colour ice crown & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Thyme for…
Ingredients: ['1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 sprig Thyme sprig', '1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth']
Making: DASH bitters over sugar cube in stirring glass and MUDDLE cube to crush. ADD other ingredients and stir to dissolve sugar. Add ice and STIR. Fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Thyme Will Tell Sour
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Thyme sprig', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MUDDLE thyme (strip leaves from stem) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (expressed and discarded) & thyme sprig

Name: Ti Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1⁄4 shot Clement Sirop de Canne', '1 slice Lime (fresh)']
Making:
Traditionally the limes used to make this drink are not cut into slices or wedges. Instead, a round disc is cut from the side of the fruit. These are cut large enough that some of the fruit's flesh backs the peel of the disc.

POUR the rum and sugar into glass. Then SQUEEZE the lime disc between finger and thumb before dropping into the drink. This expresses the oil from the skin and little of the juice into the Ti'Punch. STIR and consider adding ice - either one or two large cubes depending on glass size, or preferably, a small chunk of block ice.
Garnish: The lime disc in the drink is garnish enough but also consider expressing a lime zest twist over the drink and then discarding.

Name: Tia Mia
Ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet, spent lime shell & fruit stick

Name: Tijuana Brass
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Agave syrup', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Top with cucumber foam (fill a cream whipper two-thirds full with equal parts cucumber juice, 1:1 simple syrup and egg white, charge with two CO2 cartridges and chill).

Name: Tiki Max
Ingredients: ['1 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '6 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Woods rum']
Making: SHAKE first nine ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. FLOAT overproof rum on drink.

Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Fennel tea

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: TNT (Tequila 'N' Tonic)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄4 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]

Name: Toasted Ginger Godfather
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']

Name: Toasted Old Fashioned Godfather

Name: Tom & Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 shot Old Tom gin', '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Cherry juice', '1⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tom & Jerry
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Egg white', '2 fresh Egg yolk', '6 spoon White caster sugar', '1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '2 pinch Cinnamon powder', '2 pinch Clove', '3 pinch Freshly grated nutmeg', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', 'Top up with Boiling water']
Making:
1. Pre-warm six 20cl (6.75oz) toddy glasses or Tom & Jerry mugs with hot water.
2. Using a whisk, BEAT the yolks in a mixing bowl "until they are thin as water." Add sugar, Jamaican rum, spices and STIR thoroughly with whisk.
3. In a separate bowl, use a whisk to BEAT the egg whites "to a stiff froth."
4. Use a tablespoon to FOLD the frothy egg whites into the spiced and beaten yolk mixture. This produces the gloopy base mixture known as 'Tom & Jerry batter'.
5. To make individual drinks, to each of the warmed glasses or mugs, POUR cognac and rum, and add two table spoons of Tom & Jerry batter. STIR each glass/mug thoroughly with a barspoon while topping with boiling water.
6. Each should end up with frothy head ready to receive the garnish of grated nutmeg. Serve and enjoy.

Name: Tom Collins
Ingredients: ['2 shot Old Tom gin', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Coconut water', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Treacle No.1

Name: Triomphe d'Anis (Triumph of Aniseed)
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dried Star anise', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry']
Making: RINSE glass with absinthe. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into absinthe rinsed glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & float star anise

Name: Tropic
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Tropical Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz/15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

4 POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer), coconut liqueur and pineapple juice (also chilled) into the shaker base or glass used to muddle and swirl to rinse before pouring into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

5. Use an Ice Tapper to crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Tropicalia
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 1⁄2 shot Banana tea', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']

Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass. Then POUR liqueur into the centre of the drink. It should sink to create a blue base and leave a blue spot in the centre of this drink's frothy head.

Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Jägermeister']

Name: Watermelon Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '1⁄2 cupful Watermelon (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add watermelon and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes using an Ice Tapper and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Watermelon Fruitini
Ingredients: ['1 slice Watermelon (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Cut watermelon into 16 segments, chop the flesh from one segment into cubes and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
