Name: William Wallace
Ingredients: ["1 2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wink
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass. TOP with chilled water and set to one side. Separately, SHAKE other ingredients with ice. DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and strain drink into empty absinthe-coated glass.

Name: Wisecrack Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and serve with straws.

Name: Witch & Broomstick
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Monkey 47 Experimentum Series 2y06 Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄6 shot Liquore Strega', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY shake (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float mint leaf on foaming surface

Name: Witches' Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Liquore Strega', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Witches' Flight
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Liquore Strega', '3⁄4 shot Amaro Nonino Quintessentia', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Witches' Grappa
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1 shot Liquore Strega', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wogan
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wonky Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Tuaca liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "2 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wood Sap & Sand cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Mint leaves', "1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Woody cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 shot Birch water', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', "8 drop Bob's Peppermint Bitters"]
Making: MUDDLE mint in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Word by Word
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Xanthia
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', "2 dash Bob's Abbotts bitters", '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yale Fence
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Vermouth di Torino']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yellow Belly
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yellow Bird
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Banana carved to resemble a bird OR pineapple wedge, Luxardo maraschino cherry & half orange wheel.

Name: Yellow Cactus Flower
Ingredients: ['1 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yellow Daisy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE (or stir) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yellow Jacket (Gin-based)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yellow Negroni
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth']
Making: POUR all ingredients into serving glass, add ice to fill glass, STIR briefly and serve.

Name: Yes or Noyau?
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Crème de noyau liqueur', '1 shot Rainwater/Verdelho (med-dry) Madeira wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Young Cuban
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '4 sprig Fresh dill']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Youth & Treachery
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Yule Luv It
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "4 drop Bob's Ginger Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yuliya Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Grapefruit zest twist & drop eucalyptus oil

Name: Z Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄4 shot Tawny port']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zara
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (expressed & discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Zegroni
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gran Reserva Diez', '2⁄3 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zeus Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '24 dried Raisins', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup', '1 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)']
Making: POUR fernet into chilled/frozen glass, swirl round to coat inside and DISCARD excess. MUDDLE raisins with cognac in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into fernet-rinsed glass.

Name: Zoom
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zubrowka Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄4 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, top with water and stand to one side. Separately STIR other ingredients with ice. Dump contents of glass and strain stirred drink into the absinthe washed glass.

Name: Zuzu's Petals cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Celery bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: 'Martini' Thyme
Ingredients: ['2 sprig Lemon thyme (remove stalks)', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE thyme in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) to emulsify and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: 18th Century Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Batavia arrack', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: 1920s Artist
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Groseille (redcurrant) syrup', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: 57 T-Bird Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: 75 Cocktail (Vermeire's 1922 recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: A Dream to Be
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '3 dash Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: A Few of My Favourite Things
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: A L'Ancienne du Bois (A woody Old Fashioned)
Ingredients: ['5 whole Maraschino cherry (from jar in syrup)', '1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Nocello walnut liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Maple syrup', "4 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: MUDDLE cherries with bitters and maple syrup in base of glass. Add 3 ice cubes and STIR. Add cognac and 3 more ice cubes and STIR again. Add walnut liqueur and 2 more ice cubes and STIR some more.

Name: A Moment of Silence
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄2 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄4 shot Applejack brandy bottled-in-bond (50% alc./vol)']
Making: RINSE a chilled glass with red bitter liqueur and set to one side. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled, pre-rinsed glass.

Name: A Sinking Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: A Still Dawn
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄6 shot Averna Amaro', '2 dash Pear bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: A. J.
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: A.B.C. Cocktail
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Tawny port', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Abacaxi Ricaço
Ingredients: ['1 whole Pineapple (fresh)', '3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot White caster sugar']
Making: Cut the top off a small pineapple and carefully scoop out the flesh from the base to leave a shell with 12mm (½ inch) thick walls. Place the shell in a freezer to chill. Remove the hard core from the pineapple flesh and discard; roughly chop the remaining flesh, add other ingredients and BLEND with one 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into the pineapple shell and serve with straws. (The flesh of one pineapple blended with the following ingredients will fill at least two shells).
Garnish: Cut a straw sized hole in the top of the pineapple shell & replace it as a lid

Name: Absinthe by Jimmy
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Chilled water', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredient with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Absinthe Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 1⁄2 shot Chilled water', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Absinthe Drip Cocktail (French method)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 shot Chilled water', '1 cube Sugar cube']
Making: POUR absinthe into glass. PLACE cube of sugar on a slotted absinthe spoon resting across the top of the glass. Using an absinthe fountain (or a bottle of chilled mineral water with a small hole in the cap), DRIP iced water over the sugar so it dissolves and drips into the glass. Traditionally the same amount of water is added as absinthe, but full-strength absinthe requires more dilution - Keep dripping until absinthe louches (turns milky white). Add ice, stir and serve.

Name: Absinthe Frappé
Ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Anisette liqueur', '1 shot Chilled water', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) and serve with a straw.

Name: Absinthe Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Absinthe Mojito
Ingredients: ['3 wedge Lime (fresh)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '5⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '3 shot Lemonade']
Making: Squeeze and drop lime wedges into glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add mint and absinthe and churn with ice. Fill glass with more crushed ice and TOP with lemonade (or lemon-lime soda).

Name: Absinthe Sour
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry

Name: Absolutely Fabulous
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and strain into glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Acapulco
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Acapulco Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients to emulsify. Add ice, SHAKE again and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ace
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Achieve Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Ginger syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Achilles Heel
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄4 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Adam & Eve
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass.

Name: Adelaide
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "3 drop Bob's Lavender Bitters", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Adelaide Swizzle
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "3⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and half fill with crushed ice. SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick (or churn with a barspoon). Add more crushed ice to fill and SWIZZLE some more. Serve with straws.

Name: Adios Motherfucker
Ingredients: ['5⁄12 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄12 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄12 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄3 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first 8 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda.
Garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry sail

Name: Admiral's Salute
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Peach bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: After Hours
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Aggravation
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Agua De Cuba
Ingredients: ['1 slice Watermelon (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', "2⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Cut watermelon into 16 segments, chop the flesh from one segment into cubes and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ají Dulce
Ingredients: ['3 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 1⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '2⁄3 shot Fruit cup liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)', '3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Alabama Slammer (long)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Don't be tempted to shake as this detrimentally thins the drink. Instead, consider rolling or throwing.)

Name: Alamagoozlum Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Chilled water', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Alaska (Savoy recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Alberto Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Fino sherry', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Alex Summer
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Watermelon juice', '1 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (Instead of watermelon juice you can muddle lumps cut from a wedge of fresh watermelon.)

Name: Alexander
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Alexandros' Sour
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot O/Purist Tsipouro', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', "6 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Apple-Jacked

Making:
SHAKE all ingredients and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Cucumber skin cordia Fortified burnt cinnamon infused honey (240g honey, 10 cinnamon sticks with one end burned, and 50ml Jack Daniels Old No.7, infused for 8 hours at 65°C, remove cinnamon, char one cinnamon stick completely and infuse)

Special ingredient #2: Pickling liquor Citric apple juice (Eager Apple Juice, 2% citric acid by weight)

Special ingredient #3: Ms Betters Batch 42 Aromatic Bitters

Special ingredient #4: Ms Betters Black Pepper & Cardamom Bitters

Name: B&B Royale

Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: B-52 Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: BACARDÍ Elements
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Back To Black
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄12 shot Branca Menta liqueur', '6 whole Roasted coffee beans']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Back To The Origin
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '5⁄6 shot Yuzushu liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Claret red wine', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Backstabber
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Homemade ginger juice syrup (1:1)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Root ginger slice or piece of crystalised ginger

Name: Bajan Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Passoã liqueur']
Making: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into glass. Add mint and gently MUDDLE (just to bruise mint). Add rum, lime juice and crushed ice. CHURN (stir) drink in glass to mix. DRIZZLE passion fruit liqueur and serve with straws.

Name: Bajan Passion
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bakewell Tart Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large ice cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Balalaika
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bald Head
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ballroom
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Balm Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bamboo (Savoy's 1930 recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bamboo (with triple sec)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Alexander
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Boomer
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '1 spoon White caster sugar', '1⁄3 fresh Banana (preferably overripe) (chopped)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz/15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add slices of banana and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz highball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Use an Ice Tapper to crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Banana Cart
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Spiced rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Colada
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)', "1 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)"]
Making: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with paper straws.

Name: Banana Flambé
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon White caster sugar', '2 pinch Cinnamon powder', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: In a shallow dish flambé half a split banana with orange juice, sugar and cinnamon. FLAMBÉ until the banana softens completely and the orange juice reduces. Add cognac and flambé further. MUDDLE banana in the base of shaker, add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Havana Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '2 shot Banana tea soda']
Making: POUR first 2 ingredients into ice-filled glass and TOP with banana tea soda from siphon.

Name: Banana Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5⁄12 shot Banana tea', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', "6 drop Bob's Abbotts bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Banana Smoothie
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Yoghurt liqueur', '3 spoon Honey', '1⁄2 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve immediately with straws.

Name: Bananas & Cream
Ingredients: ['2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: Bandelures
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1 1⁄3 shot Peach aperitif liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']

Garnish: Half lime wheel slice across rim

Name: Bandera
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '2 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1 pinch Salt', '1 grind Black pepper']
Making: POUR tequila and lime juice into separate shot (caballitos) glasses. To make Sangrita to fill third glass, SHAKE rest of ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass. Instruct drinker to sip from all three glasses alternatively.

Name: Barbara
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bartender's Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Fino sherry', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bartender's Root Beer

SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade agave and chamomile syrup

Name: Bellini-Tini

Name: Bénédictine Conversion

Name: Bergamot Bamboo

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bermuda Triangle

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Better & Better

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into glass filled with cubed or crushed ice.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Biblical Quartet

Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with dry cider.
Garnish: Apple slice or dehydrated apple slice

Name: Bicardar

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bikini Martini

Making: POUR prosecco and liqueurs into glass. ADD ice. Top with soda.

Name: Bishop

Making: Use a heatproof glass and preheat by filling with boiling water. MUDDLE cloves in the base of shaker. Add boiling water and STIR in honey and other ingredients. Fine strain into glass. (Consider heating in MICROWAVE for twenty seconds to boost temperature).

Name: Bistro Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Tuaca liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bitches Brew
Ingredients: ['1 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 shot Egg (white & yolk)']
Making: DRY SHAKE all ingredients without ice. Add ice, SHAKE again and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bitter Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 spoon Honey', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bitter Mai Tai
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot 100% pot still rums (40-45% alc./vol.)', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Lime slice wheel & mints sprigs bouquet

Name: Bitter Maid
Ingredients: ['2 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Montenegro amaro', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄24 shot Pernod anise', '5 fresh Mint leaves']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bittersweet Victory
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black 'N' Blue Caipirovska
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Blackberries', '10 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE berries in base of glass. Add other ingredients. Fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Serve with straws.

Name: Black Basil
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Basil leaves', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add next 4 ingredients (all but tonic water), SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water and lightly stir.

Name: Black Bison Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Coffee Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1⁄6 shot Crème brûlée syrup', '1⁄6 shot Caramel sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Coffee Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄6 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Corn & Oil
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', "1 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Black Cuban
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 grind Black pepper', '1 2⁄3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE mint in base of glass. Add next 4 ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Black Diamond #2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum (from freezer)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (chilled)", '10 gram Ground coffee', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making:
1. Combine all ingredients in a frozen tumbler glass and stir to integrate ground coffee. (Vasilis Kyritsis specifies Colombia coffee as this "gives more acid notes with floral and fruit aftertaste). If you don't have scales to hand then 10 gram of ground coffee has a volume of approx. 30ml in an Easy Jigger
2. Moisten filter paper in a Hario V60 dripper or similar and place over chilled cup. Pour combined ingredients into filter.
3. Patiently wait a couple of minutes while the cocktail drips through the paper and then enjoy.

Name: Black Feather
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Forest Gateau
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄4 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. FLOAT cream on drink. (It pays to whip cream first.)

Name: Black Forest Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄6 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and pour into ice-filled glass.

Name: Black Hotel
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '3⁄4 shot Tawny port', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Jack
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "4 drop Bob's Liquorice bitters", '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Jack Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Magic
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Red grapes (seedless)', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add liqueur, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Black Magic No.2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Montenegro amaro', '1 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Black Nail #1
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', "1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Honey flavoured vodka']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black River
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot White overproof rum', '2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '2⁄3 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Rum Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR all ingredients into a glass half filled with crushed ice. SWIZZLE and then fill the glass with more crushed ice.

Name: Black Rumhattan
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Russian
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Black Sabbath
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '3⁄4 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Spring
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 shot Nardini Amaro', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.

Name: Black Strap
Ingredients: ['2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '2 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Tie
Ingredients: ['1 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 spoon Black strap molasses', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Black Velvet
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Stout beer', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: Slowly POUR ingredients into chilled glass.
Garnish: None (unless drinking to celebrate St. Patrick's Day in which case consider a shamrock or mint leaf)

Name: Blackberry Agave Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '6 fresh Blackberries', '1 shot Agave syrup', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass and MUDDLE.

2. Add blackberries and MUDDLE some more.

3. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

4. Add agave syrup to serving glass.

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Blackberry Mint Margarita Julep
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Blackberries', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '8 fresh Mint leaves']
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into cup/glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Blackberry & mint sprig bouquet. Serve with straws

Name: Blackthorn (Kirschwasser)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blackthorn No.2 (Savoy's)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Skewered blackthorn or blueberries berries (beware blackthorn berries look tasty but are very very sour)

Name: Blade Runner
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '2 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Blah, Blah, Blah!
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Blackberries', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blanche Corpse Reviver
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot La Fée Absinthe Blanche', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blanche Refresher
Ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Absinthe Blanche', "1 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Drizzle Green Chartreuse all over the top of the drink.

Name: Blinker
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "4 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blood, Smoke & Tears
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '5⁄6 shot Tawny port', '5⁄12 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: Smoke chilled glass with a rosemary sprig and leave upturned while making the cocktail to retain smoke. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into smoked glass.

Name: Bloodhound #1
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bloodhound #2
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bloody Caesar
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '4 shot Clamato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '7 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '3 dash Worcestershire sauce', '2 pinch Celery salt', '2 grind Black pepper']
Making: ROLL rather than shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bloody Maria
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '4 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1⁄2 spoon Horseradish sauce', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '2 pinch Celery salt', '2 grind Black pepper']
Making: ROLL rather than shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Salt & pepper rim plus celery stick

Name: Bloomsbury Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Eyed Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄12 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Hawaii
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino cherry, paper parasol and straw

Name: Blue Lagoon
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass and STIR. Fill glass with ice and TOP with lemon-lime soda.

Name: Blue Lassi
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka (infused with vanilla)', '1 1⁄2 shot Yoghurt liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '2 dash Rose water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Moon Cocktail (1940's recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Moon Cocktail (Dale DeGroff's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 spoon Oolong tea', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '1 fresh Sage leaves']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker (just to break skin). ADD vodka and one heaped spoon of oolong tea and stir in base of shaker for 60 seconds (or better still, leave to steep for ten minutes). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Nightcap
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 spoon Honey', '1 dash Black walnut bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Paradise
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Velvet Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blueberry Cocktail
Ingredients: ['24 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3⁄4 shot Sauvignon blanc wine']
Making: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blueberry Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['20 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Myrtille liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blueberry Martini
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Myrtille liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blueberry Tea
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', 'Top up with Breakfast tea (hot)']
Making: POUR first two ingredients into glass, top up with tea and stir.

Name: Bluegrass
Ingredients: ['2 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blush
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Cranberry puree

Name: Blush Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blushin' Russian
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blushing Monk
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '5⁄12 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Angostura Bitters dash in a single line across top egg white foam to form a brown line representing the rope that ties a monk's robe.

Name: Bohemian Mule
Ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.

Name: Bolero Sour
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into an ice-filled glass.

Name: Bolshoi Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '1 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Bombay Lassi Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 whole Green cardamom pods', '5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Greek yogurt']
Making: MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bombay No. 2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄24 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe (omit for Cocktails Made Easy)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bon Accord
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Lillet Rouge', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bon Bon
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & Bon Bon sweets

Name: Bon Vivant
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1 dash Black walnut bitters', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bonnie Prince Charles
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Half lime slice wheel on rim or float dehydrated lime slice

Name: Bosom Caresser
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rainwater/Verdelho (med-dry) Madeira wine', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Boston Deluxe
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Saffron syrup (2:1 sugar syrup heated with saffron fronds)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Boston Flip
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2 shot Rainwater/Verdelho (med-dry) Madeira wine', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Boulevard
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Bouquet
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Rose sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bourbon Blush
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup']
Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bourbon Cookie
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄2 shot Butterscotch liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bourbon Mule
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into mug/glass and briefly stir. Two-thirds fill glass with cubed ice. TOP with ginger beer and fill mug/glass with a crown of crushed ice.
Garnish: Lime slice, mint sprigs bouquet & straw

Name: Bourbon Renewal
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon wedge or blackcurrants (ideally) or blackberries when in season

Name: Bourbon Skin
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3 shot Boiling water', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Place barspoon in warmed glass. POUR all ingredients into warmed glass and STIR.

Name: Boxcar
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Sugar rim & orange zest twist (expressed & then discarded)

Name: Brainstorm
Ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Brandy Buck

Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange & lemon grated zest mixed with caster sugar rim

Name: Brandy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brandy Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with soda.

Name: Brandy Smash
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Brazen Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['4 fresh Blackcurrants', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1 shot Cachaça', '1 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']

Name: Brazilian Nail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Breakfast Gimlet
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '2 spoon Orange marmalade', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker to dissolve marmalade. Add lemon juice and lime cordial, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bridgetown Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '5⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5⁄12 shot Grapefruit juice (ruby red)', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brighton Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brits Spritz
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '5⁄6 shot Ginseng aperitif', '5⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']

Name: Broadmoor cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bronze Adonis
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1 1⁄2 shot Ambre/amber vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Manzanilla sherry', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']

Name: Brooklyn (St George version)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brown Bomber
Ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)']

Name: Brownie
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄6 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR malt extract in glass with Scotch until malt extract dissolves. Add ice and one shot of Scotch and stir. Add remaining Scotch, sugar and Angostura and stir some more. Add more ice and keep stirring so that ice dilutes the drink.

Name: Buck's Fizz
Ingredients: ['3 1⁄3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine (chilled)', '1 2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed) (chilled)']
Making: POUR half the champagne into a chilled glass, then the orange juice and finally the rest of the champagne.

Name: Buena Vida
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Bull's Blood
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Buona Sera Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bushranger
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and stain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Butterfly Cocktail
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '3 fresh Basil leaves', '3 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Butterscotch Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Byrrh Cassis
Ingredients: ['3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass in the following order and lightly stir.

Name: Bywater
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', "1⁄6 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (optionally over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Byzantine
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime & lemongrass cordial', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients apart from tonic water, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Name: C C Kazi
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cable Car
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Spiced rum', '3⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Cinnamon & sugar rim & orange zest twist (discarded)

Name: Cablegram
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Ginger syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Cadillac Margarita (AKA Grand Margarita)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Difford's Margarita Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Café Colonial
Ingredients: ['1 cube Sugar cube', "5 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1⁄3 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1⁄6 shot Gingerbread sugar syrup']
Making: Soak sugar cube with chocolate bitters and coffee. MUDDLE cube and STIR until sugar dissolved. Add other ingredients along with ice and STIR. Top with more ice and serve.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (and serve with a small cup of black coffee in the side)

Name: Caipirinha (Contemporary Serve)
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Cachaça', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils in its skin. Add cachaça and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

Name: Caipirinha (no added sugar & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water', '1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and slice on half into 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add sweetener and MUDDLE.

3. If using cubed ice straight from the freezer, add chilled water (or optionally add fruit of your choice) and MUDDLE some more. If using watery ice then omit water.

4. When sure muddling has fully extracted fruit juice, POUR the muddled fruit and sweetener into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (the glass used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to mix with other ingredients.

6. If using cubed ice, crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Caipirissima
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils in its skin. Add rum and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

Name: Caipirovska
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils in its skin. Add vodka and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

Name: Caipiruva
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '4 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
Making: MUDDLE lime wedges and grapes in base of shaker to release juices. Add cachaça and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

Name: Cajun Moon

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Half lime wheel on rim dusted with Tajin seasoning/chilli flakes

Name: Californian Martini
