Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Calvados Appletini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '2⁄3 shot Americano Bianco']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Calvados Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']

Name: Calvados Mon Amour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. POUR berry liqueur into the centre of drink to form a sunrise effect.

Name: Cameron's Kick
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Campirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '1⁄4 fresh Ruby red grapefruit (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE lime and grapefruit in base of shaker to release juices. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

Name: Canadian Apple (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['3 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Cantaritos
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 pinch Salt', '2 shot Pink grapefruit soda']

If using a Cantaritos clay pot (instead of a collins glass) submerge the pot in cold water to clean the inside and wet the outside clay.

POUR ingredients into ice-filled pot or glass and STIR. Consider serving with straws.
Glass: Cantaritos clay pot or Collins glass

Name: Capercaillie
Ingredients: ["1 2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Caprice
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Captain Collins
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Canadian blended whisky', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']

Name: Carthusian Nail

Making: STIR spiced rum and jam in the base of a mixing glass until the jam is dissolved. Add cold brew coffee and lime juice, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably large chunks of ice). TOP with tonic water.

Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3 1⁄2 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '7 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1⁄2 spoon Horseradish sauce', '2 pinch Celery salt', '2 pinch Black pepper']

Ingredients: ['2 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE cucumber and mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cucumber & Mint Seltz
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Cucumber & Mint', '5 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Cucumber Jalapeño Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '3 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1⁄6 inch Jalapeno slice', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz/15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add cucumber and jalapeño and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz highball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Cucumber Sake-Tini

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dead Parrot Colada
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Akvavit / Aquavit', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Coconut water', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and serve with straws.
Garnish: Small stuffed dead parrot that's passed on, no more, expired and gone to meet 'is maker, a stiff, bereft of life, rests in peace, pushing up the daisies, off the twig, kicked the bucket, shuffled off 'is mortal coil, run down the curtain and joined the bleedin' choir invisible. An ex-parrot. And preferably one with "lovely plumage".

Name: Death By Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '3 scoop Chocolate ice cream']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with straws.

Name: Death By Morning
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Branca Menta liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & float mint leaf or peg to rim

Name: Death In The Gulf Stream
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 grated zest of Lime (fresh)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) and add more ice until glass is filled.

Name: Death in Venice
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', "3 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '4 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: POUR Campari and grapefruit bitters into chilled glass and TOP with Prosecco.

Name: Deauville
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Deauville (Difford's)
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Delmarva Cocktail No.1
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dempsey
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Derby Cocktail
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 dash Peach bitters', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (optional)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Mint leaf (float or peg/stick to rim)

Name: Derby Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Half orange & lime wheels on rim

Name: Derby Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Deshler Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '2 twist Orange peel', '1 twist Lemon peel']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Desire
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Detroit Athletic Club
Ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float thin lemon wheel or dehydrated slice of lemon on surface

Name: Detroit Irish Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Tuaca liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Detroit Martini
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '3 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients (including mint) with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Detropolitan
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Devil's Horn
Ingredients: ['1 slice Red jalapeño/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded & chopped (fine sliced)', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just press) chilli pepper in base of shaker to release its flavour. (If you muddle hard then the finished cocktail will be overly spicy). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Two chillies on rim to form devil's horns

Name: Devil's Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Devil's Share
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Maple syrup']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Diamond Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with champagne.

Name: Diki-Diki
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '5⁄6 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dimi-tini
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ding-A-Ling
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '2⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass over one large ice ball.

Name: Diplomat
Ingredients: ['2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & skewered Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Diplomat Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dirty Sanchez
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Agavero liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: Dirty(ish) Banana cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice.

Name: Divino's
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 1⁄2 shot Barolo wine', '1 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Doctor Funk
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Doctor No.3
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Doctor No.4
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dolores #1
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1 shot Fino sherry']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Don's Coco Punch
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Coconut sugar syrup', '2 shot Pineapple puree', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dopo Cena
Ingredients: ['1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 spoon Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (2 sugar to 1 water)", '1 dash Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dorado Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]

Name: Dorchester
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR honey with vodka and lime juice in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add ice, SHAKE and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dreamy Dorini Smoking Martini
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 dash Pernod anise']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄12 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']

Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with beer.

Name: Dry Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Passion fruit syrup', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dry Martini (2:1.5 ratio) Sopping Wet

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dubliner Cocktail

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dubonnet Cocktail No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dutch Breakfast Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1⁄6 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dutch Courage
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']

Name: Dutch Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dutch Master
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄6 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dutch Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 fresh Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Dutch Word
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '2⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lime zest twist (discarded) & lime wedge on rim

Name: Dutchess
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Dyevitchka
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Earl Grey Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Early Evening Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 pinch Salt', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass). POUR soda into drink slowly from a height in order to build a (Ramos Gin Fizz style) thick foamy head. Serve with a straw.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discard) Lemon wedge & Luxardo maraschino cherry.

Name: East 8 Hold-up cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Passion fruit syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: East India House
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: East Village Athletic Club
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: East Wind
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eastern Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Giffard Mirabelle de Lorraine', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eastern Promise
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rose sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eastern Promises
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eastern Raspberry Sidecar
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Sake', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eastern Sin
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Easy Tiger
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 spoon Honey', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add honey and tequila, and STIR until honey is dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eclipse Cocktail (by Harry Craddock)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin']
Making: Drop pitted black olive into glass and cover with grenadine. STIR gin and sloe gin with ice and carefully strain and slowly pour down the shaft of a bar spoon to layer over grenadine.

Name: Eddie Brown
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eden
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Name: Eggnog (hot)
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: POUR ingredients into heatproof glass and STIR thoroughly. HEAT in microwave oven for a minute (adjust time as appropriate to your oven) and STIR again. Alternatively, mix and warm in pan over heat - do not boil.

Name: Eggs-cellent
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', "8 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eider Duck
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Burro
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: El Camello Loco
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 shot Pilsner lager']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: El Coco
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Coconut water', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Diablo Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: El Luchador
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Thyme syrup made infusing 20-30g fresh thyme with 1 litre hot water for around 10 mins, then mixed with 1 kg white sugar.

Name: El Magico
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄6 shot Soy milk']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Honey basil syrup (1:1)

Name: El Momento Perfecto
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '2⁄3 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 spoon Orange marmalade']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of black ice).

Name: El Murciélago
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer', '1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Negra Superior']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer and crushed ice. FLOAT dark rum.

Name: El Presidente (sans grenadine)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: El Presidente Menocal Special
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Puente
Ingredients: ['2 unit Black olives', '3 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making:
MUDDLE olives and basil in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled copper mug.

*Special ingredient #1: Coriander syrup
Garnish: Olive wrapped in a lemon peel & basil

Name: El Tindero
Ingredients: ['1 shot Pilsner lager', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 shot Coconut water', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1⁄6 shot Apple Cider vinegar', '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR beer into chilled glass and set aside. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into beer charged glass. Finally add ice to glass.

Name: El Torado
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Elder & Wiser
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Elder Aviator
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Elder Fashion
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.

Name: Elder Fashioned

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Elderflower Collins
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5⁄6 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']

Name: Elderflower Gimlet

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chill glass (without ice). TOP with soda.

Name: Elderflower Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Creme de Chataigne', '1⁄2 shot Pineau des Charentes blanc', '1⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2 dash Lemon bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Elixirita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lime (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Elk Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot La Vieille Prune plum brandy', '5⁄12 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Elysian
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]

Name: Emerald Martini

Name: Emerald Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Coconut milk', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']

Name: Emperor's Memoirs
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Ginger cordial (non-alcoholic)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: Enchanted Field Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Liquore Strega', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']

Name: English Garden
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 2⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Entwistle's Error
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Name: Envy
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2⁄3 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Epestone Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Esquire #1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']

Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Eureka Cocktail

Name: Extra Sangria

Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Extradition

Name: Eye Candy
Ingredients: ['3 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add next 5 ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with a splash soda and briefly stir.

Making: SHAKE and strain all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Falconi
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Tawny port', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']

Name: Fall Enzoni
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Red grapes (seedless)', '1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Favola
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: FBI

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: FERT 61

Name: Few Words

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over block ice).

Name: Fibber McGee
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fiendtini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄8 shot Pickled cucumber/gherkin brine/vinegar']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fiesta
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']

Name: Filibuster
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Final Ward
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fine & Dandy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Finitaly
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Finnberry Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lapponia Lakka Cloudberry', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine stain into chilled glass.

Name: Fireman's Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Fireplace Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '4 shot Chilled water', '1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Honey sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: POUR whisky and water into ice-filled glass and set aside. Separately, STIR other ingredients with ice. Discard contents of glass and strain stirred cocktail into the chilled Islay whisky washed glass.

Name: First of July
Ingredients: ['4 fresh Blackberries', '2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fix (Generic Name)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Fruit juice (often pineapple)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Fizz (generic name)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', '1 shot Freshly squeezed lemon or lime juice', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba) (optional)', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass). TOP with soda (ideally dispensed from a siphon).

Name: Fizz á la Violette
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Old Tom gin', '1⁄4 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making:
1/ Flash BLEND first 6 ingredients without ice (to emulsify mix). Then pour contents of blender into shaker and SHAKE with ice. Strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass) and TOP with soda from siphon.

Alternatively: 2/ SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice). TOP with soda water from siphon.

Name: French Kiss No.3
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: French Kiwi & Apple Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1⁄2 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '1⁄6 shot Pernod anise', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add Kiwi fruit and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. Add apple juice and anis liqueur, then STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and serve with straws.

Name: Gin Fix
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) drink with ice and serve with straws.

Name: Gin Fixed
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) drink with ice and serve with straws.

Name: Gin Garden
Ingredients: ['1 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gin Genie
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Gin Gin Mule
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '12 fresh Mint leaves', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: Gin Punch No. 2
Ingredients: ['3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Serve with straws.

Name: Gin Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Gin Sling
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.

Name: Gin-Ger & Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker, add gin and sugar, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Name: Gin-Ger Tom
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Gina
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into chilled glass, add ice and briefly stir.

Name: Ginger & Fig Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '1 fresh Figs (chopped)', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add fig and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz highball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) and ginger liqueur into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Ginger & Lemongrass Martini
Ingredients: ['1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1⁄2 fresh Lemongrass stem', '2 spoon Honey', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water']
Making: MUDDLE ginger and lemongrass in base of shaker. Add other ingredients and STIR until honey dissolves. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ginger Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Green ginger wine', '3⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ginger Mojito
Ingredients: ['3 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add mint and lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise). Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Ginger Snap
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Ginger Snap (Fino Sherry & Ginger Ale)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Fino sherry', '3 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.
Garnish: Lemon zest spiral cut with a channel knife

Name: Gingerbread Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Green ginger wine', '2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gingertini

Name: Giuseppe's Habit

Name: Giuseppi's Sour

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 1⁄2 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gloom Chaser (Embury)

Making: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass and TOP with water. Leave the mixture to stand in the glass. Separately, STIR other ingredients with ice. Finally, discard contents of absinthe-washed glass and strain contents of shaker into absinthe-washed glass. (No ice in the finished drink.)

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grape Cocktail
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass

Name: Grape Delight

Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add rest of ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grape Martini

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grapple Martini

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Ghost
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Name: Green Glazier

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Negroni
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Bitter Bianco liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur']

Name: Green Tea Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄4 shot Pisang Ambon green banana liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Tea Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Green tea liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Green tea (cold)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Guard's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Green melon liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: MUDDLE rosemary and raisins with gin in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: H.S.L. Special
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Ingredients: ['1 slice Red jalapeño/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded & chopped (fine sliced)', '1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Drambuie liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon Honey sugar syrup', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Don't be tempted to shake as this detrimentally thins the drink. Instead, consider rolling or throwing.)
