Name: Illicit Affair
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Illusion
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Green melon liqueur', '2 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Imperial Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Income Tax Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Indian Rose
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Rose water', '1⁄4 shot Rose sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Indochine
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Ginger liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Inga from Sweden
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Pear & cognac liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)']
Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Ink Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 1⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Insomniac
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '2⁄3 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: International Incident
Ingredients: ['1 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Hazelnut liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Intimate Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ionian Spritz cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

Name: IPAlicus
Ingredients: ['1 shot Italicus liqueur', '4 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

Name: Irish Alexander
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Irish Blonde
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Irish Coffee 'Martini'
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Irish Espresso'tini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Irish Shandy
Ingredients: ['1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '2 1⁄2 shot Lemonade', '2 1⁄2 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Irresistible
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: IS talking
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: STIR first ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic.

Name: It & T
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Italicus liqueur', '4 shot Mediterranean tonic water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass & briefly stir.

Name: Italian Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '2 2⁄3 shot Filter coffee (hot)', '1⁄2 shot Double cream / heavy cream']
Making: POUR first two ingredients into pre-warmed heat-proof glass. TOP with warmed whipped/shaken cream.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) and dust surface with freshly grated nutmeg

Name: Italian Job #2
Ingredients: ['1 shot Tuaca liqueur', '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', 'Top up with Shiraz red wine']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with wine and serve with straws.

Name: Italian Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian Brandy', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '3 1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Italian Sun
Ingredients: ['2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: ItaliCup
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '3⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda.

Name: Ja-Mora
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Jack Punch
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Jack's Godfather Highball
Ingredients: ['1 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2 1⁄2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Jack-in-the-Box
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jackie O's Rose
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄24 shot Rose water', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jacktini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jade Garden
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Jasmine tea (cold)', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Jaded Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully POUR blue curaçao through centre of drink (it should sink to the bottom).

Name: Jalisco
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jalisco Mint Julep
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', "2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Bob's Lavender Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into julep cup half-filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon. Top up the cup with more crushed ice and CHURN again. Crown the drink with some fresh crushed ice, garnish and serve.
Garnish: Mint sprigs dusted with icing sugar

Name: Jamaican Mule
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Spiced rum', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into mug/glass and briefly stir. Two-thirds fill glass with cubed ice. TOP with ginger beer and fill glass with a crown of crushed ice.
Garnish: Lime slice, mint sprigs bouquet & straw

Name: Jamaican Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot White overproof rum', '1 1⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Jambouree
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Apricot jam (preserve)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR preserve with bourbon in base of shaker until mostly dissolved. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: James Joyce
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Japanese Slipper
Ingredients: ['1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Luxardo maraschino cherry dropped into drink

Name: Jasmine
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jean Gabin
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄6 shot Maple syrup', '2 1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat) (steamed foaming)']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into a warmed heat-resistant glass and STIR until maple syrup dissolves before POURING heated milk into the drink.

Name: Jean Lafitte Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 fresh Egg yolk', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jean Marc
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '4 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', 'Top up with Sparkling apple juice']
Making: MUDDLE mint and ginger in base of shaker. Add next two ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with Appletiser, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Jelly Belly Beany
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2⁄3 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jenever Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Jerez
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1 shot La Vieille Prune plum brandy', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Jersey Rose
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Strawberry candy (bonbon) syrup', '3⁄4 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 shot Medium dry apple cider', '3 dash Aphrodite Bitters']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP up with cider and add bitters onto foam for aroma.

Name: Jim Jam
Ingredients: ['1 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jimmie Roosevelt
Ingredients: ['1 whole Sugar cube', '8 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: Soak sugar cube with Angostura and drop into base of glass. POUR cognac, sugar syrup and champagne over soaked cube. Fill glass with cracked (not crushed) ice and finish with a FLOAT of Chartreuse.
Garnish: None "no pineapple, no mint sprig, no cherry garnish"

Name: Jockey Club
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Crème de noyau liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: John Collins
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: John Daly
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 shot Black tea (cold)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Jolt'ini
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄4 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄4 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jose Collins
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda. .
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Juan & Jeanne
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '2⁄3 shot Blood orange liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jubilant
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Judgement Day
Ingredients: ['1 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Juicy Gypsy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jules Delight
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot White balsamic vinegar', '3⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Jumpin' Jack Flash
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Juniport Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into empty chilled glass. TOP with soda from a siphon.

Name: Jupiter Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kamikaze
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kanu-No
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄4 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄4 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄6 shot Cream sherry (medium/sweet)', '1⁄6 shot Ruby port']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Kava
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kawahori
Ingredients: ['1 spoon *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Akashi-Tai Shiraume Ginjo Umeshu', '2 spoon Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Yukari rice seasoning

Name: Kee-Wee Martini
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Cut kiwi fruit in half, scoop out flesh into base of shaker and MUDDLE. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kentucky Colonel
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Peach purée', '1⁄4 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Kentucky Dream
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: STIR vanilla liqueur and bitters with two ice cubes in a glass. Add half the bourbon and two more ice cubes. Stir some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the bourbon. Add the last two ingredients and more ice cubes and stir lots more. The melting and stirring of the ice cubes is essential to the dilution and taste of the drink.

Name: Kentucky Jewel
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kentucky Maid
Ingredients: ['4 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '6 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Kentucky Muffin
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Blueberries (fresh)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. (Or reduce sugar syrup to 10ml (1/3oz) and serve over cubed ice.)

Name: Key Lime
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Lime flavoured vodka', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
Making: BLEND all ingredients without ice and serve.

Name: Key Lime Pie #1
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur (chilled)', '2 shot Single cream / half-and-half (chilled)', '1 1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: DRY SHAKE (without ice) cream and vanilla liqueur in a pre-chilled shaker to mix and aerate. Use to rim glass and set the remainder rest aside. SHAKE last 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass. Then carefully float pre-prepared cream and liqueur mix over the cocktail's surface.
Garnish: Pie rim - wipe outside edge of glass rim with cream mix (from the float) and dip into crunched-up Graham Cracker or digestive biscuits.

Name: Key Lime Pie #2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass. To make the pie rim, wipe outside edge of rim with cream mix and dip into crunched up Graham Cracker or digestive biscuits.

Name: Key Lime Pie #3
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass.

Name: Keyser Söze cocktail
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kicker
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Killer in Red

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Killer Queen
Ingredients: ['1 shot White overproof rum', '1 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄4 shot Rose petal liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: King Cole Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Fernet liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: King of Orange
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

Name: Kingston Negroni

Making: Cut kiwi in half, scoop out flesh into base of shaker and MUDDLE. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

Name: Kiwi Collins
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Cut kiwi fruit in half, scoop out flesh into base of shaker and MUDDLE. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.

Name: Kiwi Crush
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: Cut kiwi fruit in half, scoop out flesh into base of shaker and MUDDLE. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Klondike

Name: Knicker Dropper Glory

Name: Knickerbocker Martini

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Knickerbocker Special
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Koi Yellow
Ingredients: ['2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Name: Koningsdag cocktail

Name: Koolaid
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Green melon liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Krakow Tea
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1 shot Camomile tea (cold)', '3 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise). SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: L'Americano
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: L'Americano Moderno
Ingredients: ['2 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '4 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 1⁄3 shot Elderberry & hibiscus soda']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: L'amour En Fuite
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur']
Making:
1. POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and leave to stand.
2. Separately STIR gin, vermouth and elderflower liqueur with ice.
3. DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and STRAIN contents of mixing glass into absinthe-coated glass. (No ice in glass.)

Name: L'Anniversaire (The Birthday)
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Raisin sugar syrup (2:1 homemade)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: L'apocalypse Ultime (The ultimate Apocalypse)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', "1⁄3 shot L'Esprit De June Liqueur", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", "2 dash Boker's bitters", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne

Name: L'Arte Della Bellezza
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Italicus liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '2⁄3 shot Americano Bianco']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: La Bicyclette
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 dash Peach bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: La Bouche Reelle (The Real Mouth) No.2
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Ginger jam', '5⁄6 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '5⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '5⁄12 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']

Name: La Condesa

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: La Confiture
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon Orange marmalade', '4 drop Orange cream citrate']

Name: La Palma
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Coconut sugar syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']

Name: La Petite Bouche

Ingredients: ['1 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1 shot Lillet Rouge', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Leave A Message After The Beep...
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Rubino', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade raspberry shrub (6% abv)

Special ingredient #2: Homemade thyme sugar syrup (2:1)
Garnish: Thyme sprig and Angostura Bitters dashes

Name: Leave It To Me No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Legend Reviver
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth (Star anise infused)', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄12 shot Caramel sugar syrup', '3 drop Whiskey barrel aged bitters', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into absinthe misted glass.

Name: Lekker Lekker
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄2 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lemmy
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)', '4 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']

Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bison grass vodka', '5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1 2⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']

Ingredients: ['3⁄4 fresh Lemon (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: MUDDLE lemon in base of shaker, add other ingredients and SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Pour into glass without straining and serve with straws.

Name: Lemon Chiffon Pie
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and serve with straws.

Name: Lemon Drop Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lemon Meringue Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Irish cream liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lemon Meringue Pie'tini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', "1 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled and rimmed glass. DRY SHAKE cream and liqueur (without ice) so as to mix and whip. FLOAT cream & liqueur mix by pouring over back of spoon.
Garnish: Pie rim - wipe outside edge of rim with cream mix and dip into crunched up Graham Cracker or digestive biscuits.

Name: Lemon Sorbet
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Chilled water', '1 cupful White caster sugar', '1⁄2 cupful Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5 fresh Lemon peel', '1⁄4 cupful Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2 spoon Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: Heat water in pan and add sugar. Simmer and stir until sugar dissolves, add lemon juice and grated lemon rind and continue to simmer and stir for a few minutes. Take off the heat and allow to cool. Fine strain into a shallow container and stir in liqueur and orange bitters. Beat egg whites and fold into mix. Place in freezer and store for up to 3-4 days before use.

Name: Lemonade Spritz (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Lemony
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Leninade
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) and lemon slice

Name: Lightness Cocktail

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Like A Lady

Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lime Sour

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Limeade (Alcohol-free*)

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Limoncello and Tonic

Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Limoncello Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '3 2⁄3 shot Brewed cold black breakfast tea', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Limoncello Spritz
Ingredients: ['1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
