Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bison grass vodka', '5⁄6 shot Avallen Calvados', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 fresh Wasabi leaf']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Livingstone
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Loch Almond Highball
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '5⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into chilled glass and then fill with ice.
Garnish: Amaretti biscuit resting across glass rim & ice

Name: London Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "1⁄24 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: London Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: London Scramble
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. DRIZZLE créme de mûre over drink (will slowly bleed through the cocktail).

Name: Londoner (Wood's recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea Cocktail
Ingredients: ['5⁄12 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄12 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄12 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: SHAKE first 8 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola.

Name: Long Island Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 shot Lemonade']
Making: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade. Serve with a stirrer.

Name: Long Island Spiced Tea
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Spiced rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Lonsdale
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Honey sugar syrup', '3 fresh Basil leaves', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: STIR honey syrup with gin until honey dissolves. TEAR basil leaves and add to shaker with all other ingredients. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Look for the Silver Lining
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 shot Vanilla ice cream']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. Add ice-cream and FROSTED DRY SHAKE (without ice) and pour into chilled glass.

Name: Loose Talk
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '5⁄12 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '5⁄12 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Mist with flamed Green Chartreuse & rosemary sprig pegged to rim

Name: Loud Speaker Cocktail
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Louisville Sour cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Jade Perique La Veritable Liqueur de Tabac', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & dash Angostura aromatic bitters

Name: Love & Murder
Ingredients: ['1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Love Unit
Ingredients: ['2 slice Red bell pepper', '7 fresh Basil leaves (thai)', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum (infused with vanilla)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE pepper in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lucien Gaudin
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lucky Golden Oranges
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Kumquat liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Name: Lux Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with ½ scoop of crushed ice and serve in chilled glass.

Name: Luxury Mojito
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE mint in glass with sugar and lime juice. Fill glass with crushed ice, add rum, Angostura and champagne, then stir.

Name: Lychee & Elderflower Spritz
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine', '5⁄6 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR prosecco and liqueurs into glass. Add ice and TOP with soda.

Name: Lychee & Rose Petal Martini
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Rose petal liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lychee juice drink', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lychee & Sake Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Sake']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lychee Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lychee juice drink', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Lychee syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lynchburg Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass, add a splash of soda, fill glass with ice and TOP with soda.

Name: M.G.F.
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Ketel One Oranje Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Maçã Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Machine Head
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Xocolatl mole bitters', '3 pinch Lychee rose tea (smoked)']
Making: POUR all ingredients except tea into mixing glass. SMOKE tea using a chefs smoker and direct smoke into mixing glass. Cover to capture smoke for a minute or so. Remove cover, STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Luxardo Maraschino cherry & orange zest twist

Name: Macka
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Madame Mayahuel
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄6 shot Crème de violette liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mae West cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Maestro
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Maple syrup', '1 dash Balsamic vinegar of Modena']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mai Suit & Tai
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Italicus liqueur', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed) (clarified)', '3 dash *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade almond, pecan, cinnamon and maple syrup orgeat
Special ingredient #2: Smoke & Oak Bitters
Garnish: Bowtie, cinnamon stick, maple nut mix, activated charcoal and sugar dusted mint sprig

Name: Mai Tai (Beaumont-Gantt's recipe)
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Lightly muddle mint in base of shaker (just to bruise). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Maiden's Blush
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Maiden's Prayer
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mainbrace
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Maison Charles Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Malcolm Lowry
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Man-Bour-Tini
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mañana Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Manchester Special Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Overproof pot still rum', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR honey with rum until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Mandarine Daisy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mandarine Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mandarito
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of glass. Add next four ingredients, half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir). Fill glass to brim with more crushed ice and churn some more. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Mango Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1 2⁄3 shot Mango purée']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mango Collins
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 shot Mango purée', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Mango Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2 shot Mango purée', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mango Margarita (frozen)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Mango purée', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Mango Margarita (served 'straight up')
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Mango purée', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mango Punch
Ingredients: ['2 shot White overproof rum', '3 shot Mango purée', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Manhattan (Sweet with Bitter Chocolate)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', "6 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Square of 80% cacao chocolate balanced on rim

Name: Manicure
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', "3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Maple Leaf
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Maple Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '2⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Maple Pomme
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Marama Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise). Add next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Marceau
Ingredients: ['1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with splash soda and briefly stir.

Name: Marconi
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Apple wedge on rim or float dehydrated apple slice

Name: Margaret Duffy
Ingredients: ['2 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Margaret Rose
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Marguerite Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄24 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Marie Rose
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 sprig Rosemary sprig', '8 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Strip leaves from rosemary and MUDDLE with grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mariel
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Coconut water', '1⁄3 shot Honey', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Market Daiquirí
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Pear purée', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Marmalade Cocktail
Ingredients: ['4 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker so as to dissolve marmalade. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Marmarita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Marquee
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Marshmallow 'Martini'
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '5⁄6 shot Passion fruit puree', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Roasted marshmallow & shot of champagne on the side

Name: Martiki
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Coconut water', '1⁄6 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Martinez (Orange)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Martinez (with London Dry gin)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mary Queen of Scots
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Drambuie liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mary Rose
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Rosemary sprig', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: MUDDLE rosemary in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mastiha & Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '4 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

Name: Mastiha Mojito
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more. Keep adding ice and churning until drink fills glass. Serve with straws.

Name: Mastiha Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Matador No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mauresque
Ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '4 shot Chilled water']
Making: POUR absinthe and almond syrup into glass. Ideally, serve iced water separately in a small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste. Lastly, add ice to fill the glass.

Name: May Vesper
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '5⁄6 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Maya Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Calamansi juice (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Pink river salt rim & lime wedge

Name: Mayan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge on rim &/or float 3 coffee beans

Name: Mayfair Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 dried Clove', '1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE clove in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mayfair Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '2 dried Clove', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE cloves in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mediterranean Cooler
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Strawberry flavoured vodka', '5⁄6 shot Tawny port', '3 2⁄3 shot Mediterranean tonic water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.
Garnish: Half strawberry on rim & cinnamon stick stirrer in glass

Name: Meet Me At The Lynchburg Highway
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄12 shot Spicy chili pepper syrup', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: Method: Firstly, infuse Tennessee whiskey with mint stems. STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Meh-Groni
Ingredients: ['2 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mellow Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 1⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mellow White Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Melon Collie Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Melon Daiquiri #1 (served 'up')
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Melon Daiquiri (served frozen)
Ingredients: ['1 segment Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and place in blender. Add other ingredients and BLEND with half scoop of crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Melon Maple Fizz
Ingredients: ['4 cube Melon (Honeydew)', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE melon in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.

Name: Melon Margarita #1 (served 'up')
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Melon Martini (fresh fruit)
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Cut melon into eight segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Meloncholy Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mercado Roma
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 spoon *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice).

Special Ingredient #1: Pineapple Ancho Shrub
Blend equal parts pineapple juice and sugar and leave to rest for 2 hours. Add equal parts white wine vinegar and leave for 24 hours. Then add a teaspoon of chipotle sauce and blend.

Special Ingredient #2: Clove Honey
Add equal parts honey, water and a handful of cloves to a pot and heat at 180˚C for 25 minutes stirring constantly.

Name: Merchant of Venice
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Merry Widow Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '1⁄2 fresh Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice). TOP with soda.

Name: Merry-Go-Round Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Chilled olive on stick or lemon zest twist

Name: Meryl Lynchburg
Ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (or mug), TOP with soda water

Name: Mesa Fresca
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Messianic Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist (and float gold flakes if to hand)

Name: Met Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mexica
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)', '1 pinch Salt']
Making: Read about cocktail measures and measuring.
Garnish:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special Ingredient #1: Homemade dill syrup
Add 160 grams of dill to 1 litre sugar syrup. Allow to infuse for at least 24 hours, strain and bottle.

Name: Mexican
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mexican 55
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Mexican Firing Squad Special
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange slice, pineapple wedge & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Mexican Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "1 dash Difford's Margarita Bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mexican Squeeze
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '4 shot Lemonade']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

Name: Mexican Surfer
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mexican Vineyard
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE 8 grapes in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mezcal Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.

Name: Miami Beach
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Miami Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Miami Martini
Ingredients: ['1 wedge Watermelon (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: MiAmor
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '2⁄3 shot Rosato/rosé vermouth', '1⁄12 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain onto chilled glass.

Name: Michelada
Ingredients: ['5⁄12 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)', '1⁄6 shot Worcestershire sauce', 'Top up with Dunkel / dark / black lager']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Coarse sea salt rim - salt the rim of a chilled beer mug by rubbing it with a lime wedge and dipping rim in the coarse salt. Save the lime wedge to squeeze over and drop into finished drink.

Name: Midnight in New York
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Shiraz red wine', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Midsummer Daydream
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Coconut water', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring tonic water.

Name: Milanese Breakfast Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 spoon Orange marmalade', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker to dissolve marmalade. Add Campari and lemon juice, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with Prosecco.

Name: Milano Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', "1 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2 1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Million Dollar Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) & pineapple wedge on rim

Name: Millionaire No.1
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Overproof pot still rum', '3⁄4 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Milly Martini
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE basil (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mimosa
Ingredients: ['3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine (chilled)', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed) (chilled)']
Making: POUR half the champagne into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice), then POUR orange juice and finally the rest of the champagne.

Name: Mint Collins
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Mint Martini
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mirror Match
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄6 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1 dash Jerry Thomas bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mississippi Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mitch Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄4 shot Passion fruit syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mojito de Casa
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of glass. Add tequila, lime juice and sugar. Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and churn some more. TOP with soda, stir and serve.

Name: Molly's Milk
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', 'Float lightly whipped Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: STIR first two ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. FLOAT whipped cream on drink.

Name: Momisette
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ricard Pastis', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', 'Top up with Carbonated/Sparkling/Selzer mineral water']
Making: POUR pastis and almond syrup into glass. Serve with bottle of sparkling water so the customer can dilute to their own taste. (I recommend five shots.) Lastly, add ice to fill glass.

Name: Momo Special
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Monarch Martini
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Peach bitters']
Making: MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Monkey Gland
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe (omit for Cocktails Made Easy)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Monkey Gland No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '5⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Monkey Shine
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '5⁄6 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Monsoon Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', "1⁄2 shot Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 dash Black walnut bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dust 1/3rd foam with chilli powder and float coffee bean

Name: Monte Cassino Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. POUR grenadine around the surface of the drink. (This should sink to form sunrise effect.)

Name: Monte Mule
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '4 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled mug/glass and briefly stir.

Name: Monte Sour
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Montenegro amaro', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Monteleone
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Averna Amaro', '2 dash Cherry bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Montgomery Slugger
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Nocello walnut liqueur', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Montréal
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Pernod anise', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Monza
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop the flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mood Indigo
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Moondream
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Manzanilla sherry', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Moonlight Cocktail (Harry Craddock's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1 1⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Moonshine Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Moonwalk Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 cube Sugar cube', "3 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters", '2 dash Orange flower/blossom water', '5⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: Drop sugar cube into glass and soak with dashes of grapefruit bitters and orange flower water. POUR liqueur over soaked sugar cube. TOP with champagne. (Build in glass like a classic Champagne Cocktail.)
Garnish: Orange zest twist (spray & discard) & quarter orange slice on rim

Name: Morado
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Cream sherry (medium/sweet)', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Morning Glory
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Moscow Mule
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into copper mug/glass and stir. Two-thirds fill vessel with cubed ice. TOP with ginger beer and crown with crushed ice.
Garnish: Lime slice, mint sprigs bouquet & straw

Name: Mosquito
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mother Rum
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Motox
Ingredients: ['1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '10 fresh Coriander / cilantro leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: MUDDLE ginger and coriander in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mr President
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mrs Robinson #1
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Mrs Robinson #2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄3 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with a 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with straws.

Name: Mujer Negra
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).
Garnish: Orange zest twist (discarded) & float roasted coffee bean

Name: Mujer Verde
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mule's Hind Leg
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR (or SHAKE) all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mule-mosa
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed) (chilled)', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '4 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine (chilled)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into chilled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Mulled Apple Black
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '3 1⁄2 shot Blackcurrant juice', '1 shot Claret red wine']
Making: HEAT all ingredients and pour into warmed glass.

Name: Mulled Wine
Ingredients: ['5 dried Clove', '1 pinch Freshly grated nutmeg', '1 pinch Cinnamon powder', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1 1⁄2 shot Shiraz red wine', '1 wedge Orange (fresh fruit)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon Honey', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', 'Top up with Boiling water']
Making: POUR ingredients into pre-warmed glass and stir.

Name: Mure & Lavender Batida
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Cachaça', '1 2⁄3 shot Coconut water', '1⁄2 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '6 fresh Blackberries']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and serve with straws.

Name: My Sherry Amore
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: My Tokyo 1964
Ingredients: ['1 shot Japanese blended whisky', '2⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange juice & sugar rim & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: MyZo
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 inch Red jalapeño/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded & chopped', '1 2⁄3 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '5⁄6 shot Elderflower cordial', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MUDDLE chili in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Nantucket
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']

Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot Cinzano Orancio Vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR one shot of rum with two ice cubes in a glass. Add sugar syrup, vermouth, bitters and two more ice cubes. STIR some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the rum. STIR lots more and add more ice.

Name: Naranja Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: ¼ orange wheel slice on rim

Name: Naughty German
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Jägermeister', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Navigator
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1 1⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '1⁄3 shot Jade Perique La Veritable Liqueur de Tabac', '2 dash Toasted pecan bitters']

Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly STIR.

Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Negroski
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: Pour ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR.

Name: Negus (Hot)

Name: Nelson's Blood Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Ruby port']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: New York, New York
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Whiskey barrel aged bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Next to Last Word
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Nice Poire Martini
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Pear flavoured vodka', '2⁄3 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Night & Day
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur (chilled)', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur (chilled)', '3 1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine (chilled)']

Ingredients: ['1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1⁄2 shot Hot water', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']

Making: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and lightly stir.

Garnish: Lemon slice, mint sprig, raspberry & blackberry

Name: Noblesse
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Nome
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄12 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Fino sherry']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Noon
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Northern Glow
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Rhubarb bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Northern Lights
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '3⁄4 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pernod anise', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Noshino Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1 1⁄2 shot Shochu']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Nouvelle Histoire (New Story)

Name: Nuez Daiquiri

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR honey with bourbon in base of shaker to dissolve honey. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Nutty New Year

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: O' Flower Highball
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Name: Oceans 21

Name: Oddball Manhattan Dry
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']

Name: Old Fashioned Caddy
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Old Flame
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Old Mill
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 shot Green ginger wine', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Old Pal
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Old Tom Gin Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.11)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Old Tom gin', '5⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '1 2⁄3 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']

Garnish: Lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage

Name: Old Vermont
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ole Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: On Bended Knee
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1 shot Ginger liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "3 drop Bob's Cardamom bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Oooh Ginger
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '2⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Opera

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Optimist Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Orang-A-Tang
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄3 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT layer of rum over cocktail.

Name: Orange Bloom Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Orange Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Oranje Vodka', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']

Name: Orange Spur

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Orange Witch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Liquore Strega', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Oranjey Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Ketel One Oranje Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Orchard Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Oriental
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Oriental Grape Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 1⁄2 shot Sake', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Name: Oriental Tartini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass and top with water. Leave the mixture to stand in the glass. Separately, STIR all ingredients with ice. Finally discard contents of absinthe-coated glass and fine strain contents of shaker into absinthe washed glass.

Name: Original Sin (Gin Joint recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SWIZZLE all ingredients in a Julep cup with crushed ice.

Name: Osmo

Name: Passion Fruit Daiquiri

Making: Cut passion fruits in half and scoop out flesh into shaker (saving one half for garnish). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Passion Fruit Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '1 1⁄2 shot White overproof rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh into shaker. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) and then top with champagne.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Patrón Chipotle Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '2 spoon Chilpotle oleo-saccharum', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Read about cocktail measures and measuring.
Garnish: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Patrón City Lights
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Ginseng aperitif', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and TOP with soda.

Nathan uses salted Peychaud's Bitters which he makes with Maldon salt (10g of Maldon salt to one bottle of Peychaud's Bitters).

Name: Patrón Señor Sling
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple sugar syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and lightly stir.
Garnish: Dehydrated pineapple & lime slices with cherry

Name: Patrón Yellow Submarine
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 1⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 drop *Special ingredient #3 (see above)']
Making:
Special Ingredient #1 - Yellow Juice
2 part yellow beetroot to 1 part yellow bell pepper and 1 part yellow tomato

Special Ingredient #2 - Pepper Falernum
1 chile de arbol
1 jalapeno
1 bottle Velvet Falernum

Coarsely chop 1 chile de arbol and 1 jalapeno and infuse with a bottle of velvet falernum for 3 days. Strain and re-bottle.

Special Ingredient #3 - Pink Saline Solution
Combine 5 parts water to 1 part Himalayan pink salt. Stir to dissolve and store in a dropper bottle.

Rim a rocks glass with fine ground dried parsley and Himalayan salt. ADD all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker, SHAKE vigorously with ice and STRAIN into the glass with ice. Garnish with yellow beet pickles.

Name: Patrónomy
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '5⁄6 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '2 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 drop *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR briefly.

Special Ingredient #1: Gentain eau-de-vie
Garnish: Rim glass with black salt. Grapefruit zest twist

Name: Paycheck
