Name: Pimm's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Fruit cup liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Garnish: Lemon & orange zest twists (discarded) & strawberry on rim

Name: Pimm's Cup (or Classic Pimm's)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fruit cup liqueur', '1 slice Orange (fresh fruit)', '1 slice Lemon (fresh)', '1 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '2 slice Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Lemonade', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR Pimm's into glass half filled with ice. Add fruit and fill glass with more ice. TOP with equal parts lemonade and ginger ale (or just use lemonade, or ginger ale). Lightly stir prior to serving.

Name: Piña Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pina Colada Cocktail (Cuban Style)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Pineapple & Ginger Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pineapple Blossom
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pineapple Fix
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Pineapple Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain in ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda,
Garnish: Pineapple or lime wedge on rim

Name: Pineapple Lassi Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 whole Green cardamom pods', '3 wedge Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Yoghurt liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE cardamom and then pineapple in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pineapple Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pineapple Sour
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge or dehydrated pineapple slice

Name: Pink Chihuahua
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pink Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pink Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir to integrate.

Name: Pink Hound
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pink Khaleesi
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Pink peppercorns', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Kleos Mastiha liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: MUDDLE peppercorns in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pink Lemonade (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5⁄12 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Pink Squirrel
Ingredients: ['1 shot Crème de noyau liqueur', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dust with grated nutmeg and line of Peychaud's bitters across surface.

Name: Pino Pepe
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice. POUR into glass (or pineapple shell) and serve with straws. If using a pineapple shell, serve with ice cubes.

Name: Pinot Grinchio
Ingredients: ['1 shot Grain Scotch whisky', '1⁄3 shot Pinot Noir red wine', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE (briefly) all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Pisco Bell Ringer
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: RINSE chilled glass with apricot brandy (swirl liqueur round inside of glass to coat and then shake out excess). SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into apricot rinsed glass.

Name: Pisco Collins
Ingredients: ['2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Pisco Naranja
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Pisco Punch (Lannes' recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with soda.

Name: Pisco Punch (Prosser's recipe)
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Planteur
Ingredients: ['2 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Platinum Blond
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Rosemary sprig', '1 shot Grapefruit flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE rosemary in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Platinum Blonde (creamy)
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '5⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Playa del Mar
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: PLB
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 fresh Lemon (fresh) (chopped)', '1 1⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: MUDDLE lemon in base of a sturdy rocks glass and then pour into serving glass. Fill glass with ice, add limoncello and bitters. TOP with tonic and lightly stir.

Name: Pleasure to Tell
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto', "4 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist & Luxardo maraschino cherry sprayed with chocolate bitters

Name: Plum Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Plum (stoned & peeled)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: CUT plum into quarters, remove stone and peel. MUDDLE plum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Plum Sour
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Plum (stoned & peeled)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE plum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Pogo Stick
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Poinciana
Ingredients: ['4 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Polly's Special
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pompier
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: STIR first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda.

Name: Ponce de Leon
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Poncha
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', "2 1⁄2 shot Torres Aqua d'Or aguardiente", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR honey with aguardiente in base of shaker to dissolve honey. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Pontberry Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Popeye Sour
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Spinach leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Cachaça', '1⁄4 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄4 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE spinach in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float spinach leaf or peg to rim

Name: Popinjay
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '3⁄4 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Port Flip
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Port of Spain cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Praline Pecan Pie
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Pecan liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pre Siesta
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Presbyterian
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly STIR.

Name: Preserve Nippon
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Shiso leaf', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Gently MUDDLE shisho leaf in base of shaker (just to bruise), add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: President
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Prickly Pear Mule
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Pear & cognac liqueur', '1 1⁄4 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '3 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: Prince Charlie
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Prince of Wales
Ingredients: ['1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: RUB sugar cube with lemon zest, coat with dashes of bitters and drop cube into chilled glass. POUR chilled cognac and liqueur over soaked cube and TOP with chilled champagne.

Name: Prince of Wales Punch
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 ring Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port']
Making: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Float the port on drink.

Name: Princess Marina
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Princess Mary
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Princess Mary's Pride
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '5⁄6 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '5⁄6 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato']
Making: STIR (or shake) all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Princeton
Ingredients: ['2 shot Old Tom gin', '1⁄2 shot Tawny port', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)", '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Princeton Martini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Procrastination Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Prohibition Daisy (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN drink and serve with straws.

Name: Prospector No.2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Prune Face
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Prune eau-de-vie', '1⁄4 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: POUR bourbon into a glass with four ice cubes and STIR until ice has at least half melted. Add other ingredients and additional ice and stir some more.

Name: Pruneaux
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Prune syrup (from tinned fruit)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pterodactyl Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Vermouth di Torino', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Public Enemy No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pulp Fiction
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 2⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '5⁄6 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1 2⁄3 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda.

Name: Punch Back
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 shot Cachaça', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 shot Coconut water', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge on rim with cherries on stick

Name: Pura Vida
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Purgatory a la Française
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Purple Cosmo
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot White cranberry juice drink', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Purple Pear Martini
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bison grass vodka', '3⁄4 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '3⁄4 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pursuit of Happiness
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large chunk of block ice).

Name: Quarter Deck
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Quarterback
Ingredients: ['1 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Quebec
Ingredients: ['2 shot Canadian blended whisky', '2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Queens
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Quill
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Quince Mustard Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 spoon Quince mustard jam', '2 grind Black pepper', '1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Quince Sour
Ingredients: ['3 spoon Quince mustard jam', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: STIR quince jam with vodka in base of shaker to dissolve jam. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Quitting Ordinary
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "1⁄2 spoon Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: RAC Cocktail

Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water and drizzle crème de cassis on surface of drink

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Raita Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 dried Green cardamom pods', '1⁄2 spoon Cumin seeds', '1 1⁄2 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Yoghurt liqueur', '1 pinch Salt', '3 fresh Mint leaves']
Making: MUDDLE cardamom, cumin and then cucumber in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Randy Sangaree
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', "3 drop Bob's Vanilla bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Raspberry 'Martini' (by Dick Bradsell)
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Raspberry Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '3 spoon White caster sugar', '8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Cachaça (from freezer)']
Making:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add raspberries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
Garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

Name: Raspberry Collins
Ingredients: ['10 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and serve with straws.

Name: Strawberry Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making:
MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

NOTE: Strawberry pulp is notorious for blocking strainers and sink wastes. Hence, double straining is essential when making this cocktail, as is the use of a quality Hawthorne strainer (I use one with an extra spring and a wide gauge fine strainer with a large capacity). The Hawthorne strainer should retain most of the fruit pulp, along with the ice in the shaker. Pouring through an additional fine strainer ensures the clarity of the cocktail. Even with the best strainers, the pulp will start to restrict the flow towards the end of the pour and moving your shaker to help the liquid find a new escape route helps. Finally, use a bar spoon to help move the pulp in the fine strainer to allow the last of the cocktail through the strainer. Also, don't be tempted to make two cocktails in one shaker by doubling quantities as this will compound pulp issues. The cocktail is worth the faff!

Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Strawberry flavoured vodka', '1 2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄6 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄6 shot Strawberry sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Salt-rimmed glass with grapefruit juice (optional) & half strawberry on rim.

Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. You may find that the strawberry pulp blocks your fine strainer, so have a spoon handy to help clear the mesh to let the liquid run through.

Name: Strawberry Martini
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 grind Black pepper']
Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Strawberry Smoothie (Alcoholic)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Yoghurt liqueur', '3 spoon Honey', '5 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve immediately with straws.

Name: Strudel Martini
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄6 shot Apple sugar syrup', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Subourbon
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Blackberries', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Suburban
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Tawny port', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Suffering Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 1⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain ice-filled glass/mug charged with half the ginger beer. TOP with rest of ginger beer.
Garnish: Pineapple cubes, Luxardo Maraschino cherry, lime wedge & mint sprig bouquet

Name: Suffragette
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Purple and white edible flowers with dill or other green foliage pegged to rim to represent purple for loyalty and dignity, white for purity, and green for hope.

Name: Suit & Tai
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients and strain into glass filled with crushed ice and serve with short straws.

Name: Summer Breeze
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Summer Rose Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: STIR first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. POUR grenadine into the centre of the drink. This should settle to form a red layer in the base of the glass.

Name: Summer Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Watermelon liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sundowner #1
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sunny Side Up
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄3 shot Americano Bianco', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Rhubarb bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sunset 'Martini'
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '1 2⁄3 shot Passion fruit vodka', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit puree', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Half strawberry on rim + shot glass of prosecco on the side

Name: Sunshine Cocktail No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sunshine Cocktail No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sunstroke
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Susto
Ingredients: ['1 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '5⁄6 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄2 shot Byrrh Grand Quinquina', '1 dash Celery bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Suzy & Peat
Ingredients: ['1 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 2⁄3 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Tarragon sugar syrup (2:1)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Swamp Water
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Swedish Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)', "4 drop Difford's Daiquiri Bitters (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sweetie Darling
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Sweetie Pie
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 pinch Salt']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tam o' Shanter
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dust with freshly grated nutmeg & olive

Name: Tanglefoot
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Swedish Punsch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tango Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tango Cocktail (from the Bellagio)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot Passoã liqueur', '1 1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tantris Sidecar No.1
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tart 'n' Sand
Ingredients: ['4 unit Maraschino cherry (from jar in syrup)', '3⁄4 shot Speyside single malt Scotch whisky', '3⁄4 shot Blood orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Rouge', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: MUDDLE cherries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tarte Tatin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '3⁄4 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Caramel Toffee liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Separately, SHAKE cream and egg white with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and carefully pour over back of spoon so as to LAYER over drink.

Name: Tartini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '12 fresh Raspberries (fresh)']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tatanka Royale
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bison grass vodka', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Tawny-Tini
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 2⁄3 shot Tawny port', '1⁄6 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tea-Quila
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 2⁄3 shot Brewed cold black breakfast tea', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Lemonade']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass and stir to combine. Fill glass with ice and TOP with lemonade.

Name: Teaquila
Ingredients: ['2 shot Black tea (cold)', '1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Honey flavoured vodka', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tearful Chocolate Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic.

Special ingredient #1: Mint Syrup - lightly muddle 10 mint stems with 250g brown sugar, 250g white caster sugar and 600ml hot water.

Name: Tears & Dreams
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1⁄3 shot Ratafia de Marseille', '1⁄6 shot Apricot (abricot) eau-de-vie', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Edible flower & fresh kaffir lime leaf

Name: Tears of Joy
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Teddy Bear
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Pear & cognac liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 pinch Cinnamon powder']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tender Nob
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄3 shot Liquore Strega', '1⁄6 shot Meletti amaro', '1⁄12 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄12 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Tennessee Berry Mule
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Tennessee Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: SHAKE first six ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola and serve with straws.

Name: Tennessee Liplock
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of stirring glass. Add next 3 ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with a splash of soda if so desired.

Name: Tennessee Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Teqroni
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']

Name: Tequesso
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '5⁄6 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
Making: POUR tequila into one shot glass and coffee into the other. Drink tequila first and chase with espresso.

Name: Tequila Club
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '2⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', "4 drop Difford's Margarita Bitters", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tequila Colada
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1 2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 1⁄3 shot Coconut water', '1 pinch Salt']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass and stir to combine. Fill glass with ice and serve.

Name: Tequila Mockingbird
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Float mint leaf or peg to rim

Name: Tequila Sunset
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir

Name: Tequila'tini
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Teresa
Ingredients: ['2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Tessmanian Devil
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Liquore Strega', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)', '1 pinch Cayenne pepper']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Two fresh red chilli peppers positioned as devil's horns on rim

Name: Test Pilot
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Jamaican aged blended rum', '3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄4 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Testarossa
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass, then fill with ice.

Name: Texas Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot Patrón Añejo tequila', '1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: SHAKE first 9 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola and serve with a stirrer.

Name: Thai Red Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 slice Red bell pepper', '3 fresh Basil leaves (thai)', '2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Coconut water', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE pepper in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Absinthe of Normal
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '3 shot Coconut water', "3 drop Bob's Liquorice bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Star anise or piece of coconut

Name: The Affiliate
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: The Alchemist
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Anniversary
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '5⁄12 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Apple One
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: The Beauty Beneath
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Name: The Bee Bodice
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka (infused with lavender)', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Honey water (1:1)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', "2 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Big Easy
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 3⁄4 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: The Bird is the Word No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '5⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Blind Side
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Americano Bianco', '1 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Gently squeeze lemon wedge over drink and then drop into drink.

Name: The Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Book of Kells
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Boss
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '5⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: The Buck / Gin Buck
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR first two ingredients into ice-filled glass and TOP with ginger ale. Stir and serve with straws.

Name: The Burly French Man
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Vermouth di Torino', '2⁄3 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Damson vodka liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: RINSE chilled glass with absinthe and set to one side. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into absinthe rinsed glass.

Name: The Colonial Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Amer Picon', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP up with soda.

Name: The Corpse's Whiskers
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Currier
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Dandy
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: The Democrat
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: The Dunaway
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Upside-Down Raspberry Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['4 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 fresh Lemon peel (grated)', '2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5 spoon Mascarpone cheese', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making:
First Layer: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add Chambord, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into centre of glass.

Second Layer: Grate lemon zest into shaker. Add rest of ingredients, SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass over spoon so as to LAYER over raspberry base.

Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Ketel One Oranje Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '2⁄3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
