Ingredients: ['1 slice Watermelon (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Watermelon sugar syrup', '1⁄2 pinch Salt']
Making: Cut watermelon into 16 segments, chop the flesh from one segment into cubes and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Watermelon Margarita No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Watermelon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄2 pinch Salt']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Fresh watermelon wedge on rim or watermelon slices sweets/candy

Name: Waters of Chaos
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄4 shot White overproof rum', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Webber Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Webster Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wedding Bells
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: A pair of skewered Luxardo Maraschino cherries

Name: Weep No More
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄4 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Weeski Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wet cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Cachaça', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 pinch Cinnamon powder', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: What The Hell
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: What's Up, Doc?
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Carrot juice (freshly extracted)', '1⁄2 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Whiskey Daisy No.1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Whiskey Daisy No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with soda.

Name: Whiskey Sour (Classic Formula)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Whiskey Squirt
Ingredients: ['2 shot Peach purée', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda from a siphon. Serve with straws.

Name: Whisky Cobbler
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Pineapple liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass filled with crushed ice and churn to mix cocktail with ice until outside of glass frosts. Top with more crushed ice to fill glass.
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet, dehydrated orange wheel slice & dusting of freshly grated nutmeg. Serve with two straws.

Name: Whisky Fizz
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Whisky Flower
Ingredients: ['2 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice) SHAKE again with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Whist
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: White Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot White cranberry juice drink', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: White Elephant
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Dust with freshly grated nutmeg (or chocolate powder)

Name: White Horse
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: White Lady (no added sugar* & low-calorie)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Agave Sec liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄12 shot Sugar-free sweetener', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: White Lion
Ingredients: ['3 twist Lime zest (peel)', '3 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Raspberry (framboise) sugar syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making:
1. Peel the zest from the lime prior to squeezing and express 3 zest twists into shaker (also drop spent zests into shaker).
2. Add sugar and lime juice.
3. MUDDLE lime zests with sugar and mix with lime juice until sugar is dissolved.
4. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: White Lion (David Embury's recipe)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 fresh Lime shell (squeezed/spent lime husk)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients, including the shell of half a lime, with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: White Russian Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: STIR first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Carefully FLOAT lightly whipped cream (shake sealed container before pouring).

Name: White Stinger
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).

Name: Wild Irish Rose
Ingredients: ['2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water (optional)']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Wild Ward
Ingredients: ['1 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "3 dash Bob's Cardamom bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wildest Redhead
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large chunk/cube ice). DRIZZLE cherry brandy (which will fall through the cocktail to form a red base to the drink).

Name: Willi Wonka cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄3 shot Monin White Chocolate syrup']
Making: Muddle strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: White chocolate square and half strawberry

Name: William Porter
Ingredients: ["1 2⁄3 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wilton Martini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wimbledon Martini
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Strawberry in rim crowned with tip of mint sprig.

Name: Wind-up Bird Chronicle
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄6 shot Bacardi Carta Negra Superior', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 spoon White caster sugar']
Making: POUR rum into glass and swirl to coat. POUR the rum from the glass into shaker and set glass aside. Add other ingredients to shaker, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into rum rinsed glass (no ice in glass).

Name: Windy Miller
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with lemonade.

Name: Winter Clove
Ingredients: ['3 whole Clove', '1 1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "3 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist with a flamed clove

Name: Winter Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Sour apple liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Winter Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Spiced rum', '3⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist (discarded) and Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Witch Hunt Cocktail
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Liquore Strega']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over chunk of block ice).

Name: Witches' Smile
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Liquore Strega', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Witches' Yellow Flip
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Liquore Strega', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 fresh Egg yolk']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Without Borders
Ingredients: ['1 shot Avallen Calvados', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)', '3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Sugar rim and lemon zest twist

Name: Wolf Ticket
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Peach (fresh & ripe - skinned & diced)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: MUDDLE peach in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Woo Woo
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2 1⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 dash Peach bitters (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Woodside
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 ring Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Ruby port', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth (grapefruit infused)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker and add other ingredients. DRY SHAKE (without ice), then SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wordsmith
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Overproof pot still rum', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wow
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Woxum
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wrangler
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cream sherry (medium/sweet)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
Garnish: Long lemon zest twist & dust with freshly grated nutmeg

Name: Written Word
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: X.Y.Z.
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: XOXO
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄2 shot Dark chocolate liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably block ice).

Name: Yacht Club
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yellow Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yellow Jacket (Tequila-based)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yellow Parrot
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yesterday, Today and Amaro
Ingredients: ['2 shot Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄4 shot Averna Amaro']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yokohama
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄24 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: You're Not My Real Trinidad
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', "1 1⁄2 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish: Dust with freshly grated nutmeg & garnish with a mint sprigs bouquet

Name: You've Got Mail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cachaça', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Honey sugar syrup', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Young Man Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zac's Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zakuski Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zaza
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine']
Making: SHAKE (or stir) all ingredients with ice and strain fine into chilled glass.

Name: Zee Dee
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 1⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 shot Amontillado sherry']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zelda Cocktail
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zelenskyy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Passion fruit puree', '1⁄3 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '5⁄6 shot Ketel One Vodka']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Separately, STIR vodka and blue curaçao with ice and strain over burnt-yellow layer in glass.

Name: Zhivago Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Sour apple liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Zima Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: 8th Day (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Jasmine tea (cold)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Ginger syrup', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: A.B.C. Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: A1 Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Abbey
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Absinthe Cocktail (Jerry Thomas)
Ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄4 shot Anisette liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 1⁄2 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Absinthe Cooler
Ingredients: ['4 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Absinthe Gimlet
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Act of Violets
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Adam & Eve #2

Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Bison Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 pinch Cinnamon powder', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bitter and Twisted Nail
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bitter Elder
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bitter Grapefruit
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bitterest Pill
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Bittersweet Symphony
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bittersweet Symphony No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄6 shot Savoia Americano Rosso', '1⁄6 shot Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black & Tan
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 pint Pale ale', '1⁄2 pint Stout beer']
Making:
POUR pale ale or lager into chilled glass then carefully FLOAT Guinness on top.
Layering can be aided by pouring down the stout/porter down the shaft of a bar spoon so that the flat end dissipates the falling porter/stout. Or, an upturned tablespoon or a purpose-made black-and-tan may be used. This is bent in the middle of the handle so that it can be secured on the edge of a pint glass.

Name: Black & Velvet
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 pint Medium dry apple cider', '1⁄2 pint Stout beer']
Making: POUR cider into chilled glass then FLOAT Guinness on top.

Name: Black & White Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Blackberries', '1 1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE berries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Cherry Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Cocktail
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Blackberries', '1⁄2 shot Pernod anise', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Black Demure
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange wheel slice and skewered blackberry (sail)

Name: Black Eye
Ingredients: ['2 fresh Blackberries', '5 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '5 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: MUDDLE first three ingredients in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Black Mussel
Ingredients: ['1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '4 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR first 2 ingredients into glass and TOP with champagne.

Name: Black Nail #2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 1⁄2 shot Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass, lightly STIR and serve with straws.

Name: Blanco 43
Ingredients: ['5 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 2⁄3 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Bloody Joseph
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '4 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1⁄2 spoon Horseradish sauce', '2 pinch Celery salt', '2 grind Black pepper']
Making: ROLL rather than shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bloody Maru
Ingredients: ['4 shot Sake', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce', '2 pinch Celery salt', '2 grind Black pepper']
Making: ROLL rather than shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bloody Shame (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['5 shot Tomato juice', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '4 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1⁄2 spoon Horseradish sauce', '2 pinch Celery salt', '2 grind Black pepper']
Making: ROLL rather than shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Blow Job
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Cosmo
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened) (white)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Fin
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Hpnotiq Tropical liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened) (white)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Hawaiian
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', "1 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: Blue Kamikaze
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Blue Monday
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Mountain Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Passion
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. If serving over cubed ice use this recipe: 1½ light white rum, ¾ blue curaçao, ¾ lime juice and ½ sugar syrup.

Name: Blue Riband
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']

Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']

Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Border Hop
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Maple syrup', '5 shot Boiling water']

Name: Borderline
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '3⁄4 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth']

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bourbon Smash
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '4 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bourbonella
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brake Tag
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bramblette
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brandy Blazer
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 shot Boiling water', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: POUR cognac into a warmed glass and rest the bowl of the glass on an old-fashioned glass so it lies on its side supported by the rim. FLAME the cognac and carefully move the glass back to an upright position sitting normally on your work surface. POUR in hot water (this will extinguish any remaining flame) and sugar. Stir, garnish and serve.

Name: Brass Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '2 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Brazilian Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 shot Cachaça', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: Brazilian Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 shot Cachaça', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Brazilian Monk
Ingredients: ['1 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '3 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: Brotherhood
Ingredients: ['1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bull Shot
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '4 shot Beef bouillon (cold)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Worcestershire sauce', '3 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)', '1 pinch Salt', '1 grind Black pepper']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bull's Milk
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '4 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bulldog
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', 'Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Bulldog Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Bumble Bee
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Sambuca', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Butterscotch Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Butterscotch Delight
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Buzzard's Breath
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', "1 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: Cachaça Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cactus Jack
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Café Gates
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', 'Top up with Filter coffee (hot)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: Place bar spoon in glass, POUR first three ingredients and top up with coffee, then float cream by pouring over the back of a spoon.

Name: Caipiginger
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cachaça', '2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Cajun Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Pepper flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR vermouth with ice. Strain, discarding vermouth to leave only a coating on the ice. Pour pepper vodka into mixing glass, stir with coated ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: California Root Beer
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', "3⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Camomile & Blackthorn Breeze
Ingredients: ['2 shot Lime flavoured vodka', '3 shot Camomile tea (cold)', '1 shot Blackthorn berry liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with cubed ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Canarie

Making: POUR pastis and lemon syrup into glass. Serve iced water separately in a small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste (I recommend five shots). Lastly, add ice to fill glass.

Name: Canteen Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cape Codder
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka (from freezer)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened) (chilled)']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass, ideally using vodka from a freezer and chilled juices. (Citrus fruit should be stored in a refrigerator prior to juicing.)

Name: Cardinal Punch
Ingredients: ['1 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', 'Top up with Shiraz red wine']
Making: POUR cassis into ice-filled glass and top up with wine. Stir and serve with straws.

Name: Caribbean Cruise
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 spoon Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Caribbean Piña Colada
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄2 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 pinch Salt']

Name: Caribiano

Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with grapefruit soda and sparkling wine and briefly stir.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge and Luxardo Maraschino cherry

Name: Carol Channing

Making: POUR first 2 ingredients into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Carrol Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Carrot Cake
Ingredients: ['2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cascade Cocktail
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄4 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Casse Noissette
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. FLOAT thin layer of cream over drink.

Name: Castro
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cathy Olé Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2⁄3 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: POUR ingredients into glass half filled with ice and STIR. Top with more ice before serving.

Name: Causeway
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Chai Latte 'Martini'
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄6 shot Chai tea (cold)', '5⁄6 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Challenger Deep
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Barolo Chinato', '1 shot Bigallet China China Amer', '1⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cham 69 #1
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Cham 69 #2

Garnish: Find a lemon which fits into a small wineglass tightly enough to act as a watertight extension to the glass. Cut off both ends of the fruit and carefully remove the pulp to leave a barrel-shaped shell of skin. Place in the top of the glass. Wet the edge of the glass and exposed fruit shell with sugar syrup and dip in caster sugar to frost the edge of both peel and glass. Leave for a couple of hours to form a hard crust.

Name: Electric Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda and FLOAT blue curaçao on top of drink (this will sink and bleed through drink).

Name: Elixir 66
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Coriander / cilantro leaves', '1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄6 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE coriander in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Embassy Royal
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Empire Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Apricot slice on rim or orange zest twist

Name: Encantado
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Enchanted
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Entente Cordiale #2
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄6 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Tea syrup (Breakfast tea) 2:1)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: Dry shake all ingredients together, then shake vigorously with cubed ice and double strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish: Dash of Angostura Bitters drawn across foam

Name: Epiphany
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Esquire #2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Estrella Porno Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Passoã liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making:
1. To make a Estrella Porno Martini you'll first need to flavour your tequila with a vanilla pod. Simply cut the vanilla pod lengthways to expose the flavoursome seeds inside and drop the whole vanilla pod into your bottle of tequila. Reseal and shake bottle several times a day for at least two days, preferably a week.

2. To make your cocktail, wash and cut passion fruits in half, SCOOP out the seeds and flesh of 3 halves into shaker. (Keep last passion fruit half for garnish). Add next four ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. POUR champagne into chilled shot glass to serve on the side. Instruct drinker to sip alternately from each glass.

Name: Every-Body's Irish Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Evita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Exotic Passion
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Passoã liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: F. Willy Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: Read about cocktail measures and measuring.
Garnish: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine stain into chilled glass.

Name: Facundo's Flare
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2 dash Peach bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fairy Sugar Mama
Ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Lemon twist (discarded) & mint leaf pegged to rim

Name: Fancy Brandy
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fancy Drink
Ingredients: ['1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Bitter Lemon']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with bitter lemon.

Name: Fantasia (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters (optional)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Favorite
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fifth Degree
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: STIR Campari with ice (to coat ice and glass) and then strain to discard excess. Add other ingredients, STIR with coated ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Finn Rouge
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '1 3⁄4 shot Cranberry flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (2 sugar to 1 water)", '1 grind Black pepper']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Flame of Love Martini
Ingredients: ['3 twist Orange peel', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry']
Making: Pour sherry into chilled glass, swirl to coat inside and discard excess. Using a match or lighter, express and ignite the oils from the orange peel so the burnt oil coats the inside of the sherry-coated glass. SHAKE the vodka with ice and fine strain into the coated glass.

Name: Flaming Henry
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey']
Making: LAYER by carefully pouring ingredients in the order below. IGNITE bourbon. Extinguish flame prior to drinking and beware of hot glass rim.

Name: Flamingo #2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Florence Fizz
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Elderflower cordial', '1 1⁄2 shot Pomegranate juice', '2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: POUR limoncello, lemon juice and elderflower cordial into glass. ADD crushed ice and LAYER pomegranate juice. ADD more crushed ice and TOP with prosecco.

Name: Foghorn
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: Fort Lauderdale
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: French Daisy
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: French Dew Sour
Ingredients: ['1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '2 grind Black pepper', '2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3 dash Vanilla extract']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: French Kiss #2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: French Monkey
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with just a splash of soda.

Name: French Sherbet
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '5⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fresa Batida
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '7 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)']
Making: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Fresca
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with lemonade.

Name: Fresca Nova
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Slowly TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Friar Tuck
Ingredients: ['1 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Frisky Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 shot Lime flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: Fru Fru
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Passoã liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Fruit Pastel
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Half sugared rim and Fruit Pastille sweets

Name: Fruit Tingle
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '3 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring lemon-lime soda.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on rim

Name: Fruits De La Passion
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop fresh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fruits of the Forest
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)']
Making:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. POUR Chambord into the centre of the drink: it should sink to the
bottom.

Name: Fruity Sex on the Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino cherry on stick (sail)

Name: Gallicus
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italicus liqueur', '3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: Gamble
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Gansevoort Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Garden Delight
Ingredients: ['2 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: Place two long slices of cucumber into ice-filled glass. Add melon liqueur and gin and stir. TOP with tonic water and stir again.
Garnish: Gently roll muddler over rosemary sprig to release aromas before adding to glass.

Name: Gator Bite
Ingredients: ['1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gin & French
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Gin & Juice
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '2 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Gin Atomic
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Lemon bitters (optional)', '2 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients apart from tonic, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water and serve with straws.

Name: Gin Gin
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Green ginger wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Ginger 43
Ingredients: ['6 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Ginger Beer Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Ginger Cosmos
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '5 fresh Basil leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE ginger and basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve with straws.

Name: Ginger Frost
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '3⁄4 shot Ginger liqueur']
Making: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients. SHAKE again with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ginger Nut
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Hazelnut liqueur', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: Ginger Punch
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 spoon Honey', '2 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add honey and rum and STIR until honey is dissolved. Add lime juice and sugar, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Gingerbread 'Martini'
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Gingerbread sugar syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gl'amour Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄12 shot Rose water', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine into chilled glass.
Garnish: Edible flower or dried rose petals

Name: Glass Tower
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄4 shot Sambuca', '2 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda.
Garnish: Either no garnish or a peach wedge

Name: Glenn's Bride
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄12 shot Rose water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gloria
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Godmother
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5⁄6 shot Disaronno amaretto']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Gold Medalion
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', "1 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba) (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gold Member
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '2 1⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gold Phantom
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 spoon Honey', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 pinch Salt']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge and silver dragees (cake making balls).

Name: Gold Rush on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Golden Bird
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Golden Dragon
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Pisang Ambon green banana liqueur', '2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Golden Dream
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "5⁄6 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 1⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Golden Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 fresh Egg yolk', 'Top up with Soda from siphon']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Golden Mac
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 spoon Honey', "2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄4 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add honey and Scotch and STIR until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Golden Screw
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR all ingredients into chilled glass and lightly stir.

Name: Golden Slipper
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Golden Wave
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with a 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with straws.

Name: Grand Espirit
Ingredients: ['3 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Elderflower cordial']
Making: POUR soda into ice-filled glass to half fill. ADD garnish, Grand Marnier and elderflower. TOP with more soda water.

Name: Grand Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '8 fresh Mint leaves']
Making: POUR ingredients into glass and half fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more. Keep adding ice and churning until drink fills glass. Serve with straws.

Name: Grand Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 wedge Lemon (fresh)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: Granny's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grapefruit Daiquiri #2 (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grappacino
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bepi Tosolini Grappa di Moscato', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Grateful Dead
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Greek Tragedy
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Ouzo 12', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Beast (Fresh Version)
Ingredients: ['3 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 1⁄4 shot Chilled water']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add remaining ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Green Beast (Pub Version)

Name: Green Beetle
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Day In Bangkok
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cacao & coffee spiced rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄12 shot Green mint (menthe verte) syrup', '1⁄12 shot Ginger syrup', '1⁄12 shot Lemongrass syrup', '3⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale', '3⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale and soda. Alternatively, rather than the trio of sugar syrups, the original recipe calls for 15ml of Green syrup made by simmering mint, ginger and lemongrass in water, then straining out the herbs and adding equal parts sugar.

Name: Green Destiny
Ingredients: ['1 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '1⁄2 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE cucumber and kiwi in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Eyes
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Green Fly
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.
