Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Greenbelt
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Grounds For Divorce
Ingredients: ['4 wedge Pineapple (fresh) (cored, skinned and chopped)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine stain into chilled glass.

Name: Guardabosques
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Green melon liqueur']
Making: SHAKE ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Guillotine
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR first two ingredients into glass and TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Hammer of the Gods
Ingredients: ['1 shot Tuaca liqueur', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: LAYER ingredients by carefully pouring into shot glass in the following order. IGNITE and hold pint glass upside down a few inches above the flame. Allow the drink to burn for thirty seconds or so before killing the flame, being sure to keep the pint glass in place. Instruct your subject to suck the alcohol vapour from the inverted pint glass using a bendy straw. Finally, remove the pint glass and let your subject consume the drink through the straw.

Name: Harpoon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Serve with sustainable straws.

Name: Hawaiian Seabreeze
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Key West Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Kill Bill cocktail
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir.

Name: Killer Punch
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Kir Spritz
Ingredients: ['3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine', '1 1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass in the following order.

Name: Kirsch Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Knockout Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Kretchma
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: L'esprit de l'escalier
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Absinthe vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Poire William eau-de-vie', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (or in place of ice use cold over frozen river stones to chill to avoid dilution from ice).

Name: L'Expérience
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "5⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 fresh Basil leaves']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: La Bouche Reelle (The Real Mouth)
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Orange marmalade', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and serve into ice-filled glass.

Name: La Feuille Morte
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ricard Pastis', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Green mint (menthe verte) syrup', 'Top up with Chilled water']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass. Serve iced water separately in a small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste. (I recommend five shots). Lastly, add ice to fill glass.

Name: LA Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: La Violetta
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Crème de violette liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with splash of prosecco.

Name: Lago Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry flavoured vodka', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: LCB Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Le Chateau
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Le Roi Soleil (The Sun King)
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Blackberries', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (Be sure to use very fine strainer and beware this recipe only fills a 3oz glass so consider multiplying ingredients.)
Garnish: Blackberry & raspberry dusted with icing sugar plus dark chocolate.

Name: Lemon Curd Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3 spoon Lemon curd', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lemon Lime & Bitters (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5 shot Lemonade', '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR lime and lemonade into ice-filled glass and briefly stir. DASH bitters onto surface of drink and serve with straws so drinker can stir in bitters.

Name: LIFE (Love in the Future Ecstasy)
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 shot Green tea liqueur']
Making: MUDDLE mint in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. DRIZZLE tea liqueur over drink.

Name: Light Breeze
Ingredients: ['2 shot Pernod anise', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass. Stir and serve with straws.

Name: Lighter Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pernod anise', '3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass. Stir and serve with straws.

Name: Lima Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Lime Breeze
Ingredients: ['2 shot Lime flavoured vodka', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Limeosa
Ingredients: ['1 shot Lime flavoured vodka', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne and gently stir.

Name: Limey
Ingredients: ['2 shot Lime flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Limnology
Ingredients: ['2 shot Lime flavoured vodka', '1 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Limoncello Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Limousine
Ingredients: ['2 shot Lime flavoured vodka', '1 shot Krupnik spiced honey liqueur', '4 shot Camomile tea (hot)']
Making: Place bar spoon in glass. POUR ingredients into glass and stir.

Name: Liquorice All Sort
Ingredients: ['1 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '1 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade.

Name: Liquorice Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Black sambuca liqueur', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Liquorice Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Sambuca', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lo Mismo
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Lola
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: London Fog
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', "1⁄12 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Lonely Bull
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Long Beach Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Lotus Cocktail
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 shot Lychee juice drink', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Louisiana Trade
Ingredients: ['2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Love Junk
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Loved Up
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lucky Lindy
Ingredients: ['3 spoon Honey', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: STIR honey with bourbon and lemon juice in base of shaker so as to dissolve honey. Add ice, SHAKE and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Lush
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR vodka and liqueur into chilled glass, TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

Name: Lutkins Special Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Luxury Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Fruit cup liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lychee & Blackcurrant Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Lychee Mac
Ingredients: ["2 1⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Green ginger wine']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Lychee Rickey
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.

Name: Mad Monk Milkshake
Ingredients: ['1 shot Irish cream liqueur', '2 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Madras
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Magic Bus
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mahukona
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and strain into glass half-filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.
Garnish: Pineapple cubes, Luxardo Maraschino cherry & mint sprig

Name: Mambo
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mandarine Sour
Ingredients: ['2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mango Rum Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Mango purée', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Margarita with Salt Foam Float
Ingredients: ['4 spoon Salt', '1 pint Chilled water', '3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)']
Making: Combine first three ingredients, POUR into cream whipping siphon and CHARGE with nitrous oxide. Shake and place siphon in a refrigerator for one hour prior to making drink. SHAKE next three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. SQUIRT salt foam over surface of drink from siphon.

Name: Marigold Spritz
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur', '4 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir.

Name: Marmalade Sour
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Orange marmalade', '2 shot Cachaça', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Marshall
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Oloroso sherry', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Agave syrup', '2 pinch Black pepper']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Martini Royale
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR vodka and crème de cassis with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with chilled champagne.

Name: Mat the Rat
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Maurice Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Maxim's Coffee (Hot)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", 'Top up with Filter coffee (hot)']
Making: POUR all ingredients into warmed glass and STIR.

Name: Mayan Whore
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, DO NOT STIR and serve with straws.

Name: Medicinal Solution
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Old Simon Genever', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Mediterranean Fizz
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '5 fresh Basil leaves', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shake. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice filled glass. TOP with soda water.

Name: Melchior
Ingredients: ['3 dried Clove', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Green ginger wine', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 1⁄4 shot Claret red wine']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mellow Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Melon Margarita #2 (served frozen)
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and place in blender. Add other ingredients and BLEND with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Merry Widow #2
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Metropolitan
Ingredients: ['1 shot Blackcurrant flavoured vodka', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mexican Coffee (Hot)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Filter coffee (hot)', 'Float lightly whipped Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: Place bar spoon in glass. POUR first three ingredients into glass and stir. FLOAT cream.

Name: Mexican Melon Ball
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: Cut melon into eight segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: MG & T
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Oak aged gin', '1⁄3 shot Fernet liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '3 shot Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass while also pouring tonic water.
Garnish: Orange zest twist, cinnamon stick & star anise

Name: Midnight Moon
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: STIR first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Garnish: Half apple slice to represent a crescent moon & orange zest twist (discarded).

Name: Midtown Muse
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Lowland single malt scotch whisky', '2⁄3 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mike Romanoff
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Milky Mojito
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Pernod anise', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in glass. Fill glass with crushed ice, add other ingredients. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.

Name: Milo
Ingredients: ['4 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Mincemeat Pie
Ingredients: ['2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 spoon Mincemeat', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT layer of cream on drink.

Name: Mint Fizz
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients apart from soda, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Mint Julep (Mexican Style)
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Lemon peel', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Tawny port', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: PLACE lemon zest and mint in shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Mirror Margarita

Making: POUR aniseed into ice-filled glass and TOP with chilled water. Separately SHAKE rest of ingredients with ice. DISCARD contents of glass and refill with fresh ice. Then fine strain contents of shaker into the now absinthe-coated glass.

Ingredients: ['1 shot Pernod anise', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: POUR first 3 ingredients into empty glass. ADD soda water to half fill glass. Fill glass with ice and then top up with more soda. (This avoids 'shocking' the anis with the ice.) Serve with straws.

Name: Monte Carlo Imperial
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']

Then carefully POUR Peroni into beer glass so not quite reaching the top of the shot glass, being careful not to splash any beer into shot glass. Instruct drinker to drink from beer glass and so inevitably also shot glass. Use sturdy glassware.

Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '5 fresh Mint leaves', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.

Name: Plum Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Plum (stoned & peeled)', '2 shot Slivovitz plum brandy', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: CUT plum into quarters, remove stone and peel. MUDDLE plum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Plum Pudding
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Plum (stoned & peeled)', '1 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '1 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur']
Making: CUT plum into quarters, remove stone and peel. MUDDLE plum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Plum Vodkatini
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Plum (stoned & peeled)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: CUT plum into quarters, remove stone and peel. MUDDLE plum in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Poinsettia
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR first 2 ingredients into chilled glass. TOP with champagne and briefly stir.

Name: Poire de Vivre
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 candied Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2⁄3 shot Ginger liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Green ginger wine', '1 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Polar Express
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '5⁄6 shot White chocolate grappa liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice over a scoop of fior di latte (vanilla) ice-cream.
Garnish: Grated meringue & pinch edible charcoal powder

Name: Pomegranate Bellini
Ingredients: ['1 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄2 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Pomegranate Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ponche de Algarrobina
Ingredients: ['2 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '1 fresh Egg yolk', '1 shot Condensed milk', '1 spoon Algarrobo extract (or malt extract from health food shops)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Pop My Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka (infused with vanilla)', '1 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Port & Melon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Melon (Cantaloupe)', '1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Dry white port', '1 1⁄2 shot Tawny port']
Making: CUT melon into eight segments and de-seed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Port Light
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', '2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '2 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: STIR honey with bourbon in base of shaker to dissolve honey. Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Port No.2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Tawny port', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Port Sangaree
Ingredients: ['2 shot Tawny port', '1 shot Chilled water', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Port Wine Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3 shot Tawny port']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Potted Parrot
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Prado
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: President Vincent
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Princess Pride
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Puccini
Ingredients: ['8 segment Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine (fresh fruit)', '3⁄4 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE segments in base of shaker. Add liqueur, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco and lightly stir.

Name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
Ingredients: ['2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 shot Monin Pumpkin Spice Syrup', '2 shot Steamed milk']
Making: POUR first 2 ingredients into pre-warmed glass. TOP with steamed milk.
Garnish: [image courtesy of Monin.com] Top with whipped cream (& consider spearing with a cinnamon stick)

Name: Punch & Judy
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Lime wheel & dust with grated nutmeg

Name: Purple Flirt #1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Purple Haze
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄6 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass. POUR liqueur down the inside of the glass. This will fall to the bottom and form a purple haze.

Name: Purple Hooter
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Queen Mary
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Izarra Green (Vert) liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Quelle Vie
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Mentzendorff Kümmel liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Quintessential Drop
Ingredients: ["1 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Garnish: Dehydrated lime wheel & Luxardo maraschino cherry

Name: Raging Bull (shot)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '1⁄2 scoop Patrón Reposado tequila']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order listed.

Name: Rajamäki Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄4 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']

Name: Raspberry Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Raspberry Debonnaire
Ingredients: ['10 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura (optional)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients. SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and lightly stir.

Name: Raspberry Sake'tini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 1⁄2 shot Sake', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Raspberry Watkins
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Razzmatazz
Ingredients: ['3 spoon Honey', '1 1⁄2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '6 fresh Mint leaves']

Name: Razzzzzzberry Cocktail

Name: Red Breast
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise']

Name: Red Hooker
Ingredients: ['1 shot Peach purée', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Framboise', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Red Lion (Tarling's recipe)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange juice and sugar coated rim

Name: Red Melon'tini
Ingredients: ['1 segment Watermelon (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Pepper flavoured vodka', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 grind Black pepper']

Making: POUR elderflower and lemon juice into glass. ADD crushed ice and cranberry juice. CHURN. ADD more crushed ice and TOP with lemonade. CHURN.

Name: Relajese con Facundo
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with cubed ice and fine-strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Rhinestone Cowgirl
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 2⁄3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rhubarb & Ginger Highball
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rhubarb flavoured vodka', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rhubarb & Lemongrass Cocktail

Name: Rhubarb Triangle
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Giffard Rhubarbe Liqueur', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rite of Spring

Name: Riviera Breeze

Making: POUR pastis and orange juice into glass and then fill with ice. TOP with ginger ale and stir.

Name: Roa Ae
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pear & cognac liqueur', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rococoa
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄6 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Roger
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '2 shot Peach purée (white)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rollergirl
Ingredients: ['1 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)', '2⁄3 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Root 56

Name: Rose (French style) No. 1

Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '3⁄4 shot Sake', '1⁄2 shot Lychee syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Royal Nail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Highland single malt scotch whisky', '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Royal Velvet Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rum & Raisin Alexandra
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Green grapes (seedless)', '1 1⁄2 shot Havana Club 7yo rum', '1 shot Double cream / heavy cream', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Russian Nail
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '3⁄4 shot Drambuie liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: S. Tea G.
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Black tea (cold)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Name: Sacred Martell
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Making: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.

Name: San Francisco
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sandygaff
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 fill glass with Stout beer', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR ale into glass, top with ginger ale and lightly stir.

Name: Santiago #2

Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice).

Name: Say Say

Making: MUDDLE tomatoes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Scorched Earth

Name: Scotch Bounty Cocktail
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Scotch Milk Punch
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Scotch Point
Ingredients: ["2 1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Ruby port', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄4 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass.

Name: Sea Witch Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Liquore Strega', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 2 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

Name: Séquito

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Serendipity (by Jamie Stephenson)
Ingredients: ['6 fresh Blackberries', '1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Vanille de Madagascar', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: MUDDLE blackberries in in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Settle Petal
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Cucumber flavoured vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rose water', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Shakerato
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur']
Making: SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Shamrock (bourbon based)
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Shamrock Express
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Irish cream liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]

Making: BLEND first 3 ingredients with scoop crushed ice and pour into glass. POUR grenadine around edge of the drink. Do not stir before serving.

Name: Simple Softly

Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with ginger beer.

Name: Sloe Tequila

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice

Name: Sorrelade (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['70 gram Hibiscus flowers (Red petals)', '1 1⁄4 litre Chilled water', '30 gram Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice) (chopped)', '12 dried Clove', '3 spoon Honey']
Making: (Bulk recipe.) SOAK dried sorrel in water with ginger, ground cloves, and honey for 12 hours. Bring this mixture to the BOIL then leave to cool and SOAK for a further 12 hours, STRAIN and then keep refrigerated.

Name: Sour (Generic Name)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Absinthe Drip Cocktail (Czech method)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 shot Chilled water', '1 cube White caster sugar']
Making: PLACE sugar cube on a slotted absinthe spoon resting across the top of the glass. POUR the absinthe over the sugar cube into the glass. LIGHT the absinthe soaked cube and leave to burn and caramelise. Using a bottle of chilled mineral water with a small hole in the cap, DRIP water over what's left of the sugar so it dissolves and drips into the glass. Add ice, stir and serve.

Name: Absinthe Drop

Making: STIR all ingredients and strain into ice-filled glass.

Making: POUR all ingredients into glass, swirl to mix, Flambé and then extinguish flame. Please take care and beware of hot glass rim.

Name: Alabama Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Alabama Slammer (straight-up)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Alaska No.2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Alessandro
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Alice In Wonderland
Ingredients: ['1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Amarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Americana
Ingredients: ['1 cube White caster sugar', '4 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1⁄2 shot Bourbon whiskey', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: Coat sugar cube with bitters and drop into glass. POUR bourbon and then champagne into chilled glass.

Name: Anita's Attitude Adjuster
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and gently stir.

Name: Apache
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Aphrodisiac
Ingredients: ['2 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '2 1⁄2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 1⁄2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Apple & Spice
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Apple Blossom
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Apple Martini (IBA spec)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Apple Strudel (by Alex Kammerling)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Apple Schnapps liqueur', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully FLOAT cream by pouring over the back of a spoon.

Name: Apple Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '3 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Aqua Velva Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 1⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with lemonade.
Garnish: Lemon wedge & cherry skewered with a cocktail umbrella

Name: Arbuz
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 fresh Watermelon (fresh)', '1 inch Lemongrass stem (chopped)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bison grass vodka', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: MUDDLE watermelon and lemon grass in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Artlantic
Ingredients: ['1 shot Spiced rum', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Atlantic Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', "1⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '2 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Atomic Dog
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Green melon liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '2 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Auntie's Hot Xmas Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '2 1⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', "4 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: POUR all ingredients into glass and stir. MICROWAVE for 40 seconds (vary time depending on your microwave oven), stir again and serve.

Name: Avalanche
Ingredients: ['2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1⁄2 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: B-53 Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: B-54 Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: B-55 Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: B. J. Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: B5200
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Baby Woo Woo
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Baccio Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Anisette liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine', '3⁄4 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and soda water. Lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Baltimore Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄2 shot Rainwater/Verdelho (med-dry) Madeira wine', '1 fresh Egg (white & yolk)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: Vigorously SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Banana Cow
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Vanilla extract', '1 fresh Banana (preferably overripe)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws.

Name: Banshee
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Barnacle Bill
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pernod anise', '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Barnamint
Ingredients: ['2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '2 scoop Vanilla ice cream', '3 whole Oreo cookies']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: Barranquilla Green Jade
Ingredients: ['2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Barton Special Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Avallen Calvados', "3⁄4 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Batida de Coco
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cachaça', "2 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '1 shot Condensed milk']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: Batida de Goiaba
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cachaça', '2 1⁄2 shot Guava juice', '1 shot Condensed milk']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Batida de Morango
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cachaça', '12 fresh Strawberries (hulled, small & ripe)', '1 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Condensed milk']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.

Name: Bellissimo
Ingredients: ['1 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bijou shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin']
Making: Carefully LAYER ingredients in the following order.

Name: Bingo
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.

Name: Bit-O-Honey
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Butterscotch liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Black Dream
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Black Irish
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '2 scoop Vanilla ice cream']
Making: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.

Name: Black Jack Shot
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Black Widow
Ingredients: ['1 shot Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur', '1 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '1 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blackbeard
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 pint Stout beer', 'Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR ingredients in glass and serve.

Name: Blue Angel
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Parfait Amour liqueur', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Bird
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Champagne
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄6 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Blue Sky
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Blue Wave
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "3⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Blushing Mimosa
Ingredients: ['3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: POUR half the champagne into chilled glass, then orange juice, pineapple juice and the rest of the champagne. Finally pour pomegranate syrup/grenadine in to glass and allow to sink through cocktail.

Name: Boston Tea Party
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', "1⁄2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", 'Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: SHAKE first ten ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola and serve with straws.

Name: Broken Spur
Ingredients: ['3 shot Dry white port', '1⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Anisette liqueur', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bubblegum Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bullfrog #1
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Bullfrog #2
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: POUR vodka and lime into ice-filled glass and TOP with lemonade or lemon-lime soda.

Name: Burnt Toasted Almond
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Butterfly's Kiss
Ingredients: ['2 shot Absolut Vanilia vodka', '1 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Caipi
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE lime in base of shaker. Add rest of ingredients, SHAKE with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and pour without straining into glass.

Name: Caipiruva Bacchanalia
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped wedges)', '5 fresh Red grapes (seedless)', '2 shot Cachaça', '1 shot Honey sugar syrup', '3⁄4 shot Sauternes dessert wine', "3 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: MUDDLE lime and grapes in base of shaker to release juices. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.

Name: Canaries
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Capitano
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄2 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Caravan
Ingredients: ['3 shot Shiraz red wine', '1⁄2 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', 'Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass. Stir and serve with straws.

Name: Champagne Daisy
Ingredients: ['1 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass, TOP with champagne.

Name: Chelsea Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Chubacabras Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄6 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄6 shot Orange flower/blossom water']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine-strain into chilled glass.

Name: Churchill Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin (from freezer)']
Making: STIR gin with ice while glancing at an unopened bottle of dry vermouth. Strain into chilled glass.

Name: Clementine
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order. Instruct drinker to down in one and bite into the wedge.

Name: Coffee Batida
Ingredients: ['2 shot Cachaça', '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and serve with straws

Name: Collection Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Ketel One Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice & fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Colonial Rot
Ingredients: ['7 fresh Mint leaves', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)', 'Splash Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker just enough to bruise. Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with half soda and half lemonade.

Name: Concealed Weapon
Ingredients: ['1 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-chilled glass.

Name: Cooperstown
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Mint leaves', '2 1⁄2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: STIR all ingredients (including mint) with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cordless Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ketel One Oranje Vodka', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR vodka and champagne into glass and serve. Instruct drinker to down in one and then bite into the orange wedge.

Name: Cordova Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. To prevent curdling, add the cream to the shaker after the ice and immediately before shaking.

Name: Coronation
Ingredients: ['1 shot Fino sherry', '2 shot Sauvignon blanc wine', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and stir.
Garnish: Luxardo Maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw.

Name: Covadonga
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '5 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cranberry Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Cranberry Delicious (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['12 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: MUDDLE mint in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Crimea
Ingredients: ['5 fresh Coriander / cilantro leaves', '2 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']
Making: MUDDLE coriander in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Crouching Tiger
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Kwai Feh lychee liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cuban Master
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cuban Special
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']

SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice). TOP with grapefruit soda.
