Name: Perroquet
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ricard Pastis', '1⁄4 shot Green mint (menthe verte) syrup', 'Top up with Chilled water']
Making: POUR pastis and mint syrup into glass. Serve iced water separately in small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste (I recommend five shots). Lastly, add ice to fill glass.

Name: Pimm's Royale
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Fruit cup liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '4 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR Pimm's and orange curaçao into chilled glass and TOP with chilled champagne.

Name: Pink Cloud
Ingredients: ['1 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Evaporated milk (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pink Flamingo
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Sour apple liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Pink Sin Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '3⁄4 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur', '1 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Planter's Punchless (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Prairie Oyster
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Egg yolk', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄4 shot Worcestershire sauce', '1⁄4 shot Tomato juice', '5 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '2 pinch Salt', '2 grind Black pepper', '1⁄2 shot Malt vinegar']
Making: Taking care not to break the egg yolk, PLACE it in the centre of the hollow in the glass. SHAKE the rest of the ingredients with ice and strain over egg. Instruct drinker to down in one.

Name: Purple Flirt #2
Ingredients: ['1 shot Dark/black/blackstrap rum', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Purple Turtle
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rasputin
Ingredients: ['2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rattlesnake Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Ray Gun
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR Chartreuse and blue curaçao into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Razzitini
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '3⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with lemonade.

Name: Red or Dead
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Redback
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Black sambuca liqueur']
Making: Either, POUR sambuca into the glass and then pour advocaat down the side of the glass. Or POUR both sambuca and advocaat at the same time, slowly down opposite sides of the glass.

Name: Russian Qualude Shot
Ingredients: ["1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order listed.

Name: Sailor's Comfort
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Saint Clements
Ingredients: ['3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Bitter Lemon']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Saltecca
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot Caper brine (from jar)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sanctuary
Ingredients: ['2 shot Dubonnet/French rouge aromatised wine', '1 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Santiago #1
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Spiced rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Scandinavian Pop
Ingredients: ['2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP up with ginger ale.

Name: Scarlett O'Hara
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sentimental Melody
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Grapefruit preserve', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1⁄4 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: STIR grapefruit preserve and rum in base of a shaker to dissolve the jam. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Shandygaff
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 fill glass with Pilsner lager', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR ale into glass, TOP with ginger ale.

Name: Shirley Temple (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice filled glass, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Silk Panties
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2 dash Peach bitters (optional)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Singapore Sling (Raffles Formula)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first eight ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Ski Breeze
Ingredients: ['2 shot Raspberry flavoured vodka', '3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Snakebite
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fill glass with Pilsner lager', 'Top up with Medium dry apple cider']
Making: POUR lager into glass and TOP with cider.

Name: Snow On Earth
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Krupnik spiced honey liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Carefully FLOAT cream on drink.

Name: Southern Cider
Ingredients: ['2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Southern Peach
Ingredients: ['1 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Serve with straws.

Name: Squashed Frog
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Warninks Advocaat liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order listed.

Name: Steel Bottom
Ingredients: ['1 shot White overproof rum', 'Top up with Pilsner lager']
Making: POUR ingredients into glass, lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Stupid Cupid
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ketel One Citroen Vodka', '1⁄2 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Summit
Ingredients: ['1 twist Lime (fresh) (zest)', '1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '2 shot Lemon-lime soda (Sprite/7-Up)']
Making: Lightly MUDDLE lime zest and ginger slices in base of mixing glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sun Kissed (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Temperance Piña Colada (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1 1⁄2 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '3⁄4 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with a scoop of crushed ice and serve with straws.

Name: Tequila Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR tequila into glass and then carefully LAYER with champagne. The drinker should hold and cover the top of the glass with the palm of their hand so as to grip it firmly and seal the contents inside. Then they should briskly pick the glass up and slam it down (obviously not so hard as to break the glass), then gulp the drink down in one while it is still fizzing.

Name: The Amalfi
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄4 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients. Add ice, SHAKE again and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Ancient Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Drambuie liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Vanilla sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Argyll
Ingredients: ['2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: The C&C
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '3⁄4 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
Making: LAYER by carefully pouring ingredients in the following order.

Name: The Crow Cocktail
Ingredients: ["2 shot Dewar's 12 Year Old Scotch whisky", '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Jägerita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Jägermeister', '1 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄4 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Juxtaposition
Ingredients: ['2 spoon Honey', '2 shot Cranberry flavoured vodka', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR honey with vodka in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Purl
Ingredients: ['2 shot Old Tom gin', 'Top up with British bitter ale']
Making: POUR ingredients into chilled glass.

Name: Tomate
Ingredients: ['1 shot Ricard Pastis', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Chilled water']
Making: POUR pastis and grenadine into glass. SERVE iced water separately in a small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste (I recommend five shots). Lastly add ice to fill glass.

Name: Tropical Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Passoã liqueur', '2 1⁄2 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Tutti Frutti
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Green melon liqueur', '1 shot Passoã liqueur', '3 shot Cranberry juice (sweetened)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: TVR
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', 'Top up with Energy drink (carbonated)']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass. Lightly stir and serve with straws.

Name: Typhoon
Ingredients: ['1 3⁄4 shot Rutte Dry Gin', '1⁄2 shot Sambuca', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Umbongo
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Passion fruit (fresh fruit)', '1 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 shot Passoã liqueur', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']

Name: Universal Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order listed.

Name: Victoria's Secret
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rutte Sloe Gin', "1⁄2 shot Bottlegreen Cox's Apple and Plum Cordial", '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Mango purée', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '3⁄4 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and carefully strain into glass so this second layer floats on first.

Name: Wagon Wheel
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Whip Me & Beat Me
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '1⁄2 shot Coconut rum liqueur (35-40% alc./vol.)', '1⁄2 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: White Satin
Ingredients: ["1 1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat)', '3⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Yum
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '1 1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Absinthe Without Leave
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Pisang Ambon green banana liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: After Six Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order shown here.

Name: Avalanche Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄2 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Bald Eagle Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe', '3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Bazooka
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Bazooka Joe
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order listed.

Name: Beam-me-up Scotty
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Black Japan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', 'Float Stout beer']
Making: POUR melon liqueur into chilled glass then float Guinness on top.

Name: Black Nuts
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Hazelnut liqueur']
Making: LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the following order.

Name: Blue Heaven
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)', '4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Bora Bora Brew (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Cheeky Vimto
Ingredients: ['2 shot Ruby port', '1 bottle WKD Original Blue']
Making: Pour port into glass and TOP with WKD Blue.

Name: Cinderella (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '3 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice & strain into ice-filled glass.
TOP with soda water.

Name: Fifth Avenue Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Fourth of July Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Blue Curaçao', '1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Head Shot
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Hulk
Ingredients: ['2 shot Hpnotiq Tropical liqueur', '1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
Making: LAYER ingredients in ice-filled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Jam Roll
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass in the following order.

Name: Jammie Dodger
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄4 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making: POUR liqueur into glass and then float cream on top.

Name: Jelly Bean Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Sambuca', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Irish cream liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: K.G.B.
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac']
Making: LAYER in glass by pouring carefully in the following order.

Name: Kiss of Death
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Sambuca', "3⁄4 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur"]
Making: Take sambuca from freezer and Galliano from refrigerator then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Oil Slick
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Irish cream liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Black sambuca liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order listed.

Name: Pickle Back
Ingredients: ['1 shot The Busker Blended Irish Whiskey', '1 shot Pickled cucumber/gherkin brine/vinegar']
Making: POUR ingredients into two separate chilled glasses. Instruct drinker to drink whiskey followed by cucumber chaser.

Name: Port & Starboard
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Pousse-Café
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '1⁄4 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe', '1⁄4 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '1⁄4 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1⁄4 shot White overproof rum']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.

Name: Prairie Oyster pick-me-up (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Egg yolk', '1⁄4 shot Malt vinegar', '1 spoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 spoon Tomato ketchup', '5 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making: Taking care not to break the egg yolk, PLACE it in the centre of the hollow in the glass. SHAKE the rest of the ingredients with ice and strain over egg. Instruct drinker to down in one.

Name: Quick Sex On The Beach (shot)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)', '1⁄2 shot Green melon liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order listed.

Name: Roy Rogers (Alcohol-free*)
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', 'Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)']
Making: POUR grenadine and cola into ice-filled glass and stir. Serve with straws.

Name: Stars & Stripes Shot
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur']
Making: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the order listed.

Name: Burning Bush shot(s)
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '4 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making: POUR tequila into chilled glass and then drop Tabasco over the top. This will sink through the tequila.

Name: Cajun Thunder
Ingredients: ['1 shot Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)', '4 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making: POUR ingredients into glass and serve.

Name: Depth Charge
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Ketel One Vodka', '1 pint Pilsner lager']
Making: POUR lager into Boston glass. POUR vodka into shot glass. DROP shot glass into lager and consume.

Name: Fireball
Ingredients: ['2 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)', '1 shot Goldwasser cinnamon schnapps liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper
Ingredients: ['1 pint Pilsner lager', '1⁄2 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄2 shot White overproof rum']
Making: POUR beer into Boston glass. Layer amaretto and rum in chilled shot glass by carefully pouring amaretto and then rum. IGNITE the rum and carefully lift shot glass then drop (bottom first) into Boston glass.

Name: Flaming Ferrari
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', "1 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1 shot Black sambuca liqueur', '1 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur', '1 shot Navy rum (54.5% alc./vol.)']
Making:
Step 1: LAYER the first four ingredients by carefully pouring in order into a Martini glass.
Step 2: In two shot glasses POUR the remaining two ingredients separately.
Step 3: IGNITE the contents of the Martini glass. Give two long straws to the drinker and instruct them to drink the contents of the Martini glass in one go. As they do so, slowly POUR the contents of the two shot glasses into the flaming Martini glass.
Garnish: Assistant to help the drinker consume the concoction

Name: Jägerbomb
Ingredients: ['3 shot Energy drink (carbonated)', '1 shot Jägermeister']
Making: POUR Jägermeister into shot glass and separately POUR Red Bull into old-fashioned glass. Instruct drinker to drop shot of Jägermeister into a glass of Red Bull.

Name: Slippery Nipple
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2⁄3 shot Sambuca', '2⁄3 shot Irish cream liqueur']
Making: LAYER in glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the order listed.

Name: Flatliner
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Sambuca', '3⁄4 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making: POUR sambuca into chilled glass. LAYER tequila by carefully pouring over sambuca. Lastly DRIP pepper sauce onto drink. This will sink through the tequila to form an orange line on top of the sambuca.

Name: 1300 Millas
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Banana (yellow) sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', 'Top up with Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

Special ingredient #1: Pineapple & clove syrup (1 litre hot water / 1 kg sugar / 5-6 smashed cloves / peeled pineapple in cubes)

Name: 1862 Flip
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '5 gram Freshly grated nutmeg', '3⁄4 shot Egg yolk']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Pineapple and banana juice.

Name: 1st Part
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Catalan dry white wine (Verdejo grape)

Name: 8verlast
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Honey', '1 fresh Egg yolk']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Sweet potato purée
Special ingredient #1: Orange juice reduction

Name: A Hora Incomparável
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄3 shot Soda from siphon', '1 1⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1 1⁄3 shot Cinzano 1757 Rosso vermouth (infused with peanut)']
Making: Place a large chunk of ice in the glass. Add soda, Campari and the peanut-infused vermouth. STIR briefly.
Garnish: Half dehydrated grapefruit slice & lemon zest twist

Name: A Modern Day Jack
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade salted caramel sauce
3 parts demerara sugar to 1 part double cream with a pinch of sea salt. Heat sugar until it has become liquid and started to caramalise, separately heat the double cream till warm, then add cream to the sugar and stir until golden brown and the sugar has completely dissolved. Add your salt and stir further. Allow to cool at room temperature (if you put it in the fridge it will become too solid to mix).

Name: A Secret
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', "2⁄3 shot Galliano L'Autentico liqueur", '1⁄3 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pumpkin puree']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Adelante
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 drop Worcestershire sauce', '6 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.

Name: Alpha
Ingredients: ['8 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Espolon Blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Giffard Orgeat Syrup']
Making: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Amalia (Michael Rousseau)
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Kiwi fruit (fresh)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Elderflower cordial', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5 sprig Mint leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Ale']
Making: Cut kiwi fruit in half and use a spoon to scoop flesh from one half into shaker. MUDDLE kiwi fruit in base of shaker, add next 4 ingredients (all but ginger ale) and SHAKE with 50/50 crushed and cubed ice. Fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully pour ginger ale into drink over the back of a spoon.

Name: Amandita
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Verjuice', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2 dash Ricard Pastis', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda.

Name: Ascético
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Riesling wine', '1⁄6 shot Elderflower syrup', '6 dash Balsamic vinegar of Modena']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Asere
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 dried Roasted coffee beans', '3⁄4 spoon Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '1⁄4 spoon Balsamic vinegar of Modena']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over an ice ball.
Garnish: Oloroso sherry mist & 2 drops Islay whisky

Name: Back in Black
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Averna Amaro', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)", '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: Beyond The Veil
Ingredients: ['1 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Martinique blanc rhum agricole', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into frozen glass over a Lapsang tea-flavoured iceball.

Special ingredient #1 Bergamot & yuzu cordial

Name: Bocado
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '5⁄12 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Palo cortado sherry', '3 drop *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
Method: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over a chunk of block ice.

Special ingredient #1: Rosemary oil (1:1 Rosemary stalks to a high-quality olive oil, left at room temperature for 24 hours.)

Name: Buena Vida (by Gonzalo Cabado)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '3⁄4 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Cardamom honey
Garnish: Sugar cane leaf and grapefruit zest twist

Name: Cambiar
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄2 shot Verjuice', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)", '1 dash Peach bitters']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cantineros Gentleman Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot Kirschwasser (cherry) eau-de-vie', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon White caster sugar', '1⁄3 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Flambé the rosemary then place into a shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Cariño
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1 shot Greek yogurt', '2⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass over large ice cube. Eric's original recipe calls for 20ml vanilla syrup made with 1kg caster sugar, 500g water and 2 vanilla pods. (Vacuum seal all ingredients in a bag, with pods cut open. Sous vide at 65ºC until sugar is dissolved.)

Name: Cement Mixer
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Irish cream liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: POUR cream liqueur into glass and carefully LAYER lime juice so it floats on cream liqueur. Instruct drinker to hold and swirl the drink around in their mouth before swallowing.

Name: Chan Chan
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Chapter 4
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '5⁄12 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '1⁄6 shot Condensed milk']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade peppermint syrup (1 litre boiling water, 5 peppermint tea bags and 1kg caster sugar)

Name: Chatta Box
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Monkey Shoulder Fresh Monkey', '1⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', "1⁄3 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '2 shot Oat milk / oatmeal water', '5 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir. (Can also be served hot.)

Name: Cipango
Ingredients: ['1 5⁄6 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Jasmine tea sugar syrup', '1⁄4 shot Italian red bitter liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Clandestino
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 dash Worcestershire sauce']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade honey-vinegar

Name: Clever Jasper's Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot India pale ale (IPA) beer', '1 shot Chilled water']
Making:
POUR all ingredients into a soda syphon. Charge with CO2 and thoroughly before dispensing into glass filled with ice made with water infused with kaffir lime leaf and ginger.

Special ingredient #1: Lemon juice clarified with Agar-Agar

Special ingredient #2: Lemon grass infused syrup
Garnish: Lemon verbena sprig & stick of lemon grass

Name: Coki Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Toasted coconut syrup (toast 720g of unsweetened coconut flakes on low heat until golden brown. Add 720ml water, bring to boil and remove from heat. Cover and steep for 25 minutes, strain and add equal parts sugar.)

Name: Columbo
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Americano Bianco', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade Sicilian lemon cordial

Name: Cuban Bishop
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '5⁄6 shot Bacardi Carta Negra Superior', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3 drop Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 spoon *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
POUR ingredients into heated blazer mug. Ignite mixture and lower garnish through flame into mixture. STIR. Remover garnish with tongs and place in serving vessel. POUR the hot drink into serving vessel over garnish.

Special ingredient #1: Ginger flavoured brown sugar
Garnish: Long piece of orange peel studded with cloves

Name: Cuban Saint
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5 drop La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1⁄3 shot Hazelnut liqueur', '1 1⁄2 spoon White caster sugar']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Rim the glass with pimento & sugar

Name: Doña Lucia
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '5⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Doremi
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MIST chilled glass with Becherovka and set aside. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into misted glass.

Name: Dream Catcher
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Pomegranate juice', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄12 shot Fernet liqueur']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Special ingredient #1: Dill syrup

Name: Efimero
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '5⁄6 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', "2 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters", '2 drop Cold brew coffee']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Bate
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Lime oleo saccharum', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "3 drop Bob's Liquorice bitters"]
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade vegetable stock (250ml vegetable stock infused with celery, carrots and 500g sugar in water for 20 minutes)

Name: El Bohemio
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Becherovka liqueur', '1 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Imigrante
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)"]
Making: SWIZZLE all ingredients in glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: El Lingüista
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄4 shot Disaronno amaretto', '1⁄6 shot Branca Menta liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Honey sugar syrup']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Meu Avi
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄6 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '6 fresh Basil leaves', '3 dash Celery bitters', '2⁄3 shot Aquafaba (chickpea water)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Lemon sherbet
Peel 20 lemons. Juice the lemons, measure the liquid quantity and set aside. Measure 4 parts caster sugar for every 5 parts lemon juice and add to the lemon peels to leave overnight. In the morning, add the lemon juice and stir until the sugar is dissolved. Strain into a clean bottle and keep refrigerated.

Name: El Obsequio (The Gift)
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Mimosa syrup', '1⁄2 shot Americano Bianco']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: El Vestido
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄4 shot Fino sherry', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '8 fresh Mint leaves']
Making:
DRY SHAKE (without ice) first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. Add mint leaves, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.#

Special ingredient #1: Homemade raspberry syrup (1:1)

Name: Elegance
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Hibiscus sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1 2⁄3 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: Empire of Dreams
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '15 whole Roasted coffee beans']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Encantador
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Bittersweet orange-red aperitivo', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1⁄6 shot Framboise/raspberry eau-de-vie', '1⁄6 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Envious
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '1⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '5⁄12 shot Verjuice', '5⁄12 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '3 drop Balsamic vinegar of Modena']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Endive juice

Name: Equilibrium
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '3 dash *Special ingredient #3 (see above)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Coconut water syrup (1:1)

Special ingredient #2: Coconut yoghurt

Special ingredient #3: Eucalyptus essence

Name: Espiritu de Santiago
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Coconut sugar syrup', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '4 fresh Sage leaves']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Eternal Spirit
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Disaronno amaretto', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)', '3 slice Cucumber (fresh)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Evolver
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "1⁄2 shot Difford's Falernum liqueur", '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Family Pearl
Ingredients: ['3 wedge Pineapple (fresh)', '1⁄2 spoon Allspice Jamaica pepper (ground)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Salted Caramel syrup']
Making: MUDDLE allspice and pineapple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Father’s Advice
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1⁄2 shot Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Vermouth amaro', '1⁄2 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Fizzy Fresh
Ingredients: ['1 shot Monkey Shoulder Fresh Monkey', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.

Name: Flamingo Park Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3⁄4 shot Agave syrup', '1⁄2 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter']
Making:
SHAKE spirits, agave syrup and lime juice with ice.
Rim a footed highball glass with the tajin/sea salt/black pepper mixture. Strain onto fresh ice in the glass. Top with grapefruit sparkling water and stir to combine.

Special ingredient #1: Grapefruit sparkling water.

Special ingredient #2: Tajîn/sea salt/black pepper rim - 2 parts tajin, 1 part Maldon sea salt, 1 part black pepper.

Name: Flight 1862
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Port wine & sweet vermouth reduction made with 3 parts port wine and 1 part sweet vermouth, cook for 12 minutes on an induction hob or 18 minutes on a conventional hob with 2 cinnamon sticks.
Garnish: Black pepper, orange zest twist, maraschino cherry & paper aeroplane

Name: Flor de Luna
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1 shot Aloe vera juice drink', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Four Seasons
Ingredients: ['1 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '2 wedge Lemon (fresh)', '1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lemongrass syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making:
MUDDLE and lemon ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Sea buckthorn fresh juice
Garnish: Dehydrated grapefruit slice, sea buckthorn seeds, lemon and lime zest twists

Name: French Governor
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Pear juice (freshly pressed)', '1⁄6 shot Tarragon sugar syrup (2:1)', '2 1⁄2 shot Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Name: Fresh Colada
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Monkey Shoulder Fresh Monkey', '1 1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2⁄3 shot Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)", '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with scoop of crushed ice and pour into chilled glass.

Name: Fresh Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 shot Monkey Shoulder Fresh Monkey', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Fresh Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Monkey Shoulder Fresh Monkey', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '10 fresh Mint leaves', '1 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: Half fill glass with crushed ice. Add first 4 ingredients and CHURN with a barspoon. Fill glass with crushed ice and churn some more. TOP with soda.

Name: Friend of Jack
Ingredients: ['1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #3 (see above)', '1⁄6 shot Blood orange liqueur', '2 dash Fernet liqueur']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Duck fat washed Jack Daniel’s Old No. 7
Pour bottle of Jack Daniel’s into pan with 200g duck fat. Cook on low heat until duck fat melted. Allow to cool enough to pour into a sealable container and then freeze. This will allow the duck fat to be strained out of the whiskey. Return the duck fat washed whiskey to bottle for use.

Special ingredient #2: Pear & Honey Posca
Skin 5 pears and cook with bottle of white wine and ½ cup of honey until pears become translucent. Strain throw coffee filter and bottle ready for use.

Special ingredient #3: Tansy & pisco tincture
Infuse 200ml pisco with 5 soup spoons of tansy for 3 days or cook for 3 hours/55˚C in water bath. Strain through coffee filter and the tincture is ready to use.
Garnish: Cone filled with roasted & salted walnuts pegged to rim (roast walnuts with sea salt in pan for about 15/20 min on low heat)

Name: Fuego
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄6 shot Malbec red wine', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 drop Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade cinnamon and star anise syrup.

Name: Fuerza Positiva
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Cynar or other carciofo amaro', '1⁄3 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)", '1⁄12 shot Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Full Circle (by Ryan Mowat)
Ingredients: ['1⁄6 shot Palo cortado sherry', '3 fresh Fresh dill', '1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Peach aperitif liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: Rinse chilled glass with sherry and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-rinsed glass.

Name: Garden Gimlet
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄2 shot Lemon syrup (glasco citron)', '1 spoon Caraway seeds', '1 spoon *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '10 sprig Rocket/Arugula salad leaves', '1 pinch Salt']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Red bell pepper purée
Garnish: Pinch Maldon sea salt on slice of bell pepper

Name: Garrigue
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1 pinch Salt']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Gloria (by Will Isaza)
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1 spoon Mascarpone cheese']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice

Special ingredient #1: Passion fruit cinnamon syrup
Combine equal parts by weight passion fruit puree and white sugar. Mix until sugar is fully dissolved. Over medium heat combine equal parts by weight white sugar and water. Add 6 cinnamon sticks and heat until sugar is fully dissolved. Leave for 12 hours. Strain out cinnamon sticks. Combine 2 parts Cinnamon Syrup and 1 part Passion Fruit Syrup. Stir until fully incorporated.

Name: Gold Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '5⁄6 shot Honey water (1:1)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).

Name: Golden Eight
Ingredients: ['2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '2⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Golden Hour Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
This drink can be shaken and served on the rocks or frozen. Rim a glass with a mixture of equal parts salt, turmeric and chilli pepper. SHAKE all ingredients or blend to combine. Pour into rimmed glass (filled with ice if you used a shaker).

Special ingredient #1: Tumeric agave syrup - 2 cups agave, 1 cup water, 2 tablespoons turmeric powder. Add agave, water and turmeric to a saucepan. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring frequently to incorporate the turmeric. Let cool and strain into a sealable bottle.

Name: Golden Prestige
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit juice', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Orange flower/blossom water', '2 pinch Saffron fronds']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Goodwill
Ingredients: ['1⁄4 fresh Apple (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making:
MUDDLE apple in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Top with prosecco.

Special ingredient #1: Vanilla syrup (1-1 ratio of water to sugar (80% white sugar and 20% Demerara). For every 500ml of water add two vertically sliced vanilla pods.)

Name: Green Tea Punch
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Drambuie liqueur', '2 shot Green tea (cold)', '1 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']

Name: Groovy
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Kaffir lime syrup (Bring 250 ml water with 500g of sugar to the boil, pour into a blender with 30g of kaffir lime leaves. Beat well and strain through a coffee filter. Chill before use.)

Name: Guantanamera
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '3 drop Xocolatl mole bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Orange zest twist and spray of absinthe

Name: Harlequin
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Celery juice (freshly extracted)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Agave syrup', '5⁄6 shot Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water.
Garnish: Lime wheel, celery sprig & dark red grapes

Name: Hazy Shade Of Apple
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum (cinnamon infused)', '1⁄2 shot Rosato/rosé vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '2⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '1 pinch Pink peppercorns']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Heather Crowe
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 whole Egg (white & yolk)']
Making:
DRY SHAKE all ingredients and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into small jar.

Special ingredient #1: Benriach (peated) single malt Scotch whisky

Special ingredient #2: Heather ale syrup (1:1 ratio)
Garnish: Smoke the drink with applewood and seal jar. Open jar when serving to guest.

Name: Herencia
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄6 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', "1 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (Henri’s original recipe calls for 10 ml Cinnamon syrup which he makes with 1 kg sugar, 1 litre water and 8 cinnamon sticks heated until sugar is dissolved then rested and strained.)

Name: Hermosa Despedida
Ingredients: ['1 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Violet sugar syrup', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Thomas Henry Bitter Lemon']
Making: Fill half a glass with crushed ice and place slice of cucumber in glass before fully filling glass with more crushed ice. SHAKE next 4 ingredients (all but bitter lemon soda) with ice strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with bitter lemon soda.

Name: Hug From Mary
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Stout beer', '1⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '4 dash Xocolatl mole bitters']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Infinita
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '5 fresh Basil leaves', '1 2⁄3 shot Asti Spumante']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Fresh basil and mist of salted absinthe (blend 20g salt, 80ml water, 200ml absinthe)

Name: Instaspam
Ingredients: ['2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Cranberry & morello cherry puree', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
POUR all ingredients into tin, add ice and churn with spoon.

Special ingredient #1 = Hazelnut & orange blossom syrup
Blend the following and super fine strain.
15g Citric acid
7ml Orange blossom water
275g Caster sugar
120ml Hazelnut liqueur
4 Cardamom pods
5g Maldon sea salt
5ml Vanilla curd
120ml Benedictine
275g Water
Garnish: Serve in a Spam tin and place tub of ice cream with small spoon on top of tin and rest straw across top.

Name: It Was All A Dream
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄4 shot Pimento dram liqueur']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Passionfruit condensed milk – made by combining 355ml of passionfruit puree, 355ml of granulated sugar and 240ml Carnation evaporated milk.

Name: Jack Rising
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky', '1 2⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
Making:
Spritz a chilled glass with Islay whisky (Kaiko used Laphroaig) and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into spritzed glass.

Special ingredient #1: Rejuvenated grenadine
* Rejuvenated grenadine
300g pomegranate juice
150g granulated sugar
30g maraska syrup (from jar of maraschino cherries)
60g beet vinegar (from jar of pickled beetroot)
60g oxidised grenache red wine
1 barspoon rosewater
¼ vanilla pod
4 pinch ground allspice (~1g)
6g carob molasses
Place all ingredients in a jar and shake until the sugar is dissolved. Remove the vanilla pod after approx 1hr.

Special ingredient #2: Citric lime oleo-saccharum
100ml 1:1 lime oleo
10ml 10% citric acid solution

Name: Kitai
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Sake', '1⁄2 shot Mieleaceto Apicoltura Gianni Castellari (acacia honey & balsamic', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Rim the glass with Ibiza salt and hibiscus

Name: L'Aristocrate
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1⁄3 shot Vanilla sugar syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 spoon *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', 'Top up with Brut champagne or sparkling wine']
Making:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.

Special ingredient #1: Truffle salt

Name: La Blanca
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', '1⁄3 spoon Extra virgin olive oil']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Tomato and vanilla syrup made by heating 200ml tomato water with 200g sugar. Cool, then add 100ml vanilla syrup

Name: La Familia
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Amontillado sherry', '1 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 spoon Martini Rosso sweet vermouth']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: La Familia No.2
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Green Apple Syrup', '1⁄3 shot Akashi-Tai Shiraume Ginjo Umeshu', '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass rinsed with absinthe.

Name: La Luna
Ingredients: ['1⁄24 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Armagnac brandy', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄3 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '2 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SPRAY glass with absinthe. STIR rest of ingredients with ice and strain into chilled absinthe coated glass.

Name: LA Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '3⁄4 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Ginger syrup']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Lychee syrup – made by blending the contents of a can of lychees until completely liquefied and then fine straining.
Garnish: Chia seeds and salt (50/50 blend) rim, whole peeled lychee

Name: Las Raices
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 spoon Balsamic vinegar of Modena', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with tonic water.

Special ingredient #1: Vanilla brown sugar cane syrup (simmer 1:1 brown sugar cane and water. Add one vanilla pod cut in half, stir until sugar dissolves and cool).

Name: Last Call
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Cinnamon sugar syrup', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Latin Quarter
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 1⁄6 shot Havana Club 3 Year Old rum', '1⁄6 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1 1⁄6 shot Cola syrup (house made)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Preserved cherry dipped in pop rock sugar

Name: Le Latin
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Voignier white wine', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Olive brine (from jarred olive)', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Libertad
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1 1⁄6 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '7 fresh Rocket/Arugula salad leaves']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Like You
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '2 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)', '1 1⁄2 shot Avallen Calvados', '1 shot Passion fruit syrup', '2 pinch Cinnamon powder']
Making: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Limitless
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making:
THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Banana peel syrup (Banana rind and water in a ratio of 1:2. Boil and reduce until desired consistency. Strain and store in an airtight container.)

Name: Lis Avi
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '2⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '5 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade red wine and spices syrup.

Name: Lithuanian Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lemongrass stem', '2 spoon White caster sugar', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3 fresh Raspberries (fresh)', '5 fresh Basil leaves']
Making: MUDDLE lemongrass, lime juice and sugar in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with 50/50 mix of cubed and crushed ice. Fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Little Wing
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Yuzu juice', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '2⁄3 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '2⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Luchadora
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄4 fresh Kaffir lime leaf', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)"]
Making: Read about cocktail measures and measuring.
Garnish:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Pineapple infused Suze (Suze infused with dried pineapple at 65 degrees for 2 hours).

Name: Maestro Smash
Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Lime (fresh) (chopped)', '7 fresh Basil leaves', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1⁄2 shot Luxardo Maraschino liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)']
Making: MUDDLE lime and basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Magno Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄2 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '1⁄6 shot Fernet liqueur', '4 fresh Basil leaves']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over a chunk of block ice.

Name: Mantener La Fe
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Roasted coconut cordial', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '2 dash Maple bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Margarita Amore
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Valentina-passionfruit syrup - combine two parts passionfruit syrup to one-part Valentina hot sauce and stir to combine. Store refrigerated.

Name: Margarita Caliente
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Passion fruit syrup', '2 spoon Orange marmalade', '4 dash Hot pepper sauce (red)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass with a large ice cube.

Name: Maui Tiki Tiki
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Negra Superior', '1⁄2 shot Spiced rum', '1 1⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 1⁄2 spoon Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', '1 spoon *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: handmade maui base (taken from a six-hours cold-macerated paste made from lime and chilli demerara sugar)

Name: Meadow
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '5⁄6 shot Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "8 drop Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Camomile syrup
Make camomile tea and mix with equal parts caster sugar. Allow to cool, bottle and store in the refrigerator.

Name: Memento
Ingredients: ['3 slice Banana (preferably overripe)', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making:
MUDDLE banana with lime juice in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: * Salted peanut butter syrup made by adding 2 heaped tablespoons of fine sea salt to a bottle of Monin Peanut Butter Syrup. Shake well until the salt has dissolved.

Name: Mr Dogma
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Rubino', '1⁄3 shot Amer Picon', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '2⁄3 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. (Didier’s original recipe uses 20ml pomegranate syrup which me makes with equal parts organic pomegranate juice & caster sugar.)
Garnish: Dehydrated lemon wheel, orange peel & edible flower

Name: Mr Masso
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '1 shot Spicy chili pepper syrup', '1 1⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Filter coffee (hot)', '1⁄3 shot Chilled water']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Special ingredient #1: BACARDÍ Superior infused with sugar cane

Special ingredient #2: Ratafía
Garnish: Sugar cane swizzle stick & star anise.

Name: Nineteenth
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '2⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Noble Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Commandaria Cypriot Wine', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 gram Citric acid (10%) solution']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Dried apricot infused Demerara sugar syrup

Name: North End Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 fresh Cherry tomato (fresh)', '2 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Agave syrup']
Making: MUDDLE tomato in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with and fine strain into chilled rimmed glass.
Garnish: Lemon, thyme and pepper citrus salt rim (made by combining 2 tablespoons salt, ½ teaspoon dried thyme, and a twist of black pepper with the zest of half a lemon). Finish with thyme sprig pushed into cherry tomato.

Name: Nostalgia
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Coconut water', '1⁄6 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '1⁄6 shot Fino sherry', '5 dash Islay single malt (peated) Scotch whisky']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Nuevo Sol
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '1⁄4 shot Amontillado sherry', '1⁄4 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Grapefruit oleo saccharum', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ocho Maneras
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '2 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Orgullo
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Mandarine Napoleon liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄6 shot Monin White Chocolate syrup', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Mandarin reduction with fresh lemon juice.

Name: Original Connection
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 dash Dandelion & Burdock Bitters', '1 dash Angostura Aromatic Bitters']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Asian spice syrup
40pcs cloves
5pcs star anise
500ml sugar syrup 1:1

Name: Pana Pana
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Aguapanela (piloncillo juice) Mix 225g papelon, piloncillo, palm sugar, panela or dark muscovado sugar with 700ml boiled water until dissolved.

Name: Part of Me
Ingredients: ['1 gram Cinnamon stick', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Grenadine syrup', '7 drop Antésite anise', '7 drop Old-fashioned / old time bitters']
Making: MUDDLE 1 gram of cinnamon and in base of glass. Add rum and leave to infuse for 3 minutes before adding other ingredients. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Paseo Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)", '1 shot Coconut milk', '6 fresh Thai basil leaves']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice. Rim the glass with rose salt. If using a wine goblet, strain onto fresh ice. Alternatively, if using a coupe, strain into the glass without ice.

Name: Pasifika Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '1 shot Coconut water', '3⁄4 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Ginger syrup', "1 spoon Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass.

Name: Patrósa
Ingredients: ['1 shot Patrón Reposado tequila', '1⁄2 shot Honey', '1 1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: POUR first 4 ingredients into glass and stir to combine. Fill glass with ice and TOP with prosecco.

Name: Pepin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '2⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Photon
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄6 shot Del Maguey VIDA mezcal', '5⁄6 shot Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Pink Me Up
Ingredients: ['3 fresh Cherry tomato (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '6 fresh Basil leaves', '1⁄3 shot Giffard Orgeat Syrup', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Olive brine (from jarred olive)']
Making: MUDDLE tomato in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Olive & basil leaf on a bamboo cocktail pick

Name: Plum Cake
