Ingredients: ['1⁄2 fresh Peach (fresh & ripe - skinned & diced) (chopped)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 spoon Plum jam', '5⁄12 shot Spicy chili pepper syrup', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer', '1⁄2 shot Spiced rum']
Making: MUDDLE peach in base of shaker. Add next rum, plum jam and spice syrup, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer and a float of BACARDÍ Oak Heart.

Name: Poderoso
Ingredients: ['1 wedge Lemon (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄2 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']
Making: Muddle lemon wedge in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Purple Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 sprig Rosemary sprig', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3⁄4 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '3⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄4 shot Lavender sugar syrup', '1⁄2 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: MUDDLE (gently bruise) rosemary in base of shaker. Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully POUR remaining lavender syrup and then TOP with prosecco.

Name: Queen Street Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "2⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)", '3 dash Celery bitters']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: 2 spritzes Islay whisky on top of glass and 1 on side

Name: Rain or Shine
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Carrot juice (freshly extracted)', '1⁄2 shot Guava juice', '1⁄2 shot Green mint (menthe verte) syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Bob's Grapefruit Bitters"]
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Ritmo Tropical
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Bianco vermouth', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters", '1⁄6 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe']
Making: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into absinthe washed glass chilled glass.

Name: Robin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Pomegranate liqueur', '10 drop *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄12 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '2 drop Celery bitters']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Fish sauce

Special ingredient #2: Panden syrup

Name: Robinette
Ingredients: ['1 shot Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac', '1 shot Bourbon whiskey', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 dash Cherry bitters']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Name: Ron de Olla
Ingredients: ['1 unit *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '3 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
Making:
Macerate spice mix and rum in base of shake. Add chocolate, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice filled glass. Crown with crushed ice.

Special ingredient #1: Spice mix
5mg cinnamon, 5mg ground coffee, almond, star anise, 5ml vanilla essence, clove and orange peel.

Special ingredient #2: Chocolate solution
Hot chocolate powder mixed with hot water and allowed to cool.

Name: Ron-Con-Ton
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Basil sugar syrup', '8 fresh Basil leaves', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water']
Making: POUR ingredients into ice filled glass and lightly stir.

Name: Ru-Yi Knot
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 inch Cucumber (fresh)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Tomato juice', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade syrup with mint tea

Name: Rubí
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Bacardi 4 year old gold rum', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries', '3 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Rum Reverie
Ingredients: ['5⁄6 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '5⁄6 shot Cream sherry (medium/sweet)', '5⁄6 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 slice Orange (fresh fruit)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rumpletini No. 2
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Americano Bianco', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Apple sugar syrup', '4 dash Ultravaganza Euro Bitters (homemade)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Rusty Apple Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 shot Drambuie liqueur', '4 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '1 wedge Lemon (fresh)', '1 dried Cinnamon stick', '1 dried Clove']
Making: HEAT apple juice, squeeze lemon juice, cinnamon stick and clove in a saucepan. POUR Drambuie into a pre-warmed glass and then top with heated apple juice.

Name: Salted Plum Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '3⁄4 shot Akashi-Tai Shiraume Ginjo Umeshu', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 spoon Plum jam', '1 pinch Salt']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Santiago Moment
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄12 shot Bebo Coffee Liqueur', '1⁄4 shot Giffard Noir de Bourgogne Cassis', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2 dash Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 fresh Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Save the Legacy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄3 shot Ruby port', '1⁄6 shot Montenegro amaro', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Red wine and apple syrup
Garnish: Mist of chai tea & dehydrated apple wheel

Name: Semilla
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '5⁄6 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato', '1⁄4 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Bitter', '1⁄6 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '4 dash Soy sauce']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Name: Sempiternal
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Cherry Heering cherry brandy liqueur', '2⁄3 shot Chianti red wine', '1⁄3 shot Fig sugar syrup']
Making: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist, raspberry & balsamic sauce

Name: Simple Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2 fresh Lemon peel', '1 slice Cucumber (fresh)']
Making:
Squeeze the lemon peels into chilled glass. Add other ingredients. Fill with ice and stir.

Special ingredient No.1 Syrup Milk Oolong
Add 50ml of concentrate oolong tea to 100g sugar syrup (1 parts of sugar to 1 part of water), boil and leave to cool, then filter .

Name: Soirée Cup
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄12 shot Orange flower/blossom water', '1⁄3 shot Single cream / half-and-half']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Green tea infused BACARDÍ Carta Blanca

Special ingredient #2: Muscatel wine
Garnish: Grapes & dust with freshly ground cinnamon

Name: Solaris
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

*Special ingredient #1: Sorrel water made by blending 100g sorrel with 70ml water, fine strain.

Name: Something Tasty
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1⁄2 shot Yuzu juice', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Spicy Passion Fruit Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '1⁄2 shot Patron Citronge', '3⁄4 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Spiced passion fruit syrup – made by dissolving 1000g Turbinado sugar in 500g of simmering water until dissolved. Add 200g jalapeño and keep on low heat to allow syrup to reduce for 15 minutes. Take off heat and allow to cool. Strain and add 750g passion fruit puree, stirring to combine. Store refrigerated one week.
Garnish: Mint sprig, jalapeño slice & orange half-moon

Name: Spring Revival
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 inch Cucumber (fresh) (chopped)', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Elderflower cordial', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5 fresh Mint leaves', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Sugar Man
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Ginger syrup', '3 dash La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '1 1⁄2 shot Thomas Henry Ginger Beer']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.

Name: Superhero
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot Ramazzotti amaro', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Mango purée', '1 1⁄2 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '1 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled mug.

Special ingredient #1: Black banana puree

Special ingredient #2: Sweet & sour mix (2:1 lime & sugar)

Name: Tales of Eight
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Espresso coffee (freshly made & hot)', '1⁄2 shot Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)', '8 fresh Mint leaves', '1 1⁄3 shot Prosecco sparkling wine']
Making: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.

Name: The Ballad of Cat Ballou
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄4 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '5⁄12 shot Vermouth di Torino', '1 1⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)', 'Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water']
Making:
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade Peach and clove liqueur
Roast peach stones (that are left over by the kitchen) and add with cloves to a combination of overproof white rum and high proof vodka and leave to infuse for 36 hours. Separately, made a peach iced tea from teabags cold infused for 24 hours. Blend the two infusions together with sugar and peach juice.
Garnish: Edible flowers & dehydrated peach dust. Drink should be accompanied by an antomiser of homemade edible rose & peach perfume

Name: The Fire Thief
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄6 shot Orange juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Sweet fermented rice wine.

Name: The Globetrotter
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Peachtree peach schnapps', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Earl Grey tea (cold)', '1⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', "1⁄6 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Quince juice
Garnish: Blueberry, lemon zest twist & mint sprig.

Name: The Golden Era
Ingredients: ['4 slice Root ginger (thumbnail-sized slice)', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄3 shot Pallini Limoncello liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1⁄2 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Golden Moment
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '5⁄6 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Pink grapefruit juice (freshly squeezed)', "1 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Cola syrup
Garnish: Dark chocolate, dried fruits and dehydrated grapefruit dust

Name: The Leaf Nose
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1⁄6 shot Green Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄6 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: The Lennox
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Gold rum', '1⁄2 shot Pedro Ximénez sherry', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄2 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 dash Pimento bitters', '1⁄2 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1 Homemade banana syrup (1:1)

Name: The Monarch
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Bénédictine D.O.M.', '1 shot Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine (fresh fruit)', '1 twist *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '8 fresh Basil leaves']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Special ingredient #1: Peel of one mandarin orange.

Name: The Royal Legacy
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '1 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "2 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '2 dash Plum bitters']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: *Martini Bianco infused with dates (15-17 dates per bottle. Cut dates in half and hand press. Add into liquid and infuse for 4 days.)

Name: The Spirit Of Rock
Ingredients: ['1 2⁄3 shot Italian red bitter liqueur (infused with red florina pepper)', '1 2⁄3 shot Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)', '1⁄3 shot Aquafaba (chickpea water)', 'Top up with *Special ingredient #1 (see above)']
Making:
POUR the pepper-infused Campari, mandarin juice and chickpea water into a mixing tin, BLEND with a hand-held electronic whisk and pour into ice-filled glass. Top with the G&T float.

Special ingredient #1: Gin & tonic float: a mix of 50% dry gin and tonic water.

Name: The Sunday Session
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄6 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)', "1 dash Bob's Chocolate bitters", '1 whole Egg (white & yolk)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Cocchi de Torino infused with salted maple walnuts
Mix 250g walnuts, 200ml pure maple syrup and 10g rock salt and leave to soak for 3 hours. Add 500ml Cocchi de Torino, mix and leave to sit in a sealed container for 4 days, shaking each day. Filter with a coffee filter and bottle. Dehydrate the left over walnuts to use for garnish.

Special ingredient #2: Vanilla infused Colombian coffee syrup

Name: The Tourist
Ingredients: ['7 dried Green cardamom pods', '1 1⁄6 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 shot Martini Rosso sweet vermouth', '5⁄12 shot Disaronno amaretto', '18 gram Roasted coffee beans']
Making: MUDDLE cardamom pods in base of mixing glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and strain into an espresso cup.
Garnish: Orange zest, BACARDÍ 151 rum & saffron mist

Name: The Usual
Ingredients: ['1 5⁄6 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #2 (see above)']
Making:
STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Orange peel infused Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato

Special ingredient #2: Cherry balsamic & cola reduction shrub at 4:3 ratio

Name: The Vine & The Fig Tree
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄3 shot Daddy Rack Tennessee Whiskey', '1⁄3 shot Averna Amaro', '1⁄2 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making:
DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients and strain back into shaker. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Fig and sage syrup
Pour 1 litre water into a pan with 2 packets (100g each pack) of dried figs and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, add 1.4kg sugar and stir to make a syrup. Take off heat and add two stems worth of sage leaves. Leave to stew and stir occasionally. Once cooled, strain off the figs and leaves and bottle. Store in a refrigerator prior to use.
Garnish: Sage leaves, dehydrated fig slice & lemon zest twist

Name: Theobroma
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '5⁄12 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '1 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)', "3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
Making: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass over a chunk of block ice. Gentle dash with bitters to create a layer.

Name: True Desire
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Ruby port', '1⁄3 shot Orange Curaçao liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Rose petal liqueur', '1⁄3 shot Elderflower cordial', '1⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Turning Leaves
Ingredients: ['15 fresh Oregano leaves', '1 slice Cucumber (fresh)', '1 2⁄3 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)', '1⁄3 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', "1⁄2 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)"]
Making: MUDDLE oregano and cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Under My Skin
Ingredients: ['1⁄12 shot La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '2 dried Green cardamom pods', '2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '5⁄6 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '1⁄3 shot Pasteurised egg white (or aquafaba)']
Making:
SPRAY glass with absinthe. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled absinthe misted glass.

Special ingredient #1: Vanilla flavored honey

Name: Unión
Ingredients: ['2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 2⁄3 shot Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '2⁄3 shot Maple syrup', '1⁄2 shot Liquore Strega']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish: Sugarcane leaves & citrus salt rim (dehydrated peel of 3 lemons and 2 oranges, ground with 100g salt and 30g icing sugar)

Name: Verde Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 shot Patrón Silver blanco tequila', '3⁄4 shot Patron Citronge', '3⁄4 shot Fiorente Elderflower liqueur', '1⁄2 shot Fino sherry', '1⁄4 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 fresh Celery stick (fresh)', '1 pinch Salt']
Making: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and pour into glass.
Garnish: Sugar, maldon salt & celery salt rim. Finish with celery spear & edible flower

Name: Victoria
Ingredients: ['1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1⁄2 shot De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 dash Bénédictine D.O.M.']
Making: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over a cube of 1 cube of hibiscus-infused ice.

Name: Victoria Indomable
Ingredients: ['2 1⁄2 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '2⁄3 shot *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', '2⁄3 shot Orange marmalade', '5⁄6 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Homemade cigar syrup
Garnish: 3 drops chocolate bitters, orange twist & cocktail cherry

Name: Volver a Empezar
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '1 shot Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum', '1 5⁄6 shot Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & unfiltered', '5⁄12 shot Anise / aniseed syrup', '20 gram *Special ingredient #1 (see above)', "3 drop Bob's Chocolate bitters"]
Making:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.

Special ingredient #1: Oatmeal

Name: Wayfarer
Ingredients: ['1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao', '2⁄3 shot Martini Riserva Speciale Rubino', '2⁄3 shot Lime juice (freshly squeezed)', '3 drop La Fée Parisienne absinthe', '3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Wisdom
Ingredients: ['6 dried Roasted coffee beans', '1 1⁄2 shot Bacardi 8 year old rum', '2⁄3 shot Single cream / half-and-half', '2⁄3 shot Licor 43 Original liqueur', "1⁄3 shot Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)", '1 fresh Egg yolk']
Making: MUDDLE lightly roasted coffee beans in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

Name: Word on the Street
Ingredients: ['3⁄4 shot Monkey Shoulder Fresh Monkey', '3⁄4 shot Yellow Chartreuse liqueur', '3⁄4 shot Martini Extra Dry vermouth', '3⁄4 shot Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']
Making: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
